0.name: Ciri
0.ability:
Deploy: Damage 3 enemy units by 1.
When you lose a round, move self back to your hand.
0.ability_html: Deploy: Damage 3 enemy units by 1. When you lose a round, move self back to your hand.
0.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
0.flavor: I go wherever I please, whenever I please.

1.name: Geralt: Igni
1.ability:
Deploy: Destroy the highest-power unit(s) on an enemy row with a total of 40 or more power.
Initiative: Destroy the highest-power unit(s) on an enemy row with a total of 25 or more power instead.
1.ability_html: Deploy: Destroy the highest-power unit(s) on an enemy row with a total of 40 or more power. Initiative: Destroy the highest-power unit(s) on an enemy row with a total of 25 or more power instead.
1.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Initiative: Trigger this ability if you haven't used an Order, Fee or Spring ability this turn.
1.flavor: A twist of a witcher's fingers can light a lamp… or incinerate a foe.

2.name: Geralt of Rivia
2.ability: Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.
2.ability_html: Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.
2.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
2.flavor: If that's what it takes to save the world, it's better to let that world die.

3.name: Regis
3.ability:
Deploy: Damage all units on an enemy row by 1.
Initiative: If any were destroyed, repeat this ability.
3.ability_html: Deploy: Damage all units on an enemy row by 1. Initiative: If any were destroyed, repeat this ability.
3.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Initiative: Trigger this ability if you haven't used an Order, Fee or Spring ability this turn.
3.flavor: Some consider me a monster. A blood-crazed, savage monster.

4.name: Regis: Higher Vampire
4.ability: Order (Melee): Drain an enemy unit by the amount of boost it has.
4.ability_html: Order (Melee): Drain an enemy unit by the amount of boost it has.
4.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Drain: Damage ignoring the target's armor, then boost self by the damage dealt.
4.flavor: He becomes invisible at will. His glance hypnotizes into a deep sleep. He then drinks his fill, turns into a bat and flies off. Altogether uncouth.

5.name: Triss Merigold
5.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Reveal a random unit from your deck and damage an enemy unit by its power.
5.ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Reveal a random unit from your deck and damage an enemy unit by its power.
5.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
5.flavor: I can take care of myself. Trust me.

6.name: Villentretenmerth
6.ability:
Lineage.
Timer 3: Destroy the highest-power unit(s) on the battlefield, excluding Dragons you control.
6.ability_html: Lineage. Timer 3: Destroy the highest-power unit(s) on the battlefield, excluding Dragons you control.
6.keyword_html: Lineage: At the start of the game, boost self by the number of Dragons in your starting deck. Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability.
6.flavor: Also calls himself Borkh Three Jackdaws… he's not the best at names.

7.name: Yennefer of Vengerberg
7.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage all other units by 2. 
Deploy (Ranged): Boost all other units by 2.
7.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage all other units by 2. Deploy (Ranged): Boost all other units by 2.
7.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
7.flavor: Magic is Chaos, Art and Science. It is a curse, a blessing and a progression.

8.name: Zoltan: Scoundrel
8.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Spawn and play Duda: Agitator.
Deploy (Ranged): Spawn and play Duda: Companion.
8.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Spawn and play Duda: Agitator. Deploy (Ranged): Spawn and play Duda: Companion.
8.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
8.flavor: Apologies. My exotic pet's a clever birdie, but a wee bit lewd. Paid ten thalers for the beaute.

9.name: Ciri: Dash
9.keyword_html: Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability.
9.flavor: Know when fairy tales cease to be tales? When people start believing them.

10.name: Geralt: Aard
10.ability: Deploy (Melee): Damage 3 enemy units by 2, then move them to the Ranged row.
10.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage 3 enemy units by 2, then move them to the Ranged row.
10.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
10.flavor: A blast of concentrated energy that pummels everything in its path. Great for when you forget your keys.

11.name: Avallac'h: Sage
11.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Play an artifact from your deck.
11.ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Play an artifact from your deck.
11.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
11.flavor: Amongst the free elves were a handful of Aen Saevherne, or Sages. They were an enigma, bordering on a legend.

12.name: Yennefer: Conjurer
12.ability:
Zeal. Order: Deal 1 damage to the highest-power enemy unit(s).
Cooldown: 1
12.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Deal 1 damage to the highest-power enemy unit(s). Cooldown: 1
12.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
12.flavor: A good sorceress must know when to conjure ice… and when to conjure fire.

13.name: Dudu
13.ability: Deploy: Transform into a base copy of an enemy unit.
13.ability_html: Deploy: Transform into a base copy of an enemy unit.
13.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
13.flavor: A mimic, among the many other names for his sort: changelings, doublings, vexlings… or dopplers.

14.name: Eskel
14.ability: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Vesemir and Lambert from your deck.
14.ability_html: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Vesemir and Lambert from your deck.
14.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
14.flavor: I'm a simple witcher, Wolf. Don't fight dragons, don't fraternize with kings and don't sleep with sorceresses…

15.name: Vesemir
15.ability: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Eskel and Lambert from your deck.
15.ability_html: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Eskel and Lambert from your deck.
15.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
15.flavor: If you're to be hanged, ask for water. Anything can happen before they fetch it.

16.name: Lambert
16.ability: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Eskel and Vesemir from your deck.
16.ability_html: Deploy (Adrenaline 4): Summon Eskel and Vesemir from your deck.
16.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
16.flavor: Now that's the kind of negotiating I understand.

17.name: Myrgtabrakke
17.ability:
Lineage.
Deploy: Draw a Dragon, then move a card from your hand to the bottom of your deck.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Charges: 0
At the start of the game, set the number of Charges to match your Lineage [0].
17.ability_html: Lineage. Deploy: Draw a Dragon, then move a card from your hand to the bottom of your deck. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Charges: 0 At the start of the game, set the number of Charges to match your Lineage [0].
17.keyword_html: Lineage: At the start of the game, boost self by the number of Dragons in your starting deck. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
17.flavor: Never get between a mother dragon and her young.

18.name: Ocvist
18.ability:
Lineage.
Deploy: Spawn Cataclysm on the opposite row for 2 turns.
Timer 3: Damage all enemy units by 1.
18.ability_html: Lineage. Deploy: Spawn Cataclysm on the opposite row for 2 turns. Timer 3: Damage all enemy units by 1.
18.keyword_html: Lineage: At the start of the game, boost self by the number of Dragons in your starting deck. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Cataclysm: At the start of the owner's turn, split 3 damage randomly between units in this row. Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability.
18.flavor: The Master of Quartz Mountain, the Destroyer, Trajan's Slayer. In his free time, he likes long walks and candlelight dinners.

19.name: Olgierd von Everec
19.ability_html: Order: Heal self. Cooldown: 1
19.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
19.flavor: At least you now know I don't easily lose my head.

20.name: Operator
20.ability: Deploy: Spawn a base copy of a bronze unit from your hand on this row and the opposite row.
20.ability_html: Deploy: Spawn a base copy of a bronze unit from your hand on this row and the opposite row.
20.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
20.flavor: As time and space collapse before us, they expand behind us. In that way one moves forward through both.

21.name: Prize-Winning Cow
21.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.

22.name: Roach
22.ability: When you play a gold card, Summon self from your deck to a random allied row.
22.ability_html: When you play a gold card, Summon self from your deck to a random allied row.
22.keyword_html: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
22.flavor: Geralt, we gotta have a man–to–horse talk. No offense, but your riding skills? They leave a bit to be desired, buddy.

23.name: Johnny
23.ability: Whenever you play a special card, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
23.ability_html: Whenever you play a special card, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
23.flavor: Life without savoring the sound of surreptitious shananacking is like licking snails through a cloth.

24.name: Sarah
24.ability: Whenever you play a special card, boost a random allied unit by 2.
24.ability_html: Whenever you play a special card, boost a random allied unit by 2.

25.name: Francis Bedlam
25.ability: At the end of your turn, boost the lowest-power unit in your hand by 1.
25.ability_html: At the end of your turn, boost the lowest-power unit in your hand by 1.
25.flavor: I might just discover I look great without ears… or hands. Apparently the King of Beggars accepts both as partial payment.

26.name: Cyprian Wiley
26.ability: Deploy: Banish a unit with power 4 or less.
26.ability_html: Deploy: Banish a unit with power 4 or less.
26.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
26.flavor: Ever since his father died, he's become a real whoreson.

27.name: Iris von Everec
27.ability: At the end of your turn, if this card is in your graveyard, boost all units in your deck by 1, then Banish self.
27.ability_html: At the end of your turn, if this card is in your graveyard, boost all units in your deck by 1, then Banish self.
27.keyword_html: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
27.flavor: I remember so little… Yet when I think of my rose, I begin to recall what was.

28.name: Unicorn
28.ability: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 3. If you control Chironex, boost it by 6 instead. If you have Chironex in your hand, also play it, then draw a card.
28.ability_html: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 3. If you control Chironex, boost it by 6 instead. If you have Chironex in your hand, also play it, then draw a card.
28.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
28.flavor: They say unicorns are fond of virgins. Since finding a virgin these days is as hard as finding a unicorn, no one has been able to verify the theory.

29.name: Chironex
29.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 3. If you control Unicorn, damage it by 6 instead. If you have Unicorn in your hand, also play it, then draw a card.
29.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 3. If you control Unicorn, damage it by 6 instead. If you have Unicorn in your hand, also play it, then draw a card.
29.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
29.flavor: Gods, that's no unicorn! That's…! – the last words of Vilemar, a famed collector of curiosities.

30.name: Duda: Companion
30.ability:
Doomed.
Boost all units on a row by 1.
30.ability_html: Doomed. Boost all units on a row by 1.
30.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
30.flavor: Knows one hundred words – eighty of them curses, the rest, connectors.

31.name: Duda: Agitator
31.ability:
Doomed.
Damage all units on a row by 1.
31.ability_html: Doomed. Damage all units on a row by 1.
31.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
31.flavor: Zoltan's parrot had the extraordinary ability to irritate anyone who spent time with it. Including Zoltan.

32.name: Fiend
32.ability: Deploy: Decrease own base power by 1 for each unit on the opposite row.
32.ability_html: Deploy: Decrease own base power by 1 for each unit on the opposite row.
32.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
32.flavor: A fiend looks a bit like a deer. An enormous, evil deer.

33.name: Ragh Nar Roog
33.ability:
Doomed.
Scenario: Progress whenever you play a gold unit.
Prologue: Spawn Cataclysm on both enemy rows for 2 turns.
Chapter 1: Damage an enemy unit by 5.
Chapter 2: Spawn and play Clear Skies.
33.ability_html: Doomed. Scenario: Progress whenever you play a gold unit. Prologue: Spawn Cataclysm on both enemy rows for 2 turns. Chapter 1: Damage an enemy unit by 5. Chapter 2: Spawn and play Clear Skies.
33.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Cataclysm: At the start of the owner's turn, split 3 damage randomly between units in this row.
33.flavor: In the Final Age, Hemdall will come forth to face the evil issuing from the land of Morhogg – the legions of wraiths, demons and specters of Chaos.

34.name: The Last Wish
34.ability: Look at the top 2 cards from your deck, then play one and Banish the other.
34.ability_html: Look at the top 2 cards from your deck, then play one and Banish the other.
34.keyword_html: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
34.flavor: A djinn, good sirs, fulfills but three wishes. Thus freed, it flees to dimensions unknown.

35.name: Decoy
35.ability: Shuffle an allied unit on the battlefield into your deck, then play the top unit from your deck.
35.ability_html: Shuffle an allied unit on the battlefield into your deck, then play the top unit from your deck.
35.flavor: When you run out of peasants, decoys also make decent arrow fodder.

36.name: Merigold's Hailstorm
36.flavor: The sky dimmed of a sudden, and clouds amassed over the town. It grew fiendishly dark, and a cold gust swept in. Oh my, gasped Yennefer. We're about to make quite the mess, I think.

37.name: Skellige Storm
37.ability: Spawn Storm on an enemy row for 2 turns.
37.ability_html: Spawn Storm on an enemy row for 2 turns.
37.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
37.flavor: This ain't no normal storm. This here's the wrath of the gods.

38.name: Stammelford's Tremors
38.flavor: The sorcerer Stammelford moved a mountain that obscured the view from his tower. Rumor has it he could only do so for he'd fettered a d'ao, an earth elemental.

39.name: Dimeritium Bomb
39.ability: Damage a unit by 4 and give it Veil.
39.ability_html: Damage a unit by 4 and give it Veil.
39.keyword_html: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
39.flavor: An important part of every Witch Hunter's kit. In one muted flash, it turns the most powerful sorcerer into pork jelly ripe for cutting.

40.name: Blizzard
40.ability:
Destroy the lowest-power unit.
Initiative: Destroy all lowest-power units instead.
40.ability_html: Destroy the lowest-power unit. Initiative: Destroy all lowest-power units instead.
40.keyword_html: Initiative: Trigger this ability if you haven't used an Order, Fee or Spring ability this turn.
40.flavor: Behold Tedd Deireadh, the Final Age. The world destroyed by the White Frost.

41.name: Commander's Horn
41.ability: Boost 5 adjacent units by 2. Boost bronze units by an additional 1 for each gold unit adjacent to them.
41.ability_html: Boost 5 adjacent units by 2. Boost bronze units by an additional 1 for each gold unit adjacent to them.
41.flavor: Plus one to morale, minus one to hearing.

42.name: Vaedermakar
42.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Increase all row effect durations by 1.
Deploy (Ranged): Decrease all row effect durations by 1.
If you control Scepter of Storms, increase or decrease the durations by 3 instead.
42.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Increase all row effect durations by 1. Deploy (Ranged): Decrease all row effect durations by 1. If you control Scepter of Storms, increase or decrease the durations by 3 instead.
42.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
42.flavor: Vaedermakar druids control the elements. They soothe storms into silence, muster destructive hail, summon lightning to turn foes into ash. So I advise you well… treat them with utmost respect.

43.name: Alzur's Double-Cross
43.ability: Play the highest-power unit from your deck.
43.ability_html: Play the highest-power unit from your deck.
43.flavor: A few of Alzur's monstrous creations roam the world still. Not least among them the horrid viy, who massacred its mage-creator and destroyed half of Maribor before fleeing into Riverdell's gloomy woodland.

44.name: Alzur's Thunder
44.flavor: We stand not the slightest chance of incanting a spell so complex as Alzur's Thunder. It is claimed Alzur had a voice like a hunting horn and the diction of a master orator.

45.name: Biting Frost
45.ability: Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 3 turns.
45.ability_html: Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 3 turns.
45.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
45.flavor: Best thing about frost? Bodies of the fallen don't rot so quickly.

46.name: Clear Skies
46.ability: Boost all units on an allied row by 1.
46.ability_html: Boost all units on an allied row by 1.
46.flavor: The sun's shinin', Dromle! The sun's shinin'! Maybe there's hope after all…

47.name: Impenetrable Fog
47.ability: Spawn Fog on an enemy row for 3 turns.
47.ability_html: Spawn Fog on an enemy row for 3 turns.
47.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Fog: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the lowest power unit in this row by 2.
47.flavor: A good commander's dream… and a bad one's horror.

48.name: Manticore Venom
48.flavor: Kills quicker than you can recite the Emperor of Nilfgaard's title in full.

49.name: Adrenaline Rush
49.ability: Boost an allied unit by 8 if there are no other units on that row.
49.ability_html: Boost an allied unit by 8 if there are no other units on that row.
49.flavor: The beast rushed at them wildly, with fury in its eyes, immune to pain and any strikes the defenders could land. Nothing stood to stop it…

50.name: Epidemic
50.flavor: Epidemics respect no persons, no borders.

51.name: Scorch
51.ability:
Destroy the highest-power unit.
Initiative: Destroy all highest-power units instead.
51.ability_html: Destroy the highest-power unit. Initiative: Destroy all highest-power units instead.
51.keyword_html: Initiative: Trigger this ability if you haven't used an Order, Fee or Spring ability this turn.
51.flavor: Geralt took one step back. He'd seen men hit by Scorch before. Or more accurately, seen what remained of them afterwards.

52.name: Swallow
52.flavor: Symbolizing spring and rejuvenation, the swallow lent its name to this potion that accelerates the rate at which wounds scab over and heal.

53.name: Thunderbolt
53.ability:
Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 3.
Order: Boost an allied unit by 3.
53.ability_html: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 3. Order: Boost an allied unit by 3.
53.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
53.flavor: The witcher's face changed… his mien turning inhuman, horrifying.

54.name: Torrential Rain
54.ability: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 3 turns.
54.ability_html: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 3 turns.
54.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
54.flavor: Even the rain in this land smells vile.

55.name: An Craite Warcrier
55.ability: Bloodthirst 1: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
55.ability_html: Bloodthirst 1: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
55.keyword_html: Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
55.flavor: Every man, woman and child in Skellige can split a foe with an axe. Only a select few can split enemy ears with a rage-filled cry.

56.name: Bekker's Dark Mirror
56.ability: Choose a unit. If it's boosted, damage it by double the amount boosted. If it's damaged, boost it by double the amount damaged.
56.ability_html: Choose a unit. If it's boosted, damage it by double the amount boosted. If it's damaged, boost it by double the amount damaged.
56.flavor: Gaze long into the abyss, and the abyss will gaze back into you.

57.name: Renew
57.ability: Play a unit from your graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.
57.ability_html: Play a unit from your graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.
57.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.

58.name: Dimeritium Shackles
58.ability: Lock a unit and damage it by 3.
58.ability_html: Lock a unit and damage it by 3.
58.keyword_html: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
58.flavor: The mage's arms were twisted and bound behind his back. The Redanians gave the fetters a good shake. Terranova cried out, lurched, bent backwards, bowed forward, then retched and groaned. It was clear of what his manacles were made.

59.name: Mardroeme
59.ability: Damage a unit by 3, then boost it by 9.
59.ability_html: Damage a unit by 3, then boost it by 9.
59.flavor: Eat enough of them, and the world will never be the same…

60.name: Bloody Baron
60.ability:
Formation.
Order: Reset the power of a unit.
Inspired: If it was boosted, give it Bleeding equal to the amount of boost it lost.
60.ability_html: Formation. Order: Reset the power of a unit. Inspired: If it was boosted, give it Bleeding equal to the amount of boost it lost.
60.keyword_html: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
60.flavor: I've not been a good father, I know, but… perhaps it's not too late.

61.name: Vernon Roche
61.ability:
Disloyal. 
Deploy: Play the top 2 cards from your deck.
61.ability_html: Disloyal. Deploy: Play the top 2 cards from your deck.
61.keyword_html: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
61.flavor: A patriot… and a real pain in the rear.

62.name: John Natalis
62.ability: Deploy (Melee): Play a Warfare card from your deck.
62.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Play a Warfare card from your deck.
62.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
62.flavor: That square should bear the names of my soldiers, of the dead. Not mine.

63.name: Lined Pockets
63.ability:
Order: Gain 1 Coin.
Charges: 6
Whenever you play a Crime card, gain 1 Coin.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
63.ability_html: Order: Gain 1 Coin. Charges: 6 Whenever you play a Crime card, gain 1 Coin. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
63.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
63.flavor: Really believe you can dupe me with that tale you just pulled from your arse?

64.name: Shani
64.ability:
Zeal. Order: Summon a bronze Human unit from your graveyard to this row and give it Doomed.
Cooldown: 7
64.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Summon a bronze Human unit from your graveyard to this row and give it Doomed. Cooldown: 7
64.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.

119.name: Imperial Manticore
119.ability: Deathwish: Destroy the lowest-power enemy unit.
119.ability_html: Deathwish: Destroy the lowest-power enemy unit.
119.keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
119.flavor: One of the world's oldest and deadliest monsters. I used to feel excitement at moments like this. Now the beast is only an obstacle in my way. Its meat and hot blood will help me survive this icy hell.

120.name: Colossal Ifrit
120.ability:
Zeal. Order: Damage 3 adjacent enemy units by [0]. Increase this value by 1 for each Construct you played this game.
Cooldown: 3
120.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Damage 3 adjacent enemy units by [0]. Increase this value by 1 for each Construct you played this game. Cooldown: 3
120.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
120.flavor: Can't stand the heat? Then you don't stand a chance.

121.name: Nekker Warrior
121.ability: Deploy: If this card would not trigger any of your Thrive units, damage self by 3 and Infuse self with "Thrive".
121.ability_html: Deploy: If this card would not trigger any of your Thrive units, damage self by 3 and Infuse self with "Thrive".
121.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities.
121.flavor: Take heed, gents, there's nekkers under this here bridge.

122.name: Ice Giant
122.flavor: Fled one time in my life. From the Ice Giant. And I'm not a bit ashamed.

123.name: Primordial D'ao
123.ability:
Shield.
Deploy: Boost self by [0]. Increase this value by 1 for each Construct you played this game.
123.ability_html: Shield. Deploy: Boost self by [0]. Increase this value by 1 for each Construct you played this game.
123.keyword_html: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
123.flavor: How do you fight an earth elemental? You don't. You run. Fast as you can.

124.name: Nithral
124.ability:
Order (Melee): Damage a unit by 1.
Dominance: Damage by 2 instead.
Cooldown: 1
124.ability_html: Order (Melee): Damage a unit by 1. Dominance: Damage by 2 instead. Cooldown: 1
124.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
124.flavor: Each Wild Hunt warrior has gone through a rigorous selection process, but Eredin's personal cavalcade includes only the most brutal and most ferocious of the Aen Elle.

125.name: Gaunter O'Dimm
125.ability:
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Doomed.
Order: Destroy a Doomed enemy unit.
125.ability_html: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Doomed. Order: Destroy a Doomed enemy unit.
125.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
125.flavor: He always grants exactly what you wish for. That's the problem.

126.name: Toad Prince
126.ability: Deploy (Melee): Consume a unit with 4 or less power.
126.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Consume a unit with 4 or less power.
126.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
126.flavor: Big, bad, ugly. Squats in the sewers.

127.name: Celaeno Harpy
127.ability:
Deploy: Consume an allied unit.
Bonded: Also Spawn a Harpy Egg on this row.
127.ability_html: Deploy: Consume an allied unit. Bonded: Also Spawn a Harpy Egg on this row.
127.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
127.flavor: Common harpies feed on carrion. Celaeno harpies… they feed on dreams.

128.name: Old Speartip: Asleep
128.ability:
Timer 3: Summon Old Speartip from your deck to this row and increase its base power by 6, then Banish self.
If Old Speartip: Asleep takes damage, Summon Old Speartip from your deck, then Banish self instead.
128.ability_html: Timer 3: Summon Old Speartip from your deck to this row and increase its base power by 6, then Banish self. If Old Speartip: Asleep takes damage, Summon Old Speartip from your deck, then Banish self instead.
128.keyword_html: Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.

129.name: Katakan
129.ability:
Zeal. Order: Spawn an Ekimmara on this row.
Cooldown: 4
Reduce the Cooldown by 1 whenever Bleeding is applied to an enemy unit.
129.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Spawn an Ekimmara on this row. Cooldown: 4 Reduce the Cooldown by 1 whenever Bleeding is applied to an enemy unit.
129.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
129.flavor: Drinking the blood of the Continent since the Conjunction.

130.name: Foglet
130.ability: Deathwish: Spawn Fog on the opposite row for 3 turns.
130.ability_html: Deathwish: Spawn Fog on the opposite row for 3 turns.
130.keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Fog: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the lowest power unit in this row by 2.
130.flavor: Fog creeps on little cat feet. Foglets creep over the bodies of their victims.

131.name: Ancient Foglet
131.ability:
Veil.
Deploy: Boost self by the total duration of row effects on the opposite side.
Whenever you apply a row effect, boost self by its duration.
131.ability_html: Veil. Deploy: Boost self by the total duration of row effects on the opposite side. Whenever you apply a row effect, boost self by its duration.
131.keyword_html: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
131.flavor: Many primal fears lurk in the hearts of men. The fear of the mist is well–founded…

132.name: Wyvern
132.ability:
Thrive.
Deploy (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
132.ability_html: Thrive. Deploy (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
132.keyword_html: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
132.flavor: Imagine a cross between a winged snake and a nightmare. Wyverns are worse.

133.name: Drone
133.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
133.flavor: Ugly – nature's way of saying stay away.

134.name: Nekker
134.ability:
Thrive. 
Deploy: Spawn a base copy of self on this row.
134.ability_html: Thrive. Deploy: Spawn a base copy of self on this row.
134.keyword_html: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
134.flavor: These little guys are almost cute, if you ignore the whole vicious killer aspect.

135.name: Ghoul
135.ability: Deploy (Melee): Consume a bronze unit in your graveyard.
135.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Consume a bronze unit in your graveyard.
135.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
135.flavor: If ghouls are part of the Circle of Life… then it's one vicious circle.

136.name: Griffin
136.ability: Deploy: Destroy an allied unit on this row. If there are no targets, destroy self.
136.ability_html: Deploy: Destroy an allied unit on this row. If there are no targets, destroy self.
136.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
136.flavor: Griffins like to toy with their prey. Eat 'em alive, piece by piece.

137.name: Vran Warrior
137.ability: Whenever a unit is destroyed during your turn, boost self by 1.
137.ability_html: Whenever a unit is destroyed during your turn, boost self by 1.
137.flavor: They sat still on their horses, seemingly relaxed. He saw their weapons – short spears with wide tips. Swords with oddly forged guards. Battle axes. Toothed gisarmes.

138.name: Wild Hunt Warrior
138.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Dominance: Also Spawn Frost on its row for 1 turn.
138.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Dominance: Also Spawn Frost on its row for 1 turn.
138.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.

139.name: Wild Hunt Rider
139.ability: Deploy (Dominance): Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row.
139.ability_html: Deploy (Dominance): Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row.
139.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
139.flavor: First the buffalo horns atop their helms penetrate one's view, then the crest betwixt them, and finally the skull–like face exposed beneath their visors.

140.name: Predatory Dive
140.ability: Each player destroys their lowest-power unit.
140.ability_html: Each player destroys their lowest-power unit.
140.flavor: Afraid for their lives, the residents of Hengfors cowered behind thick city walls. A lot of good that did them...

141.name: Ekimmara
141.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
141.flavor: Me? 'Fraid o' some ploughin' eki-what's-it? Why, it's just an overgrown bat!

142.name: Drowner
142.ability:
Thrive.
Deploy: Move an enemy unit to the other row and damage it by 2.
142.ability_html: Thrive. Deploy: Move an enemy unit to the other row and damage it by 2.
142.keyword_html: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
142.flavor: Though the witchman lusts for gold, for the smiting of a drowner thou shalt give him but a silver penny, or three halfpence, at most.

143.name: Harpy
143.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
143.flavor: There are many species of harpy, and all are kleptomaniacs.

144.name: Harpy Egg
144.ability: Deathwish: Spawn a Harpy on this row.
144.ability_html: Deathwish: Spawn a Harpy on this row.
144.keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
144.flavor: A harpy egg omelet - a delicious delicacy, good sir. Quite dear, too, for as you might surmise, the wretches don't part with their eggs willingly.

145.name: Wild Hunt Hound
145.ability: Dominance: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
145.ability_html: Dominance: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
145.keyword_html: Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield.
145.flavor: Cry 'Havoc!', and let slip the dogs of war.

146.name: Wolf Pack
146.ability: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each allied unit on this row.
146.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each allied unit on this row.
146.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
146.flavor: Relax, I know how to tame wolves…– Dunbar the Hunter's last words.

147.name: Enraged Ifrit
147.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by [5]. Increase this value by 1 for each Construct you played this game.
147.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by [5]. Increase this value by 1 for each Construct you played this game.
147.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
147.flavor: A certain mage thought them cute. It was his fate that gave rise to the saying Don't play with fire…

148.name: Frenzied D'ao
148.ability: Deploy: Play [1] Rock Barrage(s) from your deck. Increase this value by 1 for each Construct you played this game. If no Rock Barrages are available, move an enemy unit to the other row instead.
148.ability_html: Deploy: Play [1] Rock Barrage(s) from your deck. Increase this value by 1 for each Construct you played this game. If no Rock Barrages are available, move an enemy unit to the other row instead.
148.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
148.flavor: They're easily mistaken for rocks. Many a troll's been unpleasantly surprised by gastric grief on that very account.

149.name: Maerolorn
149.ability: Deploy: Trigger a bronze allied unit's Deathwish ability.
149.ability_html: Deploy: Trigger a bronze allied unit's Deathwish ability.
149.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
149.flavor: No gate nor wall can stop them. Just one tiny crack — that's all they need...

150.name: Imperial Golem
150.ability: Deploy: Reveal the top unit from your opponent's deck and damage self by its power, then shuffle it back.
150.ability_html: Deploy: Reveal the top unit from your opponent's deck and damage self by its power, then shuffle it back.
150.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
150.flavor: The most powerful of Nilfgaard's mages have mastered the art of creating golems. On a few occasions, they've even managed to make them fight for the imperial cause…

151.name: Old Speartip
151.flavor: Oh, you're in a heap of trouble now…

152.name: Hideous Feast
152.ability: Damage an enemy unit by 3 and boost an allied unit by 3.
152.ability_html: Damage an enemy unit by 3 and boost an allied unit by 3.
152.flavor: The fool paid heed to superstition, stuffed his ears with wax and didn't hear the warnings. He ran his ship straight into the rocks.

153.name: Wyvern Scale Shield
153.ability:
Boost an allied unit by 4 and give it a Shield.
While in your graveyard, when you play a unit, give it a Shield, then Banish self.
153.ability_html: Boost an allied unit by 4 and give it a Shield. While in your graveyard, when you play a unit, give it a Shield, then Banish self.
153.keyword_html: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
153.flavor: Stronger than your average shield and far more stylish.

154.name: Arachas Nest
154.ability: Spawn 4 Drones on an allied row.
154.ability_html: Spawn 4 Drones on an allied row.
154.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
154.flavor: Damn, the filth's o'errun us… We need a witcher or there's no livin' 'ere!

155.name: Saesenthessis
155.ability:
Immunity.
Order: Remove this unit's Immunity until the start of your next turn.
155.ability_html: Immunity. Order: Remove this unit's Immunity until the start of your next turn.
155.keyword_html: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
155.flavor: I inherited my father's ability to assume other forms - well, one other form, in my case.

156.name: Isengrim Faoiltiarna
156.ability:
Deploy: Boost all allied Elves by 1.
Whenever you play an Elf, boost self by 1.
156.ability_html: Deploy: Boost all allied Elves by 1. Whenever you play an Elf, boost self by 1.
156.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
156.flavor: It dawns on them once they notice my scar: a realization of imminent death.

157.name: Iorveth
157.ability: Deploy: Move an allied Trap back to your hand, then play a Trap.
157.ability_html: Deploy: Move an allied Trap back to your hand, then play a Trap.
157.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
157.flavor: King or beggar, what's the difference? One dh'oine less.

158.name: Milva
158.ability:
Immunity.
Whenever an allied unit moves, boost self by 1.
158.ability_html: Immunity. Whenever an allied unit moves, boost self by 1.
158.keyword_html: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
158.flavor: With each arrow I loose, I think of my da. He'd be proud. I think.

159.name: Zoltan Chivay
159.ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Boost adjacent Dwarves by 2.
159.ability_html: Resilience. Deploy: Boost adjacent Dwarves by 2.
159.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
159.flavor: Drinkin' alone's like crappin' with company.

160.name: Aglaïs
160.ability: Deploy: At the end of this turn, double the amount of boost on self.
160.ability_html: Deploy: At the end of this turn, double the amount of boost on self.
160.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
160.flavor: Brokilon bleeds… and not even I can heal it.

161.name: Ithlinne Aegli
161.ability: Deploy: Boost a non-Neutral unit in hand by 4.
161.ability_html: Deploy: Boost a non-Neutral unit in hand by 4.
161.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
161.flavor: Famed for constantly prophesying the world's doom. Not much fun at parties.

162.name: Schirrú
162.ability: Zeal. Order: Destroy all other units with power equal to Schirrú.
162.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Destroy all other units with power equal to Schirrú.
162.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
162.flavor: Time to look death in the face.

163.name: Dennis Cranmer
163.ability: Deploy: Boost adjacent units by an amount equal to their Armor.
163.ability_html: Deploy: Boost adjacent units by an amount equal to their Armor.
163.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
163.flavor: I know how to execute orders, so take your advice somewhere else.

164.name: Ida Emean aep Sivney
164.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Purify a unit.
Deploy (Ranged): Give an allied unit Vitality (3).
164.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Purify a unit. Deploy (Ranged): Give an allied unit Vitality (3).
164.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Purify: Remove all statuses. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
164.flavor: I am a Sage. My power lies in possessing knowledge. Not sharing it.

165.name: Yaevinn
165.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by the number of Elves on this row.
165.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by the number of Elves on this row.
165.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
165.flavor: We are the drops of rain that together make a ferocious storm.

166.name: Toruviel
166.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage the units on each end of an enemy row by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Damage all units on an enemy row by 1.
If you control an Elven Deadeye, combine both abilities instead.
166.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage the units on each end of an enemy row by 2. Deploy (Ranged): Damage all units on an enemy row by 1. If you control an Elven Deadeye, combine both abilities instead.
166.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
166.flavor: I'd gladly kill you from up close, stare in your eyes… But you reek, human.

167.name: Vrihedd Dragoon
167.ability: Deploy: Move a unit to the other row. If it's an enemy, damage it by 1. If it's allied, boost it by 2.
167.ability_html: Deploy: Move a unit to the other row. If it's an enemy, damage it by 1. If it's allied, boost it by 2.
167.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
167.flavor: Most terrible things I've witnessed? The Catriona plague, the razing of Vengerberg and the charge of the Vrihedd Dragoons.

168.name: Ciaran aep Easnillen
168.ability: Deploy: Lock a unit and move it to the other row.
168.ability_html: Deploy: Lock a unit and move it to the other row.
168.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
168.flavor: The path to freedom is paved in blood, not ink.

169.name: Barclay Els
169.ability: Deploy: Give each allied Dwarf 1 Armor. If they already had Armor, boost them by 1 instead.
169.ability_html: Deploy: Give each allied Dwarf 1 Armor. If they already had Armor, boost them by 1 instead.
169.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
169.flavor: Our mead smells rotten to ye, do it? Easy to fix – I'll break yer nose!

170.name: Morenn
170.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Lock a unit.
170.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2. Deploy (Ranged): Lock a unit.
170.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
170.flavor: Lady Eithné's daughter had inherited her sublime beauty and her wild hatred for all that is human.

171.name: Braenn
171.ability:
Deploy: If you control 2 or more allied Dryads, gain Zeal.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Charges: 3
171.ability_html: Deploy: If you control 2 or more allied Dryads, gain Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Charges: 3
171.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
171.flavor: Mona…? No… no. I'm Braenn. A daughter of Brokilon.

172.name: Malena
172.ability:
Zeal. Order: Move a unit to the other row.
Cooldown: 1
172.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Move a unit to the other row. Cooldown: 1
172.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
172.flavor: I hate you, dh'oine. You are all the same.

173.name: Aelirenn
173.ability: At the end of your turn, if you control 5 or more Elves, Summon self from your deck to your Melee row.
173.ability_html: At the end of your turn, if you control 5 or more Elves, Summon self from your deck to your Melee row.
173.keyword_html: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
173.flavor: Better to die standing than to live on bent knee.

174.name: Sheldon Skaggs
174.ability: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by the amount Sheldon is boosted.
174.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by the amount Sheldon is boosted.
174.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
174.flavor: I was there, on the front lines! Right where the fightin' was the thickest!

175.name: Yarpen Zigrin
175.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 3.
Barricade: At the end of your turn, lose Armor and boost self by that much.
175.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 3. Barricade: At the end of your turn, lose Armor and boost self by that much.
175.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
175.flavor: Ever hear o' the dragon Ocvist? From Quartz Mountain? Well, Yarpen Zigrin and his band o' dwarves did 'im in.

176.name: Ele'yas
176.ability: Deploy: Destroy an allied unit, then Spawn 2 Elven Deadeyes on this row.
176.ability_html: Deploy: Destroy an allied unit, then Spawn 2 Elven Deadeyes on this row.
176.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
176.flavor: Love justifies madness in any of its forms.

177.name: Hawker Healer
177.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Boost an allied unit by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Heal an allied unit by 4.
177.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Boost an allied unit by 2. Deploy (Ranged): Heal an allied unit by 4.
177.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
177.flavor: Sure, I'll patch you up. Gonna cost you though.

178.name: Vrihedd Brigade
178.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Whenever moved, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
178.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Whenever moved, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
178.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.

179.name: Vrihedd Officer
179.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by 2.
Bonded: Combine both abilities instead.

Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.

182.keyword_html: Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
182.flavor: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle – we slash straight at their knees!

183.name: Vrihedd Sappers
183.ability: Deploy: Purify an allied unit. If you control an Elf, Purify any unit instead.
183.ability_html: Deploy: Purify an allied unit. If you control an Elf, Purify any unit instead.
183.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Purify: Remove all statuses.
183.flavor: No matter what you may have heard, elves don't take human scalps. Too much lice.

184.name: Waylay
184.ability: Damage an enemy unit by 3 and Spawn an Elven Deadeye on a random allied row
184.ability_html: Damage an enemy unit by 3 and Spawn an Elven Deadeye on a random allied row
184.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
184.flavor: I spit on Scoia'tael ideals, but not on their coin.

185.name: Vrihedd Vanguard
185.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Boost self by 1 for each Elf in your hand.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost self by 1 for each Elf on this row.

185.flavor: Temerians, Redanians, all the same. Better off dead.

186.name: Dol Blathanna Archer
186.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 3.
Deploy (Ranged): Damage 2 units by 1.
Deathblow: Spawn an Elven Deadeye on this row.

186.flavor: Take another step, dh'oine. You'd look better with an arrow between your eyes.

187.name: Dwarven Mercenary

187.ability_html: Deploy: Damage self by 1 for each non-Dwarf unit in your hand.
187.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
187.flavor: The key's mixin' pleasure an' business – like smackin' foes and gettin' coin for it.

188.name: Hawker Support
188.ability: Deploy: Boost a unit in your hand by 1. If that unit was already boosted, boost by 3 instead.
188.ability_html: Deploy: Boost a unit in your hand by 1. If that unit was already boosted, boost by 3 instead.
188.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
188.flavor: Elf, dwarf, makes no difference – long as they've got coin.

189.name: Elven Wardancer
189.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. If Elven Wardancer is already boosted, damage by 3 instead.
189.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. If Elven Wardancer is already boosted, damage by 3 instead.
189.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
189.flavor: You mean to say the she–elf danced amidst the fray? Have you lost your mind, corporal?!

190.name: Dol Blathanna Bowman
190.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1 for each row that separates it from this unit.
190.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1 for each row that separates it from this unit.
190.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
190.flavor: You might manage to hide from them, but once spotted, don't bother trying to run.

191.name: Hawker Smuggler
191.ability: Melee: At the end of your turn, boost a random unit in your hand by 1.
191.ability_html: Melee: At the end of your turn, boost a random unit in your hand by 1.
191.keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
191.flavor: I fight for whoever's paying the best. Or whoever's easiest to rob.

192.name: Blue Mountain Elite
192.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by 3 if it is the only unit on its row.
192.ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by 3 if it is the only unit on its row.
192.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
192.flavor: By the time we'd heard them, it was already too late…

193.name: Mahakam Guard

193.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by the number of allied Dwarves on this row.
193.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
193.flavor: Only one punishment for disturbin' the peace in Mahakam: a hammer to the heid.

194.name: Scoia'tael Neophyte
194.ability:
Deploy: Spawn a base copy of self on the other row.
Order: Transform an allied Elf into an Elven Deadeye.
194.ability_html: Deploy: Spawn a base copy of self on the other row. Order: Transform an allied Elf into an Elven Deadeye.

194.flavor: Many nonhumans, fed up with the racism and xenophobia they encounter in the cities, decide to join the Scoia'tael.

195.name: Serpent Trap
195.ability:
Ambush: When your opponent plays a special card, destroy the highest-power enemy unit.
Spring: Destroy the lowest-power enemy unit.
195.ability_html: Ambush: When your opponent plays a special card, destroy the highest-power enemy unit. Spring: Destroy the lowest-power enemy unit.
195.keyword_html: Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met. Spring: Manual activation of a face-down Trap. Spring is activated automatically on a Trap played next to an Artifact. Cards with Spring are flipped over after use.
195.flavor: You exact from the earth a blood ransom, ripping out its riches by force. To us it bloomed, bore fruit and gave freely, for it loved us as we loved it.

196.name: Incinerating Trap
196.ability:
Ambush: When your opponent plays a unit on their side of the battlefield, damage it by 5.
Spring: Damage a unit by 3.
196.ability_html: Ambush: When your opponent plays a unit on their side of the battlefield, damage it by 5. Spring: Damage a unit by 3.
196.keyword_html: Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met. Spring: Manual activation of a face-down Trap. Spring is activated automatically on a Trap played next to an Artifact. Cards with Spring are flipped over after use.
196.flavor: Careful…! One more step and you'll be turned into molten glass.

197.name: Hjalmar an Craite

198.ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Play an Alchemy card from your deck.
198.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
198.flavor: Only the ignorant dismiss the importance of myths.

199.flavor: When the time comes, the cockerel Kambi shall crow and awaken Hemdall.

Zeal. Order: Draw a card, then Discard a card.

Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.

204.ability: Whenever this unit takes damage, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
204.ability_html: Whenever this unit takes damage, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
204.flavor: I'm near ready to puke from boredom.

Damage a unit by 5.
Bloodthirst 3: Destroy a unit instead.

205.keyword_html: Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
205.flavor: At close range, trolls never use weapons. And why would they?

206.flavor: When a warrant says dead or alive, most bounty hunters'll just kill you. Not me. Should I catch you, you'll hang, and I'll tickle your feet as you expire.

Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.

235.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
235.flavor: When the time of the White Frost comes, Hemdall will sound the call for battle.

236.name: Delirium
236.ability:
Echo.
Choose between a random bronze Skellige Beast and a random bronze Skellige Human that were not in your starting deck, then Spawn and play the one you chose, and Spawn the other in your graveyard.
When Doomed, choose between gold ones instead
236.ability_html: Echo. Choose between a random bronze Skellige Beast and a random bronze Skellige Human that were not in your starting deck, then Spawn and play the one you chose, and Spawn the other in your graveyard. When Doomed, choose between gold ones instead
236.keyword_html: Echo: At the beginning of the round, move this card from the graveyard to the top of its owner's deck. Give it Doomed. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
236.flavor: Ehh, too big for a humpback. That's a finback. A finback? With a snout that short? Those herbs've gone to your head!

237.name: Elder Bear
237.flavor: We're going on a bear hunt! We're going to catch a–– THAT THING'S HUGE! RUN!

238.name: Raging Bear
238.ability: Deploy: Damage an allied unit by 2.
238.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an allied unit by 2.
238.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.

239.name: Restore
239.ability: Heal an allied unit, then boost it by the amount it was Healed.
239.ability_html: Heal an allied unit, then boost it by the amount it was Healed.
239.keyword_html: Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
239.flavor: Those cursed sorceresses are stealing our thunder! Whyever should folk choose a procedure taking several hours, when some perfumed tart can solve their problem with a wave of her hand?

240.name: Lacerate
240.ability: Damage all units on a row by 2.
240.ability_html: Damage all units on a row by 2.
240.flavor: A sight more horrid you've never seen… The poor soul lay shredded as the beast lapped up its blood from the ground all around.

241.name: Letho of Gulet
241.ability: Deploy: If Auckes is in your hand, Lock an enemy unit. If Serrit is in your hand, damage an enemy unit by 3. If both are in your hand, Lock a unit and damage it by 3.
241.ability_html: Deploy: If Auckes is in your hand, Lock an enemy unit. If Serrit is in your hand, damage an enemy unit by 3. If both are in your hand, Lock a unit and damage it by 3.
241.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
241.flavor: Witchers never die in their beds.

242.name: Menno Coehoorn
242.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Play a Tactic from your deck.
242.ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Play a Tactic from your deck.
242.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
242.flavor: I'll take an attentive reconnaissance unit over a fine brigade any day.

243.name: Vattier de Rideaux
243.ability:
Order: Lock an enemy unit.
Conspiracy: Seize it instead.
243.ability_html: Order: Lock an enemy unit. Conspiracy: Seize it instead.
243.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities. Conspiracy: Trigger this ability if target unit has Spying status. Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
243.flavor: There's never been a problem a well–planned assassination couldn't solve.

244.name: Cahir Dyffryn
244.ability: Melee: Whenever an enemy unit receives a boost during your turn, boost self by the same amount.
244.ability_html: Melee: Whenever an enemy unit receives a boost during your turn, boost self by the same amount.
244.keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
244.flavor: His eyes flashed under his winged helmet. Fire gleamed from his sword's blade.

245.name: Vilgefortz
245.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Destroy an enemy unit, then your opponent Summons the top bronze unit from their deck to their random row.
Deploy (Ranged): Destroy an allied unit, then Summon the top unit from your deck to a random allied row.
245.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Destroy an enemy unit, then your opponent Summons the top bronze unit from their deck to their random row. Deploy (Ranged): Destroy an allied unit, then Summon the top unit from your deck to a random allied row.
245.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
245.flavor: We are all pawns on his board. Playing a game whose rules we do not know.

246.name: Stefan Skellen
246.ability: Deploy: Spawn and play Ace up the Sleeve for each 3 Tactics in your starting deck.
246.ability_html: Deploy: Spawn and play Ace up the Sleeve for each 3 Tactics in your starting deck.
246.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
246.flavor: My mark scars the face of our future empress. That is my proudest achievement.

247.name: Tibor Eggebracht
247.ability:
Immunity.
At the end of your turn, Infuse a random enemy unit with "Whenever this unit receives a status, damage self by 1".
Whenever this card enters the battlefield, your opponent draws a card. If your opponent has already passed or their hand is full, damage self by 12 instead.
247.ability_html: Immunity. At the end of your turn, Infuse a random enemy unit with "Whenever this unit receives a status, damage self by 1". Whenever this card enters the battlefield, your opponent draws a card. If your opponent has already passed or their hand is full, damage self by 12 instead.
247.keyword_html: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities.
247.flavor: Tibor's zeal was legendary. It was said when the emperor passed, he'd not so much bow as somersault.

248.name: Xarthisius
248.ability: Deploy: Reveal a random card in your deck. If it's a unit, boost self by its power and shuffle it back. If it's an artifact or a special card, play it.
248.ability_html: Deploy: Reveal a random card in your deck. If it's a unit, boost self by its power and shuffle it back. If it's an artifact or a special card, play it.
248.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
248.flavor: Astrology, hydromancy, haruspicy, ceromancy. Ovomancy, spodomancy, metroscopy, brontoscopy…

249.name: Albrich
249.ability: When moved to the top of your deck, boost a random allied unit by 2 and boost self by 2.
249.ability_html: When moved to the top of your deck, boost a random allied unit by 2 and boost self by 2.
249.flavor: A ball of fire? Why, naturally. Whatsoever Your Imperial Majesty desires.

250.name: Assire var Anahid
250.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Shuffle a card from your opponent's graveyard into their deck.
Deploy (Ranged): Shuffle a card from your graveyard into your deck.
250.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Shuffle a card from your opponent's graveyard into their deck. Deploy (Ranged): Shuffle a card from your graveyard into your deck.
250.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
250.flavor: Nilfgaardian mages do have a choice: servile submission, or the gallows.

251.name: Cynthia
251.ability: Deploy (Melee): Spawn The Guardian on top of your opponent's deck.
251.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Spawn The Guardian on top of your opponent's deck.
251.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
251.flavor: Cynthia's talents can be deadly. She needs a tight leash.

252.name: Peter Saar Gwynleve
252.ability: Deploy: Reset the power of a unit.
252.ability_html: Deploy: Reset the power of a unit.
252.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
252.flavor: These are not the hands of an Excellency, but of a farmer. So we speak peasant to peasant.

253.name: Fringilla Vigo
253.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Increase the number of targets by 1 for each adjacent Mage or Construct.
253.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Increase the number of targets by 1 for each adjacent Mage or Construct.
253.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
253.flavor: Magic is the highest good. It transcends all borders and divisions.

254.name: Sweers
254.ability: Deploy (Melee): Seize an enemy unit with 3 or less power.
254.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Seize an enemy unit with 3 or less power.
254.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
254.flavor: And hands off the girl! Whatever we may be, we're not savages.

255.name: Vanhemar
255.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Destroy a Locked enemy unit.
255.ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Destroy a Locked enemy unit.
255.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
255.flavor: For a fire mage, he's not very… flamboyant.

256.name: Auckes
256.ability: Deploy: Lock an enemy unit. If Serrit is in your hand, Lock all copies of that unit on your opponent's side instead.
256.ability_html: Deploy: Lock an enemy unit. If Serrit is in your hand, Lock all copies of that unit on your opponent's side instead.
256.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
256.flavor: Letho's got a plan… what could go wrong?

257.name: Serrit
257.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. If Auckes is in your hand, damage that unit by 4 instead.
257.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. If Auckes is in your hand, damage that unit by 4 instead.
257.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
257.flavor: We do what we must. I am not ashamed of that.

258.name: Cantarella
258.ability:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Play the top card from your opponent's deck.
258.ability_html: Disloyal. Deploy: Play the top card from your opponent's deck.
258.keyword_html: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
258.flavor: Men require constant alluring. Mystique and refinement do the job quite well.

259.name: Joachim de Wett
259.ability:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Play the top non-Disloyal unit from your deck and boost it by 8.
259.ability_html: Disloyal. Deploy: Play the top non-Disloyal unit from your deck and boost it by 8.
259.keyword_html: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
259.flavor: To describe the manner in which Duke de Wett led the Verden Group as incompetent would be far too kind.

260.name: False Ciri
260.ability:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Play a bronze Tactic from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
Grace 8: Move self to the opposite row and Purify self.
260.ability_html: Disloyal. Deploy: Play a bronze Tactic from your graveyard and give it Doomed. At the end of your turn, boost self by 1. Grace 8: Move self to the opposite row and Purify self.
260.keyword_html: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Grace: The first time this unit's power is equal to or higher than the specified amount, trigger the ability. If the condition is already met when it enters the battlefield, trigger it immediately. Purify: Remove all statuses.
260.flavor: Here she comes, he thought, our imperial interest. A mock-princess, a mock-queen for Cintra. A mock-ruler for the mouth of the Yarra, future lifeblood of the empire.

261.name: Ceallach Dyffryn
261.ability: Deploy: Purify all allied units on this row.
261.ability_html: Deploy: Purify all allied units on this row.
261.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Purify: Remove all statuses.
261.flavor: Your Imperial Highness… blurted out the seneschal, whose presence until now had been thoroughly ignored. I beg your pardon, but Cahir… My son...

262.name: Daerlan Soldier
262.ability:
Deploy: If you control a Soldier, Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row.
At the start of the game, Spawn a copy of self in your deck.
262.ability_html: Deploy: If you control a Soldier, Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row. At the start of the game, Spawn a copy of self in your deck.
262.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Spawn: Add a card to the game.
262.flavor: Learned a lot at Braibant Military Academy. How to scrub potatoes, for instance.

263.name: Rot Tosser
263.ability:
Order: Spawn and play a Cow Carcass.
Charge: 1
263.ability_html: Order: Spawn and play a Cow Carcass. Charge: 1
263.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
263.flavor: Let historians debate whether spreading plague in a besieged city is ethical. We just care if it's effective.

264.name: Spotter
264.ability:
Deploy: Look at the top 3 units in your opponent's deck, then choose one and gain Armor equal to its power.
Order: Lose all Armor and look at the top units in your deck up to that amount, then choose one and gain Vitality equal to its power. If it's a bronze Soldier, boost self by its power instead.
264.ability_html: Deploy: Look at the top 3 units in your opponent's deck, then choose one and gain Armor equal to its power. Order: Lose all Armor and look at the top units in your deck up to that amount, then choose one and gain Vitality equal to its power. If it's a bronze Soldier, boost self by its power instead.
264.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
264.flavor: The North has nothing with which it could surprise us.

265.name: Experimental Remedy
265.ability: Play a Bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard.
265.ability_html: Play a Bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard.
265.flavor: Well... At least, I can't make you more dead...

266.name: Deithwen Arbalest
266.ability:
Whenever an enemy unit gains a status during your turn, damage it by 1.
Counter: 6
266.ability_html:
Whenever an enemy unit gains a status during your turn, damage it by 1.
Counter: 6
266.flavor: I aim for the knees. Always.

267.name: Fire Scorpion
267.ability:
Order: Damage a unit by 1. 
Charge: 1
Whenever you play a Tactic, gain 1 Charge.
267.ability_html: Order: Damage a unit by 1. Charge: 1 Whenever you play a Tactic, gain 1 Charge.
267.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
267.flavor: Name's terribly misleading, makes it sound like some corpulent reddish arachnid, not an exquisitely engineered weapon of mass destruction...

268.name: Impera Brigade
268.ability: Deploy: Damage all Spying units on the opposite row by 1.
268.ability_html: Deploy: Damage all Spying units on the opposite row by 1.
268.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
268.flavor: The Impera Brigade never surrenders. Ever.

269.name: Impera Enforcers
269.ability:
Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Charge: 1
Deathblow: Gain 1 Armor.
Whenever an enemy unit gains Spying, gain 1 Charge.
269.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Charge: 1 Deathblow: Gain 1 Armor. Whenever an enemy unit gains Spying, gain 1 Charge.
269.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
