Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
269.flavor: Members of the emperor's fanatic body guard fight to the bitter end.

270.name: Nauzicaa Sergeant
270.ability: Deploy: If your opponent has won a round this game, Spawn and play Battle Preparation.
270.ability_html: Deploy: If your opponent has won a round this game, Spawn and play Battle Preparation.
270.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
270.flavor: The Emperor will teach the North discipline.

271.name: Nauzicaa Brigade
271.ability: If your opponent has won a round this game, Summon self from your deck to a random allied row when you play a Soldier.
271.ability_html: If your opponent has won a round this game, Summon self from your deck to a random allied row when you play a Soldier.
271.keyword_html: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
271.flavor: They call us Death's Heads. Care to find out why?

272.name: Alba Pikeman
272.ability:
Flanking.
Order: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (1).
Charges: 0
At the end of your turn, gain 1 Charge. If this unit has at least 3 Charges, gain 1 Armor instead.
272.ability_html: Flanking. Order: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (1). Charges: 0 At the end of your turn, gain 1 Charge. If this unit has at least 3 Charges, gain 1 Armor instead.
272.keyword_html: Flanking: If this unit is adjacent to only one card: on your Melee row, its end of turn ability is triggered twice; on your Ranged row, gain 1 Armor at the end of your turn. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
272.flavor: Pledge your allegiance to our Emperor, Emhyr var Emreis… or die.

273.name: Alba Spearman
273.ability: Deploy: Damage 2 enemy units by the number of statuses on units adjacent to the targets.
273.ability_html: Deploy: Damage 2 enemy units by the number of statuses on units adjacent to the targets.
273.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.

274.name: Combat Engineer
274.ability: Deploy: Give 1 Charge to all allied Machines in hand, deck, and on the battlefield.
274.ability_html: Deploy: Give 1 Charge to all allied Machines in hand, deck, and on the battlefield.
274.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
274.flavor: Want irrefutable proof of civilization's advance? Look at war. Man gets better at killing with each one.

275.name: Emissary
275.ability:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 7.
275.ability_html: Disloyal. Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 7.
275.keyword_html: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
275.flavor: But… but there's no justice in it! One does not kill the messenger!

276.name: Imperial Diplomacy
276.ability: Create and play a bronze card from your opponent's faction.
276.ability_html: Create and play a bronze card from your opponent's faction.
276.keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
276.flavor: A spy? No, that's saying far too much. I consider myself more of an observer.

277.name: Alchemist
277.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Swap the power of 2 allied units.
277.ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Swap the power of 2 allied units.
277.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
277.flavor: Two ounces of calcium equum, one ounce of rubedo…

278.name: Mangonel
278.ability:
Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1. For each Spying unit adjacent to it, increase the damage by 1.
Charges: 2
278.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1. For each Spying unit adjacent to it, increase the damage by 1. Charges: 2
278.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
278.flavor: This model specializes in slinging corpses and ripe dung.

279.name: Nilfgaardian Knight
279.ability: Deploy: Boost an enemy unit by 2.
279.ability_html: Deploy: Boost an enemy unit by 2.
279.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
279.flavor: Sons of noble houses, born in the City of the Golden Towers, form the elite backbone of the Imperial Army.

280.name: The Guardian
280.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
280.flavor: Stone fists to stop intruders armed with swords. Ironclad logic to stop those armed with lies.

281.name: Cow Carcass
281.ability:
Doomed.
Disloyal.
At the end of your turn, Poison adjacent units and destroy self.
281.ability_html: Doomed. Disloyal. At the end of your turn, Poison adjacent units and destroy self.
281.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
281.flavor: That a bird? That a griffin? Naye! That's a…

282.name: Treason
282.ability: Give Spying to an enemy unit and damage adjacent units by its power.
282.ability_html: Give Spying to an enemy unit and damage adjacent units by its power.
282.keyword_html: Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
282.flavor: In Nilfgaard, trustful people are considered an endangered species.

283.name: Bribery
283.ability: Create and play a unit from your opponent's starting deck.
283.ability_html: Create and play a unit from your opponent's starting deck.
283.keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
283.flavor: Many believe the empire's power rests upon the shoulders of its disciplined army and dutiful mages. In truth, the Nilfgaardian floren rules the world.

284.name: Petri's Philter
284.ability:
Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 3.
Order: Give an allied unit Zeal.
284.ability_html: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 3. Order: Give an allied unit Zeal.
284.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
284.flavor: A mage responsible for dozens of brilliant inventions. The mind of a generation. Commonly referred to around the Continent as that bloke with the dish.

285.name: Korathi Heatwave
285.ability: Banish a unit or an artifact.
285.ability_html: Banish a unit or an artifact.
285.keyword_html: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
285.flavor: Vicovaro scholars have determined that, in the absence of imperial aid, drought-stricken provinces lose half their population, two-thirds of their livestock and all their will to rebel.

286.name: Marching Orders
286.ability: Play the lowest-power unit from your deck.
286.ability_html: Play the lowest-power unit from your deck.
286.flavor: We are but pawns in a game played by old men, sent to fight and die on their senile whims…

287.name: Necromancy
287.ability: Play a bronze unit from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
287.ability_html: Play a bronze unit from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
287.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
287.flavor: We have ways of making you talk… alive or dead.

288.name: Summoning Circle
288.ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Look at the units in your deck in order from top to bottom, then choose a unit from your deck and set the Counter equal to that unit's provision cost.
Before the end of your turn, remove a Counter from self for each adjacent unit. When the Counter reaches 0, Summon the chosen unit from your deck to this row and destroy self.
288.ability_html: Resilience. Deploy: Look at the units in your deck in order from top to bottom, then choose a unit from your deck and set the Counter equal to that unit's provision cost. Before the end of your turn, remove a Counter from self for each adjacent unit. When the Counter reaches 0, Summon the chosen unit from your deck to this row and destroy self.
288.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
288.flavor: There exist a great many realities outside our own… With the right knowledge, one can contact them and summon beings beyond human fathoming.

289.name: Arachas Venom
289.ability:
Damage a unit by 3.
Deathblow: Also damage adjacent units by 3.
289.ability_html: Damage a unit by 3. Deathblow: Also damage adjacent units by 3.
289.keyword_html: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
289.flavor: If substance makes contact with eyes, rinse immediately with cold water, then commence drawing up will.

290.name: Wild Hunt Navigator
290.ability:
Deploy: Boost an allied unit by the duration of Frost on its opposite row.
Dominance: Boost by the total duration of Frost on your opponent's side instead.
290.ability_html: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by the duration of Frost on its opposite row. Dominance: Boost by the total duration of Frost on your opponent's side instead.
290.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2. Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield.
290.flavor: For hundreds of years, Avallac'h tried to recreate the Elder Blood gene through back breeding - yet the elven children thus fostered were but dim sparks compared to Lara's flame.

291.name: Vabjorn
291.ability: Deploy (Melee): Play a Raid from your deck.
291.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Play a Raid from your deck.
291.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
291.flavor: Blood for Svalblod! Skulls for his throne!

292.name: Milaen
292.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 4.
Deploy (Ranged): Damage 4 enemy units by 1.
292.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 4. Deploy (Ranged): Damage 4 enemy units by 1.
292.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
292.flavor: The old baron treated poachers mercilessly. Luckily for Milaen, the old baron was dead and his men, desperate outlaws.

293.name: Leo Bonhart
293.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.
Deploy (Ranged): Destroy an enemy Witcher.
293.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power. Deploy (Ranged): Destroy an enemy Witcher.
293.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
293.flavor: He would just sit there and stare at me, not saying a word. His eyes, they were… fish-like, somehow. No brows, no lashes… Just these balls of water, with a black stone sunk in each. He would devour me with those eyes in total silence. That frightened me more than the beatings.

294.name: Rainfarn of Attre
294.ability:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Boost an allied unit by the combined power of units adjacent to self.
294.ability_html: Disloyal. Deploy: Boost an allied unit by the combined power of units adjacent to self.
294.keyword_html: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
294.flavor: When Cintra fell, Attre followed, leaving its defenders a choice: accept the Nilfgaardian leash or die.

295.name: Aretuza Adept
295.ability: Whenever an allied unit's Patience is triggered, boost self by 1.
295.ability_html: Whenever an allied unit's Patience is triggered, boost self by 1.
295.keyword_html: Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, increase the card's specified value by 1 for the rest of the game.
295.flavor: The adepts' every whim is catered to - they live like princesses at Aretuza. And in turn half the city lives off servicing them: seamstresses, milliners, confectioners, delivery boys…

296.name: Drummond Warmonger
296.ability:
Deploy: Damage 3 adjacent enemies by 1.
Bloodthirst 5: Damage all enemies on a row by 1 instead.
296.ability_html: Deploy: Damage 3 adjacent enemies by 1. Bloodthirst 5: Damage all enemies on a row by 1 instead.
296.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
296.flavor: Think o' the greater good?! War's the greatest good, the greatest bad, the greatest damn anythin' man's ever come up with!

297.name: Cyclops
297.ability: Deploy: Destroy an adjacent allied unit, then damage an enemy unit by the destroyed unit's power.
297.ability_html: Deploy: Destroy an adjacent allied unit, then damage an enemy unit by the destroyed unit's power.
297.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
297.flavor: Don't stare at his eye, he hates that…

298.name: Archespore
298.ability: Deathwish: Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row.
298.ability_html: Deathwish: Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row.
298.keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
298.flavor: Folklore claims they sprout from soil watered with the blood of the dying. Thus they flourish in grounds consecrated by pogroms, dark rituals or brutal murders.

299.name: Dol Blathanna Sentry
299.ability:
Melee: Whenever an enemy unit moves, damage it by 1.
Ranged: Whenever an allied unit moves, boost it by 1.
299.ability_html: Melee: Whenever an enemy unit moves, damage it by 1. Ranged: Whenever an allied unit moves, boost it by 1.
299.keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
299.flavor: As long as we stand, no human foot shall trample Dol Blathanna's meadows.

300.name: An Craite Greatsword
300.ability:
Veteran.
Deploy: Damage self by 6.
Whenever an enemy unit takes damage, Heal self by 1.
300.ability_html: Veteran. Deploy: Damage self by 6. Whenever an enemy unit takes damage, Heal self by 1.
300.keyword_html: Veteran: At the start of the second and third round, increase the base power of this unit by 1. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
300.flavor: Ahh, ye gave me a good laugh there, Nordling! Why, this bastard, ye couldn't even grip it, let alone gut me with it.

301.name: Hefty Helge
301.ability:
Shield.
Order: Damage a unit by 2.
Charge: 1
Whenever you play a Tactic, gain 1 Charge.
301.ability_html: Shield. Order: Damage a unit by 2. Charge: 1 Whenever you play a Tactic, gain 1 Charge.
301.keyword_html: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
301.flavor: Not the best for taking cities, but great for razing them to the ground.

302.name: Mahakam Marauder
302.ability:
Deploy: Gain Vitality equal to an allied unit's Armor.
Barricade: Boost self by that amount instead.
302.ability_html: Deploy: Gain Vitality equal to an allied unit's Armor. Barricade: Boost self by that amount instead.
302.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
302.flavor: Hunting on Mahakam's craggy cliffs is not particularly easy… but nor are dwarves particularly put off by danger.

303.name: Harald Houndsnout
303.ability:
Deploy: Spawn 3 Harald's Pals on the other row.
Order: Damage an allied unit by 1.
Cooldown: 1
303.ability_html: Deploy: Spawn 3 Harald's Pals on the other row. Order: Damage an allied unit by 1. Cooldown: 1
303.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
303.flavor: Once proud jarl of Clan Tordarroch, now a muttering madman.

304.name: Magne Division
304.ability: Deploy: Play a Tactic from your hand, then draw a card.
304.ability_html: Deploy: Play a Tactic from your hand, then draw a card.
304.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
304.flavor: I know the Emperor defends all his lands... but a garrison in this blasted waste is like a chastity belt on a grave hag.

305.name: Tuirseach Veteran
305.ability:
Deploy: Damage self by 3.
Berserk 3: Heal self.
305.ability_html: Deploy: Damage self by 3. Berserk 3: Heal self.
305.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
305.flavor: In my days I've seen wonders no man's ever dreamt of, and done things no man should ever do.

306.name: Ban Ard Tutor
306.ability: Whenever you play a unique special card, boost self by 2.
306.ability_html: Whenever you play a unique special card, boost self by 2.
306.flavor: I'm constantly comparing the achievements of Aretuza's adepts with the work done by the lads at Ban Ard, and my conclusion constantly falls in favor of the girls.

307.name: Battering Ram
307.ability:
Resupply.
Order (Melee): Move self to the Ranged row.
Order (Ranged): Move self to the Melee row, then damage the highest-power enemy unit by 3.
Crew: Choose the enemy unit to damage.
Cooldown: 2
307.ability_html: Resupply. Order (Melee): Move self to the Ranged row. Order (Ranged): Move self to the Melee row, then damage the highest-power enemy unit by 3. Crew: Choose the enemy unit to damage. Cooldown: 2
307.keyword_html: Resupply: Whenever you play a Warfare card, reduce this card's Cooldown by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
307.flavor: Not gonna open up, eh? Guess we gotta knock harder.

308.name: Vreemde
308.ability: Deploy: Boost an allied Soldier and all copies of it by 2.
308.ability_html: Deploy: Boost an allied Soldier and all copies of it by 2.
308.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
308.flavor: The Great Sun shall warm the North with its rays, even if it means I must slaughter you all!

309.name: Golyat
309.ability: Deathwish: Your opponent Summons the highest-power unit from their deck to the opposite row.
309.ability_html: Deathwish: Your opponent Summons the highest-power unit from their deck to the opposite row.
309.keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
309.flavor: Some claim Golyat was once a famous knight. Sadly, one day he earned the wrath of the Lady of the Lake, who turned him into a monster.

310.name: Artefact Compression
310.ability: Lock a unit and reset its power.
310.ability_html: Lock a unit and reset its power.
310.keyword_html: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
310.flavor: The figurine expanded in a flash, pulsing and throbbing, changing its shape and structure like a puff of smoke crawling over the floor. Beams of light revealed movement and hardening materials. A moment later, in the center of the magic circle a human form suddenly appeared.

311.name: White Frost
311.ability:
Order: Move an enemy unit to the other row and Spawn Frost on its row for 2 turns.
Charges: 2
Whenever you play a Wild Hunt unit, if there's Frost on the opposite row, boost it by 1.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
311.ability_html: Order: Move an enemy unit to the other row and Spawn Frost on its row for 2 turns. Charges: 2 Whenever you play a Wild Hunt unit, if there's Frost on the opposite row, boost it by 1. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
311.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
311.flavor: No one, not even among the higher vampires, knows exactly how old the Unseen Elder is. They only know they should never, under any circumstances, defy his will.

312.name: Aguara: True Form
312.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Create and play a special card from any faction.
312.ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Create and play a special card from any faction.
312.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
312.flavor: Ever heard of an anterion? Think of it as the opposite of a lycanthrope: a beast which can take on human form.

313.name: Uma's Curse
313.ability: Create and play a gold unit from any faction.
313.ability_html: Create and play a gold unit from any faction.
313.keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
313.flavor: I give you three solid leads, trails as fresh as morning dew, the aid of my spies and my court sorceress. Yet in my daughter's stead, you bring me this… monstrosity?

314.name: Aguara
314.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Lock a unit.
Deploy (Ranged): Remove a unit's Lock.
314.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Lock a unit. Deploy (Ranged): Remove a unit's Lock.
314.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
314.flavor: Smarten up right now, or it's off to an aguara with you!

315.name: Shilard Fitz-Oesterlen
315.ability: Deploy: Set the power of the highest-power unit in your opponent's hand to 1.
315.ability_html: Deploy: Set the power of the highest-power unit in your opponent's hand to 1.
315.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
315.flavor: A diplomat is a man who uses many more words than necessary to express much less than he knows.

316.name: Adda: Striga
316.ability: Zeal. Order (Predator): Consume a Token. If it was allied, double the boost from it.
316.ability_html: Zeal. Order (Predator): Consume a Token. If it was allied, double the boost from it.
316.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Predator: This ability can only target units with power lower than own.
316.flavor: And the striga's doin' fine. Sure, she takes a bite outta someone from time to time, but you get used to that.

317.name: Trial of the Grasses
317.ability: Set a unit's power to 13. If it's not a Witcher, damage it by 6 and Infuse it with the Witcher category first.
317.ability_html: Set a unit's power to 13. If it's not a Witcher, damage it by 6 and Infuse it with the Witcher category first.
317.keyword_html: Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities.
317.flavor: Imagine a lump of clay. In order to shape it, you must first moisten it or it will crumble. The Trial's initial part does just that. It opens the body to change, so to speak. Only then can the mutagens produce a witcher.

318.name: Hanmarvyn's Blue Dream
318.ability: Play a unit from your opponent's graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.
318.ability_html: Play a unit from your opponent's graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.
318.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
318.flavor: This spell lets you see the last moments of a dead man's life… if you can survive its casting.

319.name: Xavier Moran
319.ability:
Melee: Whenever you play a Dwarf, gain 1 Armor.
Barricade: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
319.ability_html: Melee: Whenever you play a Dwarf, gain 1 Armor. Barricade: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
319.keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
319.flavor: Well? Somethin' wrong? Venison a wee bit rank for ye? Ehh, princess?

320.name: Heymaey Herbalist
320.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Heal an allied unit by 3 and boost it by 3.
320.ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Heal an allied unit by 3 and boost it by 3.
320.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
320.flavor: We don't burn cunning women in Skellige - we take their advice.

321.name: Iris' Companions
321.ability: Deploy: Draw a card of your choice, then Discard a random card. If you have Iris in your hand, choose which card to Discard instead.
321.ability_html: Deploy: Draw a card of your choice, then Discard a random card. If you have Iris in your hand, choose which card to Discard instead.
321.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
321.flavor: We'd rather keep our names to ourselves. Think of us as… friends of the house.

322.name: Dorregaray of Vole
322.ability_html: Deploy: Lock a unit.
322.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
322.flavor: Like the witchers, Dorregaray is a monster aficionado, though he's developed his own classification system. Instead of dividing them into necrophages, ogroids and the like, he just thinks they're all wonderful.

323.name: Hubert Rejk
323.ability:
Whenever you use an Order ability while this card is in your deck, remove a Counter from it. When the Counter reaches 0, Summon this card from your deck to your Ranged row.
Counter: 10
323.ability_html: Whenever you use an Order ability while this card is in your deck, remove a Counter from it. When the Counter reaches 0, Summon this card from your deck to your Ranged row. Counter: 10
323.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
323.flavor: The coroner is a calm, peaceful person. He even treats corpses with the utmost delicacy.

324.name: Nivellen
324.ability: Deploy: Move all units on an enemy row to the other row.
324.ability_html: Deploy: Move all units on an enemy row to the other row.
324.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
324.flavor: Lost? Well, go be lost somewhere else. Somewhere not on my property, that is. Point your left ear to the sun and keep walking, you'll hit the road soon enough. Well? What're you waiting for?

325.name: Stregobor
325.ability: Timer 2 (Ranged): Each player draws a unit and sets its power to 1.
325.ability_html: Timer 2 (Ranged): Each player draws a unit and sets its power to 1.
325.keyword_html: Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
325.flavor: The witcher had met thieves that looked like town councilors, town councilors that looked like beggars and kings that looked like thieves. Stregobor, though, always looked exactly like the commonly accepted imagining of what a mage should look like.

326.name: Vincent Meis
326.ability: Zeal. Order (Melee): Set the power of an unboosted enemy unit to 1.
326.ability_html: Zeal. Order (Melee): Set the power of an unboosted enemy unit to 1.
326.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
326.flavor: By day, Captain of the Vizima City Guard. By night, merciless avenger and defender of the downtrodden.

327.name: Hym
327.ability: Deploy: Swap this unit's power with a damaged unit's power.
327.ability_html: Deploy: Swap this unit's power with a damaged unit's power.
327.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
327.flavor: The gods' speak to me… I hear them whisper from the shadows…

328.name: Olaf
328.ability: Order: Boost Olaf by twice the amount he is damaged.
328.ability_html: Order: Boost Olaf by twice the amount he is damaged.
328.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
328.flavor: 10-time winner of the venerable title of Champion of the An Skellig Arena.

329.name: Ulfhedinn
329.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by half its power.
Bloodthirst 3: Damage an enemy unit and units adjacent to it by half their power instead.
329.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by half its power. Bloodthirst 3: Damage an enemy unit and units adjacent to it by half their power instead.
329.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
329.flavor: Werewolf? Oh, no, no… this is something far, far worse.

330.name: Dimun Warship
330.ability:
Whenever you play a Pirate, damage self and a random enemy unit by 1.
Deathwish: Summon the highest-power bronze Pirate from your graveyard to this row.
330.ability_html: Whenever you play a Pirate, damage self and a random enemy unit by 1. Deathwish: Summon the highest-power bronze Pirate from your graveyard to this row.
330.keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
330.flavor: Clan Dimun warships are light and fast, perfect for racing down slow merchant frigates.

331.name: Siren
331.ability:
Order: Consume an allied unit.
Deathwish: Boost adjacent allied units by 2.
331.ability_html: Order: Consume an allied unit. Deathwish: Boost adjacent allied units by 2.
331.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
331.flavor: Legends claim they lure sailors to their doom with their entrancing songs… though more likely, the sailors were more entranced by their other ample charms.

332.name: Alpha Werewolf
332.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Boost a Beast in your hand by the number of cards in your hand.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost all allied Beasts by 1.
332.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Boost a Beast in your hand by the number of cards in your hand. Deploy (Ranged): Boost all allied Beasts by 1.
332.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
332.flavor: The most ferocious among these cursed are not even deterred by silver and alchemy's fiery pains.

333.name: Assassination
333.ability: Damage a unit by 6. Decrease the damage by 1 for each adjacent non-Spying unit.
333.ability_html: Damage a unit by 6. Decrease the damage by 1 for each adjacent non-Spying unit.
333.keyword_html: Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
333.flavor: Assassin — one of the most popular professions at the imperial court, just after scribe and courtesan.

334.name: Infiltrator
334.ability: Melee: At the end of the round, shuffle self into your opponent's deck.
334.ability_html: Melee: At the end of the round, shuffle self into your opponent's deck.
334.keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
334.flavor: You can run, but you'll never hide.

335.name: Kingslayer
335.ability: Deploy: Reveal the top card from your opponent's deck and Banish it.
335.ability_html: Deploy: Reveal the top card from your opponent's deck and Banish it.
335.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
335.flavor: The School of the Viper shall be reborn… Letho saw to that.

336.name: Pyrotechnician
336.ability: Order: Damage a random enemy unit and self by 4.
336.ability_html: Order: Damage a random enemy unit and self by 4.
336.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
336.flavor: An extraordinarily risky, and thus much revered, Mahakam trade. Its best-known practitioner was a dwarf by the name of Mikkel Bay.

337.name: Farseer
337.ability: Deploy: Boost an unboosted unit in your hand by the number of boosted units in your hand.
337.ability_html: Deploy: Boost an unboosted unit in your hand by the number of boosted units in your hand.
337.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
337.flavor: Her words might seem unintelligible at times, but they always contain hidden meanings and tremendous wisdom.

338.name: Elven Scribe
338.ability:
Whenever you play a special card, remove a Counter.
Counter: 3
When the Counter reaches 0, boost self by 6.
338.ability_html:
Whenever you play a special card, remove a Counter.
Counter: 3
When the Counter reaches 0, boost self by 6.
338.flavor: Knowledge, my dear, is a privilege, and privileges are only shared among equals.

339.name: Panther
339.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Give an enemy unit Bleeding (4).
339.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2. Deploy (Ranged): Give an enemy unit Bleeding (4).
339.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
339.flavor: An Oxenfurt scholar once examined a panther and declared it was nothing more than a leopard of a different color. The panther seemed indifferent to this pronouncement and gobbled him up before he could complete his research.

340.name: Tuirseach Bearmaster
340.ability:
Deploy: Boost self by the number of unique allied Beasts. 
Order: Damage self by own boost, then damage that many enemy units by 1.
340.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by the number of unique allied Beasts. Order: Damage self by own boost, then damage that many enemy units by 1.
340.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
340.flavor: Don't touch him. Don't look him in the eyes. In fact… don't go anywhere near him.

341.name: Dimun Corsair
341.ability:
Zeal. Order: Remove up to 2 Armor from an allied unit and boost self by the same amount.
Cooldown: 2
Whenever you play a Ship, decrease the Cooldown by 1.
341.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Remove up to 2 Armor from an allied unit and boost self by the same amount. Cooldown: 2 Whenever you play a Ship, decrease the Cooldown by 1.
341.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
341.flavor: The sea's ours, along with everythin' that floats, swims or sails in it!

342.name: Dimun Smuggler
342.ability:
Deploy: If played next to a Ship, Spawn a base copy of self on this row.
Zeal. Order: Damage a unit by 1.
342.ability_html: Deploy: If played next to a Ship, Spawn a base copy of self on this row. Zeal. Order: Damage a unit by 1.
342.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
342.flavor: Spikeroog's a barren backwater, but that don't bother us - everythin' we need, we take from you.

343.name: Heymaey Flaminica
343.ability: At the end of your turn, Heal all other units on this row by 1.
343.ability_html: At the end of your turn, Heal all other units on this row by 1.
343.keyword_html: Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
343.flavor: A flaminica, the highest position among the druidesses, commands a great deal of respect and wields a great deal of power.

344.name: Heymaey Protector
344.ability: Whenever an adjacent unit takes damage, boost self by 1.
344.ability_html: Whenever an adjacent unit takes damage, boost self by 1.
344.flavor: He fears nothing save Freya's wrath... and his wife's.

345.name: Royal Decree
345.ability: Play a unit from your deck.
345.ability_html: Play a unit from your deck.
345.flavor: We, Foltest, by divine right King of Temeria, Prince of Sodden, Senior Protector of Brugge, etcetera, etcetera, do hereby decree the following…

346.name: Battle Trance
346.ability:
Order: Spawn and play Mardroeme.
Whenever you play an Alchemy card, Heal a random allied unit by 1.

This ability adds 17 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
346.ability_html: Order: Spawn and play Mardroeme. Whenever you play an Alchemy card, Heal a random allied unit by 1. This ability adds 17 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
346.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
346.flavor: No one can replace Bran. Though they're sure to try.

347.name: Onslaught
347.ability:
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 3.
Charges: 2
Whenever an enemy unit becomes damaged, give all Pirates and Ships in your hand 1 Armor.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
347.ability_html: Order: Damage an enemy unit by 3. Charges: 2 Whenever an enemy unit becomes damaged, give all Pirates and Ships in your hand 1 Armor. This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
347.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
347.flavor: Nilfgaardians call 'im Tirth ys Muire, the Wild Boar o' the Sea. Use 'im to scare their kiddies!

348.name: Reckless Flurry
348.ability:
Order: Split 4 damage randomly between all enemy units, ignoring their Armor.
Charges: 2

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
348.ability_html: Order: Split 4 damage randomly between all enemy units, ignoring their Armor. Charges: 2 This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
348.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
348.flavor: No one knows how he got his nickname – no one's dared to ask.

349.name: Imprisonment
349.ability:
Order: Lock an enemy unit and damage it by 3.
Charges: 2

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
349.ability_html: Order: Lock an enemy unit and damage it by 3. Charges: 2 This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
349.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
349.flavor: They do not call me the Patient. Take care they do not call you the Headless.

350.name: Imperial Formation
350.ability:
Order: Boost 2 allied units by 1 and swap their positions, then give 1 Armor to each targeted Soldier.
Charges: 4

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provision limit.
350.ability_html: Order: Boost 2 allied units by 1 and swap their positions, then give 1 Armor to each targeted Soldier. Charges: 4 This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provision limit.
350.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
350.flavor: The summer sun reflected in the quiet waters of the Alba – that's Nilfgaard to me.

351.name: Tactical Decision
351.ability:
Order: Spawn and play Morvran Voorhis.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
351.ability_html: Order: Spawn and play Morvran Voorhis. This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
351.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
351.flavor: A sword is but one of many tools at a ruler's disposal.

352.name: Nature's Gift
352.ability:
Symbiosis.
Order: Give an allied unit Vitality (2).
Charges: 3

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
352.ability_html: Symbiosis. Order: Give an allied unit Vitality (2). Charges: 3 This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
352.keyword_html: Symbiosis: Whenever you play a Nature card, Spawn a Wandering Treant on a random allied row and set its power equal to number of Symbioses you control. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
352.flavor: To live in peace, we first must kill. This is human oppression's cruel finale.

353.name: Precision Strike
353.ability:
Order: Damage a unit by 1.
Charges: 3
Once all Charges are used up, Spawn and play a Brokilon Sentinel.

This ability adds 14 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
353.ability_html: Order: Damage a unit by 1. Charges: 3 Once all Charges are used up, Spawn and play a Brokilon Sentinel. This ability adds 14 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
353.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
353.flavor: The dryad queen has eyes of molten silver, and a heart of cold–forged steel.

354.name: Guerilla Tactics
354.ability:
Order: Move a unit to the other row. If it's an enemy, damage it by 1; if it's an ally, boost it by 3.
Charges: 3

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
354.ability_html: Order: Move a unit to the other row. If it's an enemy, damage it by 1; if it's an ally, boost it by 3. Charges: 3 This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
354.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
354.flavor: That doddery dolt? Ye cannae even tell if he's alive or stuffed!

355.name: Inspired Zeal
355.ability:
Order: Boost an allied unit by 2. If it's a non-Neutral unit, also give it Zeal. 
Charges: 3

This ability adds 14 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
355.ability_html: Order: Boost an allied unit by 2. If it's a non-Neutral unit, also give it Zeal. Charges: 3 This ability adds 14 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
355.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
355.flavor: Don't need advisors and their schemes. I place my trust in my soldiers' blades.

356.name: Mobilization
356.ability:
Order: Spawn a base copy of an allied bronze Soldier on its row and boost both units by 3.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
356.ability_html: Order: Spawn a base copy of an allied bronze Soldier on its row and boost both units by 3. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
356.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
356.flavor: King Henselt did not look like a thief, but, with all due respect, that's really what he was.

357.name: Tridam Infantry
357.ability: Whenever this unit receives a boost, damage a random enemy unit by 1.
357.ability_html: Whenever this unit receives a boost, damage a random enemy unit by 1.
357.flavor: Soldiers loyal to the old baron of Tridam left the city with Falibor, thus becoming renegades wanted by the law.

358.name: Cerys an Craite
358.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Spawn a Drummond Shieldmaiden on this row.
Deploy (Ranged): Spawn a Drummond Queensguard on this row.
358.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Spawn a Drummond Shieldmaiden on this row. Deploy (Ranged): Spawn a Drummond Queensguard on this row.
358.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
358.flavor: They call me Sparrowhawk. Know why? Because I eat rats like you for breakfast.

359.name: Saskia
359.ability:
Deploy: Spawn an Elven Deadeye, Rowdy Dwarf, or Young Dryad on this row.
Gain an Order ability based on the unit you Spawned:
Elven Deadeye - Order: Spawn and play Waylay.
Rowdy Dwarf - Order: Spawn and play Tempering.
Young Dryad - Order: Spawn and play Dryad's Caress.
359.ability_html: Deploy: Spawn an Elven Deadeye, Rowdy Dwarf, or Young Dryad on this row. Gain an Order ability based on the unit you Spawned: Elven Deadeye - Order: Spawn and play Waylay. Rowdy Dwarf - Order: Spawn and play Tempering. Young Dryad - Order: Spawn and play Dryad's Caress.
359.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
359.flavor: I care not for kings and their titles. In the east lives one who truly deserves a crown.

360.name: Skjall
360.keyword_html: Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount.
360.flavor: Strike his name from the Saga of Elders! No one dare grant him shelter or sustenance!

361.name: Jotunn
361.ability: Deploy: Boost self by the total base power of Ice Giants in your starting deck.
361.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by the total base power of Ice Giants in your starting deck.
361.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
361.flavor: Skellige legend claims the mighty and terrible Jotunn, King of Giants, reigned over the isles in ancient times. He was slain by Hemdall, but with his dying breath he vowed to return for Ragh nar Roog.

362.name: Whispess: Tribute
362.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Play an Organic card from your deck.
362.ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Play an Organic card from your deck.
362.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
362.flavor: I'd be your best – and last.

363.name: Brewess: Ritual
363.ability: Deathwish: Summon 2 random bronze Deathwish units from your deck to this row.
363.ability_html: Deathwish: Summon 2 random bronze Deathwish units from your deck to this row.
363.keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
363.flavor: We'll cut you up, boy. A fine broth you'll make.

364.name: Weavess: Incantation
364.ability:
Zeal. Order: Consume an allied unit.
Ranged: Whenever you play a unit with Deathwish, trigger its Deathwish ability.
364.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Consume an allied unit. Ranged: Whenever you play a unit with Deathwish, trigger its Deathwish ability.
364.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
364.flavor: I sense your pain. I see your fear.

365.name: Mandrake
365.flavor: There you all stand! With wonderment awake, doubting the plan and high-discovery. Some, as if grappled by the fell mandrake, some, by the black dog's devilry.

366.name: Crow's Eye
366.ability: Purify an allied unit and boost it by 4.
366.ability_html: Purify an allied unit and boost it by 4.
366.flavor: A certain famous pirate once so loved this intoxicating herb, he earned the nickname 'Crow's Eye.' The theatrical version of his legend omits this, however, to the great consternation of pirate lore sticklers.

367.name: Vigo's Muzzle
367.ability: Lock an enemy unit with 6 or less power and Seize it.
367.ability_html: Lock an enemy unit with 6 or less power and Seize it.
367.keyword_html: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities. Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
367.flavor: Never has there been a beast Fringilla Vigo could not tame.

368.name: Wolfsbane
368.ability: Set an enemy unit's power to 1.
368.ability_html: Set an enemy unit's power to 1.
368.flavor: Also known as 'the queen of poisons,' wolfsbane is used in many witcher Potions and alchemic brews.

369.name: Pitfall Trap
369.ability:
Ambush: When your opponent plays a card face up, split damage equal to its provision cost randomly between all enemy units.
Spring: Split 6 damage randomly between all enemy units.
369.ability_html: Ambush: When your opponent plays a card face up, split damage equal to its provision cost randomly between all enemy units. Spring: Split 6 damage randomly between all enemy units.
369.keyword_html: Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met. Spring: Manual activation of a face-down Trap. Spring is activated automatically on a Trap played next to an Artifact. Cards with Spring are flipped over after use.
369.flavor: Simple, cheap and deadly efficient - no wonder it's one of the Scoia'tael's favorite traps.

370.name: Cockatrice
370.ability:
Deploy: Boost self by 2 for each adjacent Beast.
Predator: Also Poison an enemy unit.
370.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 2 for each adjacent Beast. Predator: Also Poison an enemy unit.
370.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Predator: This ability can only target units with power lower than own. Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
370.flavor: Always strikes between the vertebrae, under your left kidney or straight into your aorta. That way, it only needs to strike once.

371.name: Poor Fucking Infantry
371.ability:
Deploy: Spawn a Left Fucking Flank and a Right Fucking Flank on each side of this unit.
Bonded: Also boost self by 3.
371.ability_html: Deploy: Spawn a Left Fucking Flank and a Right Fucking Flank on each side of this unit. Bonded: Also boost self by 3.
371.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
371.flavor: I's a war veteran! Spare me a crown?

372.name: Lambert: Swordmaster
372.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit and all copies of that unit on your opponent's side by 2.
372.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit and all copies of that unit on your opponent's side by 2.
372.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
372.flavor: Go teach your grandma to suck eggs.

373.name: Eskel: Pathfinder
373.ability: Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with a primary category that is not in your starting deck.
373.ability_html: Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with a primary category that is not in your starting deck.
373.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
373.flavor: Heard you panting from three miles away. Just didn't wanna give up that vantage point.

374.name: Vesemir: Mentor
374.ability:
Deploy: Boost all Witchers you control by 1.
Adrenaline 4: Also boost all Witchers in your hand and deck.
374.ability_html: Deploy: Boost all Witchers you control by 1. Adrenaline 4: Also boost all Witchers in your hand and deck.
374.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
374.flavor: Killing monsters is not something to be taken lightly. Ciri must understand that if she's to become one of us.

375.name: Dwarven Agitator
375.ability:
Deploy: Give 1 Armor to 2 Dwarves in your hand.
Whenever you play a Dwarf, give it 1 Armor.
375.ability_html: Deploy: Give 1 Armor to 2 Dwarves in your hand. Whenever you play a Dwarf, give it 1 Armor.
375.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
375.flavor: Mark me words, if ye dinnae get up off yer arses, humans're gonnae come here an' steal our wenches!

376.name: Standard Bearer
376.ability: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each boosted enemy unit.
376.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each boosted enemy unit.
376.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
376.flavor: You shall defend this standard if it costs you your lives! Gloir aen Ard Feainn!

377.name: Rotfiend
377.ability: Deathwish: Damage a random enemy unit by 5.
377.ability_html: Deathwish: Damage a random enemy unit by 5.
377.keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
377.flavor: You'll smell them long before you see them.

378.name: Alba Armored Cavalry
378.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Lock an enemy unit.
378.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
378.flavor: The wedge of riders thundered into the phalanx with crushing momentum. Like a dagger thrust into an exposed belly, the Alba Division swept unhindered through everything between it and the vital organs of the Temerian Infantry.

379.name: Temerian Drummer
379.ability: At the end of your turn, boost the unit to the right by 1.
379.ability_html: At the end of your turn, boost the unit to the right by 1.
379.flavor: Not the career he had in mind when he told mummy he wanted to be a musician.

380.name: Whale Harpooner
380.ability: Deploy: Move an enemy unit to the other row, then damage it by the number of units on that row.
380.ability_html: Deploy: Move an enemy unit to the other row, then damage it by the number of units on that row.
380.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
380.flavor: Skelligers have long known that harpoons are effective against more than mere whales...

381.name: The Naglfar
381.ability: Look at 2 random gold cards from your deck, then play one and move the other back to the top of it.
381.ability_html: Look at 2 random gold cards from your deck, then play one and move the other back to the top of it.
381.flavor: Waves pummel the shore, waves pushed by the prow of the spectral Naglfar. Hemdall's horn rings in the air, and Hemdall stands facing his enemies atop Bifrost, the burning rainbow. The White Frost is nigh, nigh is the time of gale and storm…

382.name: Chort
382.flavor: A member of the Bovine Defense Force. Semper fi!

383.name: Ice Troll
383.ability: Might: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
383.ability_html: Might: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
383.keyword_html: Might: Trigger this ability if you control a unit with 10 or more power on each of your rows.
383.flavor: Trolls come in many varieties, with differing shapes, sizes and predilections, though always with about as much brains as a bucket of rusty nails.

384.name: Venendal Elite
384.ability: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each Tactic in your hand.
384.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each Tactic in your hand.
384.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
384.flavor: Ebbing is famed for its top-notch mercenaries and light cavalry.

385.name: Mahakam Ale
385.ability: Boost a unit by 5 and remove its Lock.
385.ability_html: Boost a unit by 5 and remove its Lock.
385.keyword_html: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
385.flavor: Considered to be the dwarves' greatest contribution to world culture.

386.name: Éibhear Hattori
386.ability: Whenever you play an artifact, boost the lowest-power allied unit by 3.
386.ability_html: Whenever you play an artifact, boost the lowest-power allied unit by 3.
386.flavor: Only thing that can rival his swords? His dumplings.

387.name: Germain Piquant
387.ability:
Deploy: Spawn 2 Cows to the right, then Spawn 2 Cows to the left of this unit.
Order: Spawn a Cow on this row.
Cooldown: 3
387.ability_html: Deploy: Spawn 2 Cows to the right, then Spawn 2 Cows to the left of this unit. Order: Spawn a Cow on this row. Cooldown: 3
387.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
387.flavor: The hero Toussaint needs, but not the one it deserves.

388.name: Heymaey Spearmaiden
388.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2, then damage self by 2.
388.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2, then damage self by 2.
388.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
388.flavor: Skellige women are wild and unpredictable. All units are to treat them as serious threats and never underestimate their capabilities. - General Directive to the Invading Forces of the Imperial Armada

389.name: Ronvid the Incessant
389.ability:
Deploy: Boost self by 5.
When you play a Soldier, Summon self from your graveyard to a random allied row.
389.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 5. When you play a Soldier, Summon self from your graveyard to a random allied row.
389.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
389.flavor: This self-dubbed knight roams the world defending the honor of his beloved Maid Bilberry - though none are certain where she lives, if she lives still or if she ever lived at all.

390.name: Tainted Ale
390.ability: Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2 and Infuse it with "Whenever this unit receives a boost, damage self by 1".
390.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2 and Infuse it with "Whenever this unit receives a boost, damage self by 1".
390.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities.
390.flavor: That beer supposed to be green…?

391.name: Ale of the Ancestors
391.ability:
Resilience.
Zeal. Order: Boost a unit by 3 and Infuse it with "Whenever this unit is targeted by Mahakam Ale or Golden Froth, boost self by 2".
Cooldown: 2
391.ability_html: Resilience. Zeal. Order: Boost a unit by 3 and Infuse it with "Whenever this unit is targeted by Mahakam Ale or Golden Froth, boost self by 2". Cooldown: 2
391.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
391.flavor: Boros, the legendary founder of Clan Fuchs, died after overindulging in this beverage - he passed out while reaching for his golden ring, which had fallen into a brook.

392.name: She-Troll of Vergen
392.ability: Melee: Whenever a unit is destroyed during your turn, boost self by 2.
392.ability_html: Melee: Whenever a unit is destroyed during your turn, boost self by 2.
392.keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
392.flavor: Lover of elf and onion soup.

393.name: Elven Swordmaster
393.ability:
Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Cooldown: 2
Whenever you play an Elf, decrease the Cooldown by 1.
393.ability_html: Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 1. Cooldown: 2 Whenever you play an Elf, decrease the Cooldown by 1.
393.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
393.flavor: Combat is a dance, and you must never allow your opponent to lead.

394.name: Slyzard
394.ability:
Order: Consume an allied unit on this row.
Cooldown: 1
394.ability_html: Order: Consume an allied unit on this row. Cooldown: 1
394.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
394.flavor: No man alive, no matter his brawn, no matter his skill, can parry a blow dealt by the tail of a slyzard, the pincers of a giant scorpion or the claws of a griffin.

395.name: Aedirnian Mauler
395.ability: Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
395.ability_html: Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
395.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
395.flavor: Ugh, these guys can be a real headache.

396.name: Geralt: Yrden
396.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Reset the power of all units on a row.
Adrenaline 2: Reset the power of all units on an allied row instead.
396.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Reset the power of all units on a row. Adrenaline 2: Reset the power of all units on an allied row instead.
396.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
396.flavor: He lay down next to Adda's mummified remains, drawing the Yrden Sign on the inner side of her sarcophagus' lid.

397.name: Mahakam Volunteers
397.ability: Deploy: If you control a Dwarf, Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row.
397.ability_html: Deploy: If you control a Dwarf, Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row.
397.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
397.flavor: Hoooahhh! Hoooaahhh! Hooo! Prepare yer hineys, clowns! Soon we'll be comin' 'round! Tae kick 'em till ye've feet for frowns!

398.name: Harald's Pal
398.ability:
Doomed.
Deathwish: Damage a random enemy unit by 2.
398.ability_html: Doomed. Deathwish: Damage a random enemy unit by 2.
398.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
398.flavor: Tall one's Wilmar. Wilfred's to his right. And the lad with the stutter's Wilhelm.

399.name: Cow
399.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
399.flavor: In Beauclair, everything is better: the wine is sweeter, the cows are bigger and all the ladies are above average.

400.name: An Craite Marauder
400.ability: Deploy (Melee): Split 3 damage randomly between all enemy units.
400.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Split 3 damage randomly between all enemy units.
400.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
400.flavor: You daft? You mean to sail to Skellige? Those barbarians'll tear you to shreds!

401.name: Phoenix
401.ability:
Deploy: Gain Vitality (5).
At the start of the round, while in your graveyard, Banish self, then Spawn Phoenix Hatchling on a random allied row.
401.ability_html: Deploy: Gain Vitality (5). At the start of the round, while in your graveyard, Banish self, then Spawn Phoenix Hatchling on a random allied row.
401.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
401.flavor: What came first, the phoenix or the egg?

402.name: Toussaintois Hospitality
402.ability:
Order: Spawn and play Buhurt.
Whenever you boost one or more enemy units during your turn, boost a random allied unit by 1.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
402.ability_html: Order: Spawn and play Buhurt. Whenever you boost one or more enemy units during your turn, boost a random allied unit by 1. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
402.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
402.flavor: Why should something as trivial as birth decide who rules over us?

403.name: Stribog Runestone
403.ability: Create and play a bronze Skellige card.
403.ability_html: Create and play a bronze Skellige card.
403.keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
403.flavor: Ofieri runemasters can combine these into runewords of incredible power.

404.name: Zoria Runestone
404.ability: Create and play a bronze Northern Realms card.
404.ability_html: Create and play a bronze Northern Realms card.
404.keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
404.flavor: I'm getting a palpable chill from this runestone… did I do something to hurt its feelings?

405.name: Dazhbog Runestone
405.ability: Create and play a bronze Nilfgaard card.
405.ability_html: Create and play a bronze Nilfgaard card.
405.keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.

406.name: Devana Runestone
406.ability: Create and play a bronze Monsters card.
406.ability_html: Create and play a bronze Monsters card.
406.keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
406.flavor: My blades're so sharp, they can cut paper!

407.name: Morana Runestone
407.ability: Create and play a bronze Scoia'tael card.
407.ability_html: Create and play a bronze Scoia'tael card.
407.keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
407.flavor: I grow faint at the very sight of it…

408.name: Whispering Hillock
408.ability: Play a Deathwish unit from your deck.
408.ability_html: Play a Deathwish unit from your deck.
408.keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
408.flavor: It will rise again. Elsewhere, beyond our reach. Blood will flow once more.

409.name: Invigorate
409.ability:
Order: Boost 4 units in your hand by 1.
Charges: 3

This ability adds 17 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
409.ability_html: Order: Boost 4 units in your hand by 1. Charges: 3 This ability adds 17 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
409.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
409.flavor: Though we are now few and scattered, our hearts burn brighter than ever.

410.name: Shieldwall
410.ability:
Order: Boost an allied unit by 2 and give it a Shield.
Charges: 3

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
410.ability_html: Order: Boost an allied unit by 2 and give it a Shield. Charges: 3 This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
410.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
410.flavor: Her curse was lifted… but her appetite for raw meat remained.

411.name: Rage of the Sea
411.ability:
Order: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 2 turns, and a Deafening Siren on the opposite row.
Charges: 2

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
411.ability_html: Order: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 2 turns, and a Deafening Siren on the opposite row. Charges: 2 This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
411.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
411.flavor: Eist came to Cintra to help Crach an Craite win the hand of Princess Pavetta, yet wound up winning her mother's heart for himself.

412.name: Bone Talisman
412.flavor: The simplest of objects sometimes possess the greatest power.

413.name: Werecat
413.ability:
Thrive.
Deploy: Damage all enemy units on the opposite row by 1.
Deathwish: Repeat the Deploy ability.
413.ability_html: Thrive. Deploy: Damage all enemy units on the opposite row by 1. Deathwish: Repeat the Deploy ability.
413.keyword_html: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
413.flavor: He hates it when you scratch his belly.

414.name: Werewolf
414.ability: Deploy (Predator): Boost self by an enemy unit's power.
414.ability_html: Deploy (Predator): Boost self by an enemy unit's power.
414.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Predator: This ability can only target units with power lower than own.
414.flavor: Some say lycanthropy's contagious - get bit by a werewolf, you turn into one yourself. Witchers know that's nonsense, of course - only a powerful curse can bring on this condition.

415.name: Yennefer's Invocation
415.ability: Move an enemy unit to the top of your deck.
415.ability_html: Move an enemy unit to the top of your deck.
415.flavor: It's best not to get in Yennefer's way. Especially when she's in a hurry.

416.name: Letho: Kingslayer
416.ability: Deploy: Transform into a base copy of a unit without changing power.
416.ability_html: Deploy: Transform into a base copy of a unit without changing power.
416.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
416.flavor: Why does this monk wear studded gloves…?

417.name: Forktail
417.ability: Deploy: Damage all other units by 1.
417.ability_html: Deploy: Damage all other units by 1.
417.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
417.flavor: As for forktails, bait them thusly: pound a stake in the soil, bind a goat to it, then hide ye in nearto shrubbery posthaste.

418.name: Slave Hunter
418.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Increase the damage by 1 for each adjacent Soldier.
If the target is left at 1 power, Spawn a 1-power Locked copy of it to the right of self.
418.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Increase the damage by 1 for each adjacent Soldier. If the target is left at 1 power, Spawn a 1-power Locked copy of it to the right of self.
418.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
418.flavor: The trick is to break their wills - but not their bodies.

419.name: Slave Infantry
419.ability: Deploy: Transform an allied unit into Slave Infantry.
419.ability_html: Deploy: Transform an allied unit into Slave Infantry.
419.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
419.flavor: A free man's got a choice. A slave's choices are made for him.

420.name: Iorveth's Gambit
420.ability: If you have 4 or more Traps in your starting deck, play 2 of them at random. If you have 6 or more Traps in your starting deck, play 2 of your choice instead.
420.ability_html: If you have 4 or more Traps in your starting deck, play 2 of them at random. If you have 6 or more Traps in your starting deck, play 2 of your choice instead.
420.flavor: Iorveth may have only one eye, but his inner vision is unmatched.

421.name: Slave Driver
421.ability: Deploy: Damage a bronze allied unit by 1, then Spawn a 1-power copy of it on this row. If it was a Soldier, Spawn and play the copy instead.
421.ability_html: Deploy: Damage a bronze allied unit by 1, then Spawn a 1-power copy of it on this row. If it was a Soldier, Spawn and play the copy instead.
421.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
