421.flavor: What drives a slave driver? A solitary purpose: to see his orders carried out to the letter.

422.name: Saesenthessis: Blaze
422.ability:
Lineage.
While in hand, deck, or on the battlefield, whenever an enemy unit is destroyed or Banished during your turn, boost self by 1.
422.ability_html: Lineage. While in hand, deck, or on the battlefield, whenever an enemy unit is destroyed or Banished during your turn, boost self by 1.
422.keyword_html: Lineage: At the start of the game, boost self by the number of Dragons in your starting deck. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
422.flavor: I inherited my father's ability to assume other forms - well, one other form, in my case.

423.name: Isengrim's Council
423.ability: Look at a random Dwarf, Dryad, and Elf from your deck, then play one and boost it by 2.
423.ability_html: Look at a random Dwarf, Dryad, and Elf from your deck, then play one and boost it by 2.
423.flavor: Before us lies Elskerdeg Pass, and beyond that, Zerrikania and Hakland. Before us lies a long and dangerous road. If we are to walk it together… let us put aside our mistrust.

424.name: Master of Disguise
424.ability: At the end of your turn, if there is a Locked enemy unit, boost self by 1.
424.ability_html: At the end of your turn, if there is a Locked enemy unit, boost self by 1.
424.keyword_html: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
424.flavor: O Great Sun which dost in Heavens fly, save us from the lice which do so stubbornly infest our bloomers.

425.name: Recruit
425.ability: Order: Play a bronze Soldier from your deck, then shuffle self into your deck.
425.ability_html: Order: Play a bronze Soldier from your deck, then shuffle self into your deck.
425.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
425.flavor: His is not to reason why, his is but… to peel one damned spud after another.

426.name: Seltkirk of Gulet
426.ability_html: Order (Melee): Duel an enemy unit.
426.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Duel: Units take turns dealing damage equal to their power until one of them is destroyed.
426.flavor: Though famed for his many virtues, his indomitable courage first and foremost, Seltkirk was not spared the fate which met all those killed in the Battle of Upper Aedirn.

427.name: Ointment
427.ability: Boost an allied unit by 5. If it was a bronze Soldier, trigger its end of turn ability.
427.ability_html: Boost an allied unit by 5. If it was a bronze Soldier, trigger its end of turn ability.
427.flavor: Will it help? Who knows. Shouldn't do any harm, though. Probably.

428.name: Vandergrift
428.ability_html: Resilience. Shield. Grace 12: Gain Resilience.
428.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit. Grace: The first time this unit's power is equal to or higher than the specified amount, trigger the ability. If the condition is already met when it enters the battlefield, trigger it immediately.
428.flavor: The general thought the war for the Lormark would end quickly, with minimal losses… yet wound up fighting it for all eternity.

429.name: Mad Kiyan
429.ability:
Formation.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by the amount Mad Kiyan is boosted.
Deathblow: Reset own power.
429.ability_html: Formation. Order: Damage an enemy unit by the amount Mad Kiyan is boosted. Deathblow: Reset own power.
429.keyword_html: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
429.flavor: We live on a placid island of ignorance in the midst of black seas of infinity, and it was not meant that we should voyage far.

430.name: Kaedweni Knight
430.ability: When played or Summoned from the deck, boost self by 3.
430.ability_html: When played or Summoned from the deck, boost self by 3.
430.keyword_html: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
430.flavor: Not every man in the Kaedweni Army supports his king's politics. Yet not a single one would dare say that out loud.

431.name: Giant Boar
431.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Boost self by 1 for each damaged unit.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost self by the amount a unit is damaged.
431.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Boost self by 1 for each damaged unit. Deploy (Ranged): Boost self by the amount a unit is damaged.
431.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
431.flavor: Most men, seeing a massive boar in the woods, mess their trousers and scurry up the nearest tree. A Skelliger, though - he just drools.

432.name: Kaedweni Revenant
432.ability:
Order: Damage a unit by 1.
Deathblow: Spawn a base copy of Kaedweni Revenant on this row.
432.ability_html: Order: Damage a unit by 1. Deathblow: Spawn a base copy of Kaedweni Revenant on this row.
432.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
432.flavor: Doomed to repeat the same day over and over again, just like the employees of Cianfanelli Bank.

433.name: Cursed Knight
433.ability: Deploy: Transform an allied unit that is not a Cursed Knight into a Cursed Knight without changing its power.
433.ability_html: Deploy: Transform an allied unit that is not a Cursed Knight into a Cursed Knight without changing its power.
433.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
433.flavor: He fights an endless war whose beginning he no longer remembers.

434.name: Ciri: Nova
434.ability:
Deploy: If your starting deck does not have cards with a provision cost of 10 or more, gain Resilience, Shield, and Veil.
Ciri: Nova and Golden Nekker are excluded from this condition.
434.ability_html: Deploy: If your starting deck does not have cards with a provision cost of 10 or more, gain Resilience, Shield, and Veil. Ciri: Nova and Golden Nekker are excluded from this condition.
434.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit. Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
434.flavor: Zireael possesses a great power she cannot control. She is a danger - to herself, to others. Until she learns to control it, she should remain isolated.

435.name: Shupe's Day Off
435.ability: If your starting deck has no duplicates, send Shupe on an adventure.
435.ability_html: If your starting deck has no duplicates, send Shupe on an adventure.
435.flavor: Shupe is known to have quite the imagination. What other troll would look at scraps of paper and see rocks?

436.name: Forbidden Magic
436.ability:
Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deathblow: Spawn a Kaedweni Revenant on a random allied row.
436.ability_html: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Deathblow: Spawn a Kaedweni Revenant on a random allied row.
436.keyword_html: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
436.flavor: Prohibited? Yes. Eliminated? Far from it.

437.name: Damned Sorceress
437.ability:
Zeal. Order: Remove a unit's Shield, then boost self by 2. 
Cooldown: 1
437.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Remove a unit's Shield, then boost self by 2. Cooldown: 1
437.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
437.flavor: Sabrina's curse spared no one, not even her fellow practitioners.

438.name: Doppler
438.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Choose a unit in your hand, then boost self by the number of units in your hand with the same primary category.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost self by 1 for each unique primary category among units in your hand.
438.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Choose a unit in your hand, then boost self by the number of units in your hand with the same primary category. Deploy (Ranged): Boost self by 1 for each unique primary category among units in your hand.
438.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
438.flavor: Humans despise dopplers so much, they feel mere execution does not suffice - so they tie any they catch to a stake, cover them in thick clay and bake them in a fire.

439.name: Sihil
439.ability:
Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Deathblow: Play a bronze card from your hand, then move Sihil back to your hand.
Initiative: Also increase the damage by 1 for the rest of the game. If the damage was 3, transform into Masterful Sihil instead.
439.ability_html: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Deathblow: Play a bronze card from your hand, then move Sihil back to your hand. Initiative: Also increase the damage by 1 for the rest of the game. If the damage was 3, transform into Masterful Sihil instead.
439.keyword_html: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Initiative: Trigger this ability if you haven't used an Order, Fee or Spring ability this turn.
439.flavor: What's written on this blade? That a curse? No. An insult.

440.name: Bloody Flail
440.ability: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (8). For each Soldier you control, decrease the Bleeding duration by 1 and damage by 1 instead.
440.ability_html: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (8). For each Soldier you control, decrease the Bleeding duration by 1 and damage by 1 instead.
440.keyword_html: Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
440.flavor: There are weapons banned in all the Northern Realms, for the wounds they deal are horrible beyond all imagining.

441.name: Bekker's Rockslide
441.flavor: All it takes is one pebble and we're all done for.

442.name: Glorious Hunt
442.ability: Destroy the unit with the highest base power.
442.ability_html: Destroy the unit with the highest base power.
442.flavor: By the gods' gonads, witcher, why'd you bring me this filth?! I want that beast's head! - that was a ploughin' figure of ploughin' speech!

443.name: Half-Elf Hunter
443.ability:
Harmony.
Deploy: Spawn an Elven Deadeye on this row.
443.ability_html: Harmony. Deploy: Spawn an Elven Deadeye on this row.
443.keyword_html: Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a non-Neutral unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
443.flavor: Hated by men, reviled by elves and always picked last during schoolyard games. No wonder half-elves tend to have a chip on their shoulder.

444.name: Dragon's Dream
444.ability: Spawn Dragon's Dream on an enemy row for 3 turns.
444.ability_html: Spawn Dragon's Dream on an enemy row for 3 turns.
444.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Dragon's Dream: At the start of the owner's turn, when timer expires, damage all units in this row by 3.
444.flavor: In Zerrikania, dragon worship dominates every aspect of daily life. Thus it comes as no surprise they name weapons in their honor.

445.name: Elven Scout
445.ability: Whenever an allied Trap is triggered, boost self by 2.
445.ability_html: Whenever an allied Trap is triggered, boost self by 2.
445.flavor: They say elves leave no tracks in the snow, but if you ask me, they are just a pack of village idiots, babbling nonsense.

446.name: Garrison
446.ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Spawn and play a base copy of a bronze Soldier from your starting deck.
Order: Boost an allied Soldier and all its copies by 1 and give them 1 Armor.
446.ability_html: Resilience. Deploy: Spawn and play a base copy of a bronze Soldier from your starting deck. Order: Boost an allied Soldier and all its copies by 1 and give them 1 Armor.
446.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.

447.name: Yoana
447.ability:
Order: Heal an allied unit by 2.
Charge: 1
Whenever an adjacent unit takes damage, gain 1 Charge.
447.ability_html: Order: Heal an allied unit by 2. Charge: 1 Whenever an adjacent unit takes damage, gain 1 Charge.
447.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
447.flavor: No one'd ever think I could be a skilled armorer - a human, and a woman to boot. A dwarven blacksmith - that's another story…

448.name: Crushing Trap
448.ability:
Ambush (Timer 2): Damage all units on the enemy row with the most units by 2.
Spring: Damage all units on a row by 1.
448.ability_html: Ambush (Timer 2): Damage all units on the enemy row with the most units by 2. Spring: Damage all units on a row by 1.
448.keyword_html: Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met. Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability. Spring: Manual activation of a face-down Trap. Spring is activated automatically on a Trap played next to an Artifact. Cards with Spring are flipped over after use.
448.flavor: When this knocks you down, you don't get up again.

449.name: Derran
449.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Damage self by 3, then move a card from your deck to your graveyard.
449.ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Damage self by 3, then move a card from your deck to your graveyard.
449.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
449.flavor: Whatever caused this madness must have been terrifying…

450.name: Rock Barrage
450.ability: Damage an enemy unit by 4 and move it to the other row.
450.ability_html: Damage an enemy unit by 4 and move it to the other row.
450.flavor: Someday, when you are older, you could get hit by a boulder.

451.name: Vandergrift's Blade
451.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 5.
Deathblow: Store the destroyed unit's base power. The next time you play a unit, boost it by the stored amount, then destroy self.
451.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 5. Deathblow: Store the destroyed unit's base power. The next time you play a unit, boost it by the stored amount, then destroy self.
451.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
451.flavor: Seltkirk shattered Vandergrift's sword during a knights' tourney in Ard Carraigh. Afterwards Vandergrift, enraged at his weapon's failure, ordered a new one forged, this time with powerful runestones enchanted into it.

452.name: Sabrina's Inferno
452.ability: Damage each non-Specter unit by 1. If any were destroyed, repeat this ability once.
452.ability_html: Damage each non-Specter unit by 1. If any were destroyed, repeat this ability once.
452.flavor: With her dying breath, Sabrina Glevissig cast a powerful curse that struck not only her executioners, but all who stood nearby.

453.name: Mahakam Horn
453.ability:
Ambush: When your opponent passes, boost adjacent units by 4.
Spring: Boost adjacent units by 3.
453.ability_html: Ambush: When your opponent passes, boost adjacent units by 4. Spring: Boost adjacent units by 3.
453.keyword_html: Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met. Spring: Manual activation of a face-down Trap. Spring is activated automatically on a Trap played next to an Artifact. Cards with Spring are flipped over after use.
453.flavor: Once upon a time, Mahakam held a horn-blowing contest. That day the dwarves made an important discovery: loud noises and snow-capped peaks do not play well together.

454.name: Mastercrafted Spear
454.ability:
Damage an enemy unit by 6. 
Deathblow: Damage another enemy unit by the excess damage dealt.
454.ability_html: Damage an enemy unit by 6. Deathblow: Damage another enemy unit by the excess damage dealt.
454.keyword_html: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
454.flavor: Hold that spear up, weakling! Not a single horse shall pass!

455.name: Parasite
455.ability: Damage an enemy unit by 6, or boost an allied unit by 6.
455.ability_html: Damage an enemy unit by 6, or boost an allied unit by 6.

456.name: Winch
456.ability: Boost an allied unit by 5 and reduce its Cooldown by 3.
456.ability_html: Boost an allied unit by 5 and reduce its Cooldown by 3.
456.keyword_html: Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
456.flavor: It's a winch. Not much to flap your jaw about.

457.name: Ruehin
457.ability: Deathwish: Summon self from your graveyard to your Melee row and Consume your lowest-power unit, excluding self.
457.ability_html: Deathwish: Summon self from your graveyard to your Melee row and Consume your lowest-power unit, excluding self.
457.keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
457.flavor: No one has ever entered that forest and lived to tell the tale…

458.name: Watchman
458.ability:
Shield.
Order: Give an allied unit a Shield.
458.ability_html: Shield. Order: Give an allied unit a Shield.
458.keyword_html: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
458.flavor: I can't even see over this bloody thing.

459.name: Cadaverine
459.ability: Poison an enemy unit, then Spawn a base copy of it on the opposite row.
459.ability_html: Poison an enemy unit, then Spawn a base copy of it on the opposite row.
459.keyword_html: Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
459.flavor: I don't trust my life to chance. I trust it to a thick coating of Cadaverine on my blade.

460.name: Vrygheff
460.ability: Zeal. Order: Trigger the end of turn abilities of 2 allied bronze Soldiers.
460.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Trigger the end of turn abilities of 2 allied bronze Soldiers.
460.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
460.flavor: An eye for an eye only ends when the whole world's blind.

461.name: Pavko Gale
461.ability:
Harmony.
Order (Ranged): Damage a unit by 1. If you control only non-Neutral units, damage by 2 instead.
Cooldown: 1
461.ability_html: Harmony. Order (Ranged): Damage a unit by 1. If you control only non-Neutral units, damage by 2 instead. Cooldown: 1
461.keyword_html: Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a non-Neutral unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
461.flavor: No one smuggled as much food to the elves of the Blue Mountains as Gale. He'd bring them sacks of turnips and, prized most of all, leeks.

462.name: Paulie Dahlberg
462.ability:
Deploy: Move a unit to the other row.
Order: Give an allied unit 2 Armor.
462.ability_html: Deploy: Move a unit to the other row. Order: Give an allied unit 2 Armor.
462.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
462.flavor: Move yer arses! It's a ploughin' trap!

463.name: Black Blood
463.ability: The next time an enemy receives a boost, destroy that unit and self.
463.ability_html: The next time an enemy receives a boost, destroy that unit and self.
463.flavor: Vampires all agree: use of this potion is bad sportsmanship.

464.name: Ozzrel
464.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Consume a unit from your opponent's graveyard.
Deploy (Ranged): Consume a unit from your graveyard.
464.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Consume a unit from your opponent's graveyard. Deploy (Ranged): Consume a unit from your graveyard.
464.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
464.flavor: Some necrophages have taken such a liking to human flesh, they no longer are content to merely dig up corpses...

465.name: Bridge Troll
465.ability: Deathwish: Boost the lowest-power allied unit by 4.
465.ability_html: Deathwish: Boost the lowest-power allied unit by 4.
465.keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
465.flavor: This here bridge? Trolls built it a long time ago. Sat under it, made folk pay 'em a hefty copper to pass. Thing is, not many folk pass this way. So they all packed up, went their way. Not the bridge, though. It stayed.

466.name: Barbegazi
466.ability:
Order: Consume an allied unit.
Charges: 2
466.ability_html: Order: Consume an allied unit. Charges: 2
466.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
466.flavor: What moments before looked like round rocks among the stalagmites now stared at him with enormous, bright, menacing eyes.

467.name: Scout
467.ability: Deploy: Move a unit to the other row.
467.ability_html: Deploy: Move a unit to the other row.
467.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
467.flavor: If our scouts don't come back, we turn around. The yokels claim these woods are full o' squirrels - and I don't mean the nut-gatherin' kind.

468.name: Gigascorpion Decoction: Condense
468.ability: Damage a unit by 1 six times.
468.ability_html: Damage a unit by 1 six times.
468.flavor: How much of a dose would be lethal? Any.

469.name: Gigascorpion Decoction: Spread
469.ability: Split 6 damage randomly between all units on an enemy row.
469.ability_html: Split 6 damage randomly between all units on an enemy row.
469.flavor: How much of a dose would be lethal? Any.

470.name: Shupe: Mage
470.ability: Send Shupe to the Ban Ard Academy for boys.
470.ability_html: Send Shupe to the Ban Ard Academy for boys.
470.flavor: Shupe is known to have quite the imagination. What other troll would look at holes in the ground and see portals?

471.flavor: Shupe is known to have quite the imagination. What other troll would look at holes in the ground and see portals?

472.flavor: Shupe is known to have quite the imagination. What other troll would look at holes in the ground and see portals?

473.flavor: Shupe is known to have quite the imagination. What other troll would look at holes in the ground and see portals?

482.flavor: Shupe is known to have quite the imagination. What other troll would look at red cardinals and see wyverns?

484.flavor: Shupe is known to have quite the imagination. What other troll would look at red cardinals and see wyverns?

Charges: 5
Whenever you play an Organic card, Spawn a Drone on a random allied row.

489.name: Spores
489.ability: Reset the power of a unit.
489.ability_html: Reset the power of a unit.
489.flavor: Carried by the wind across the Continent... Sowing madness and blight where they fall.

490.name: Foltest's Pride
490.ability:
Resupply.
Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2 and its adjacent units by 1.
Cooldown: 4
Crew: Set the Cooldown to 2.
490.ability_html: Resupply. Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2 and its adjacent units by 1. Cooldown: 4 Crew: Set the Cooldown to 2.
490.keyword_html: Resupply: Whenever you play a Warfare card, reduce this card's Cooldown by 1. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused. Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers.
490.flavor: As King Foltest likes to say, it's not size that counts, but whether it gets the job done.

491.name: Golden Froth
491.flavor: Smell that? That's the smell of happiness.

492.name: Peasant Militia
492.ability: Whenever you play a unit with Deploy, boost self by 1.
492.ability_html: Whenever you play a unit with Deploy, boost self by 1.
492.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
492.flavor: We's the militia. We keep the peace.

493.name: Geralt: Professional
493.ability:
Deploy: Damage 3 units by 1. If you control another Witcher, also gain Zeal.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 3. If its power is a multiple of 3, destroy it instead.
493.ability_html: Deploy: Damage 3 units by 1. If you control another Witcher, also gain Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 3. If its power is a multiple of 3, destroy it instead.
493.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
493.flavor: I accepted a job once, did it. Asked to choose my reward, I invoked the Law of Surprise.

494.name: Triss: Telekinesis
494.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Create and play a bronze special card from either player's starting deck.
494.ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Create and play a bronze special card from either player's starting deck.
494.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
494.flavor: Bindings won't suffice. Nor will a gag render her any less dangerous. No, dimeritium is the only solution.

495.name: Dandelion: Vainglory
495.ability_html: Deploy: Destroy an enemy Beast.
495.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
495.flavor: Dandelion told me all about your adventures. How he'd ready you for battle with his songs, how he tamed the kayran by playin' his lute...

496.name: Dandelion: Poet
496.ability: Deploy: Draw a card, then play a card.
496.ability_html: Deploy: Draw a card, then play a card.
496.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
496.flavor: The quill is mightier than the sword.

497.name: Roche: Merciless
497.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deathblow: Gain Zeal.
Order: Spawn a Blue Stripes Commando on this row.
497.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Deathblow: Gain Zeal. Order: Spawn a Blue Stripes Commando on this row.
497.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
497.flavor: Fear does not befit us. Yet, there is a certain d'hoine... Vernon Roche. Be wary of him.

498.name: Call of the Forest
498.ability: Play a non-Neutral unit from your deck and boost it by 1.
498.ability_html: Play a non-Neutral unit from your deck and boost it by 1.
498.flavor: I hold Brokilon dearer than my own life. She is a mother who cares for her children. I will defend her to my final breath.

499.name: Yennefer: Divination
499.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Reveal a random unit from your deck, then boost an allied unit by its power.
499.ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Reveal a random unit from your deck, then boost an allied unit by its power.
499.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
499.flavor: Yes, I have seen the future. And you're not in it.

500.name: Imlerith
500.ability: Deploy (Melee): Draw a card, then Discard a card. If the Discarded card was a unit, boost self by its power.
500.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Draw a card, then Discard a card. If the Discarded card was a unit, boost self by its power.
500.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
500.flavor: The sisters said you would come. They saw you arrive in the water's surface.

501.name: Ihuarraquax
501.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Each player Summons the highest-provision cost unit from their deck to their Melee row.
Deploy (Ranged): Each player Summons the lowest-provision cost unit from their deck to their Ranged row.
501.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Each player Summons the highest-provision cost unit from their deck to their Melee row. Deploy (Ranged): Each player Summons the lowest-provision cost unit from their deck to their Ranged row.
501.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
501.flavor: Inconceivable. Impossible, Ciri thought, returning to her senses. Unicorns don't exist, not any more, not in this world. Unicorns are extinct.

502.name: Gimpy Gerwin
502.ability: Whenever you play another unit, damage all enemy units with the same provision cost by 1.
502.ability_html: Whenever you play another unit, damage all enemy units with the same provision cost by 1.
502.flavor: Keep the vermin on a short leash. And don't be afraid to use that whip!

503.name: Elf and Onion Soup
503.ability: Destroy 2 allied units of the same border color, then Create and play a unit of the same color from your faction or neutrals.
503.ability_html: Destroy 2 allied units of the same border color, then Create and play a unit of the same color from your faction or neutrals.
503.keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
503.flavor: Garnish each serving with grated cheese. Add eyeballs to taste. Serve hot.

504.name: Ivo of Belhaven
504.ability: Deploy: Boost self by 0. Increase this value for every card you played this round.
504.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 0. Increase this value for every card you played this round.
504.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
504.flavor: It's not reason I'm devoid of, just emotion.

505.name: Eyck of Denesle
505.ability:
Deploy: If you have a Dragon in your hand, gain Zeal.
Order: Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.
505.ability_html: Deploy: If you have a Dragon in your hand, gain Zeal. Order: Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.
505.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
505.flavor: The Good Book says the world is a garden which the gods once conferred upon man. And we men have this garden neglected!

506.name: Gascon
506.ability: While in hand, deck, or on the battlefield, whenever you play the second copy of a Bonded unit this game, boost self by 3.
506.ability_html: While in hand, deck, or on the battlefield, whenever you play the second copy of a Bonded unit this game, boost self by 3.
506.keyword_html: Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
506.flavor: Th' Strays of Spalla – 'tis you who lead them? 'Tis you they call the Duke of Dogs?

507.name: Prince Villem
507.ability:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Play a random gold card from your deck.
507.ability_html: Disloyal. Deploy: Play a random gold card from your deck.
507.keyword_html: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
507.flavor: The boy's not fit to wear the crown. Hasn't sufficient wit nor valor. I know this, you know this… just, he knows it not.

508.name: Count Caldwell
508.ability: At the end of your turn, move this unit to the row with the highest-power unit on the battlefield, excluding self. If it changed sides, gain Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
508.ability_html: At the end of your turn, move this unit to the row with the highest-power unit on the battlefield, excluding self. If it changed sides, gain Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
508.keyword_html: Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
508.flavor: Your Majesty… For the queen to question commoners, why, it's simply not proper…

509.name: Xavier Lemmens
509.ability:
Zeal.
Order (Melee): Banish a card from your opponent's graveyard.
Order (Ranged): Banish a card from your graveyard.
Cooldown: 1
509.ability_html: Zeal. Order (Melee): Banish a card from your opponent's graveyard. Order (Ranged): Banish a card from your graveyard. Cooldown: 1
509.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
509.flavor: Your engineer's got a pate like stewed meat, but he kens his trade, that's for certain.

510.name: Keltullis
510.ability: Melee: At the end of your turn, destroy the lowest-power unit on the side with the most units.
510.ability_html: Melee: At the end of your turn, destroy the lowest-power unit on the side with the most units.
510.keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
510.flavor: When she took roost here, they fought 'er for near a century. Then the dragon got weary o' fightin' and they realized she weren't goin' nowheres, so… they cut a deal. She dinnae bother 'em, they give 'er what she needs.

511.name: Frightener: Awakened
511.keyword_html: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
511.flavor: ”What have I done?” the mage cried out, frightened of his own creation.

512.name: Glustyworp
512.ability: Deploy: Destroy all units with 1 power. For each unit destroyed, boost self by 2.
512.ability_html: Deploy: Destroy all units with 1 power. For each unit destroyed, boost self by 2.
512.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
512.flavor: The swamp underfoot suddenly exploded with a powerful splash. Two long, mantis-like forelimbs bristling with spikes shot out from the murk. The monstrous, green hooks seized an unlucky footman, dragging him beneath the water's surface.

513.name: Gabor Zigrin
513.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Gain Resilience.
Deploy (Ranged): Gain Immunity.
Whenever you play a Dwarf, boost self by 1.
513.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Gain Resilience. Deploy (Ranged): Gain Immunity. Whenever you play a Dwarf, boost self by 1.
513.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
513.flavor: Brouver Hoog wanted to kick him out of Mahakam once for having a llama in his living room… it's a long story.

514.name: Barnabas Beckenbauer
514.ability: Deploy: Boost an allied Elf, Dwarf, and Dryad by 3.
514.ability_html: Deploy: Boost an allied Elf, Dwarf, and Dryad by 3.
514.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
514.flavor: Arrived here with his peddler's wagon full o' tricks an' gadgets. Went from house tae house, praised his rubbish tae the high heavens. An' what's it he sold us? Bombs that go off in yer hand! Beard-growth formula that makes yer hair catch fire!

515.name: Isbel of Hagge
515.ability: Order: (Ranged): If your opponent's hand is not full, look at the top card from both decks. Keep one and give the other to your opponent.
515.ability_html: Order: (Ranged): If your opponent's hand is not full, look at the top card from both decks. Keep one and give the other to your opponent.
515.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
515.flavor: I promised I would never again use magic to harm others.

516.name: Lippy Gudmund
516.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Swap your graveyard with your deck.
516.ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Swap your graveyard with your deck.
516.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
516.flavor: The coast's picked clean since long! So we set our longships up the Yaruga – for gold and glory!

517.name: Dagur Two Blades
517.ability: Melee: Whenever an enemy unit takes damage, boost self by 1.
517.ability_html: Melee: Whenever an enemy unit takes damage, boost self by 1.
517.keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.

518.name: Traheaern var Vdyffir
518.ability: Deploy: Look at the top 3 cards in your opponent's deck and move 1 to their graveyard.
518.ability_html: Deploy: Look at the top 3 cards in your opponent's deck and move 1 to their graveyard.
518.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
518.flavor: The Nilfgaardians proceeded in the queen's very direction without a sign of panic. The man leading the Nilfgaardians was clad in rich robes. He exuded pride... and the scent of musk.

519.name: Reynard Odo
519.ability:
Whenever you play a unit, boost it by 1.
Order (Grace 12): Boost all boosted allied units by 1.
519.ability_html: Whenever you play a unit, boost it by 1. Order (Grace 12): Boost all boosted allied units by 1.
519.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Grace: The first time this unit's power is equal to or higher than the specified amount, trigger the ability. If the condition is already met when it enters the battlefield, trigger it immediately.
519.flavor: Under your husband I served ten years, under you another eight. And never in that time did I fight for a more worthy cause.

520.name: Black Rayla
520.ability:
Order (Melee): Damage a unit by 1.
Inspired: Damage by 2 instead.
Cooldown: 1
520.ability_html: Order (Melee): Damage a unit by 1. Inspired: Damage by 2 instead. Cooldown: 1
520.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
520.flavor: Exceptions are a clear road to human blood spilt. All Scoia'tael must die. Leave the gods to sort the wheat from the chaff.

521.name: Phoenix Hatchling
521.ability:
Doomed.
Zeal. Order: Transform into Phoenix.
521.ability_html: Doomed. Zeal. Order: Transform into Phoenix.
521.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
521.flavor: The chicken is downright primitive when compared the phoenix.

522.name: Deadeye Ambush
522.ability:
Order: Spawn an Elven Deadeye on an allied row.
Charges: 3

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
522.ability_html: Order: Spawn an Elven Deadeye on an allied row. Charges: 3 This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
522.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
522.flavor: The king once dispatched an envoy to Eldain… despite my advice to the contrary. Found the envoy the next day, eyes gouged out, shaft of his white flag jammed down his throat.

523.name: Royal Inspiration
523.ability:
Order: Boost an allied unit by 5.
If it triggered an allied unit's Grace ability, refresh the Order and reduce the boost by 1.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
523.ability_html: Order: Boost an allied unit by 5. If it triggered an allied unit's Grace ability, refresh the Order and reduce the boost by 1. This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
523.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Grace: The first time this unit's power is equal to or higher than the specified amount, trigger the ability. If the condition is already met when it enters the battlefield, trigger it immediately.
523.flavor: We're at war, when rulers don't strive nor choose. When rulers grasp sword and shield and ride out to defend their subjects.

524.name: Fruits of Ysgith
524.ability:
Order: Spawn a Gernichora's Fruit on an allied row. 
At the start of your turn, if you do not control any Gernichora's Fruits, reset this ability.

This ability adds 14 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
524.ability_html: Order: Spawn a Gernichora's Fruit on an allied row. At the start of your turn, if you do not control any Gernichora's Fruits, reset this ability. This ability adds 14 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
524.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
524.flavor: Frescoes on the tomb walls depicted Angren's swamps and the beasts that prowled them. Two words were inscribed over the largest of the horrors: Gvaern Ichaer – the Bloody Mistress.

525.name: Enslave
525.ability:
Order: Seize an enemy unit with 3 power or less. 
This value is raised by 1 for every 4 Tactic cards in your starting deck.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
525.ability_html: Order: Seize an enemy unit with 3 power or less. This value is raised by 1 for every 4 Tactic cards in your starting deck. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
525.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
525.flavor: In my home, in the civilized world, a general commands his force. He does not rush and thrash about like some rabid hound.

526.name: Patricidal Fury
526.ability:
Order: Spawn a Deafening Siren on an enemy row and damage it by 1.
Charges: 3
Once all Charges are used up, Spawn and play Arnjolf the Patricide.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
526.ability_html: Order: Spawn a Deafening Siren on an enemy row and damage it by 1. Charges: 3 Once all Charges are used up, Spawn and play Arnjolf the Patricide. This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
526.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
526.flavor: We're after killin'. Nilfgaardians, Lyrians... 's all the same to us. Strife an' blood an' guts to wash away our shame.

527.name: Strays of Spalla
527.ability:
Deploy: Shuffle a gold card from your hand into your deck, then draw a bronze card and boost self by 4.
Bonded: Boost self by 4 instead.
527.ability_html: Deploy: Shuffle a gold card from your hand into your deck, then draw a bronze card and boost self by 4. Bonded: Boost self by 4 instead.
527.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.

528.name: Bomb Heaver
528.ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. If you have a Bomb in your hand, damage by 3 instead.
528.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. If you have a Bomb in your hand, damage by 3 instead.
528.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
528.flavor: Knew a young couple once—got separated right after the weddin'. Bomb in the carriage'll do that.

529.name: Tactical Advantage
529.ability: Order: Boost an allied unit by 5.
529.ability_html: Order: Boost an allied unit by 5.
529.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
529.flavor: Remember, cadets! He who first draws his blade has the advantage over his foe!

530.name: Stockpile
530.ability:
Order: Spawn a Volunteer on an allied row, then reduce the Cooldown of each non-Neutral unit on that row by 1.
Charges: 3

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
530.ability_html: Order: Spawn a Volunteer on an allied row, then reduce the Cooldown of each non-Neutral unit on that row by 1. Charges: 3 This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
530.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
530.flavor: My king enjoys life... enjoys pleasures and indulges often. But none of this has hindered his ability to govern the realm bloody well.

531.name: Angoulême
531.ability: Deploy: Create and play an artifact from your opponent's starting deck. If your opponent has no artifact in their starting deck, boost self by 6 instead.
531.ability_html: Deploy: Create and play an artifact from your opponent's starting deck. If your opponent has no artifact in their starting deck, boost self by 6 instead.
531.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
531.flavor: Don't matter if it crawls, slithers, climbs—you name it, I've eaten it. As for things that fly... I once ate a kite just 'cause it had flour stuck to it.

532.name: Vysogota of Corvo
532.ability:
Zeal. Order (Ranged): Boost a unit by 1. 
Charge: 1
Whenever either player plays a card, gain 1 Charge.
532.ability_html: Zeal. Order (Ranged): Boost a unit by 1. Charge: 1 Whenever either player plays a card, gain 1 Charge.
532.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
532.flavor: It's been near half a century since I last practiced medicine. The years haven't been kind to my memory... Nor the dexterity of my fingers.

533.name: Falibor
533.ability: Whenever this unit receives a boost, damage a random enemy unit by the same amount.
533.ability_html: Whenever this unit receives a boost, damage a random enemy unit by the same amount.
533.flavor: From afar, he looks like a bear. From up close, well... A larger bear.

534.name: Anna Strenger
534.ability:
At the end of your turn, boost the unit to the right by 1.
Inspired: Boost adjacent units by 1 instead.
534.ability_html: At the end of your turn, boost the unit to the right by 1. Inspired: Boost adjacent units by 1 instead.
534.keyword_html: Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
534.flavor: Anna hated her husband so much that she was ready to do anything in order to be free of the man — and the child he had put inside her.

535.name: Lyrian Cavalry
535.ability: Whenever you play a unit with Orders, boost self by 1.
535.ability_html: Whenever you play a unit with Orders, boost self by 1.
535.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
535.flavor: A horseman's worth no less than his steed. And Lyrian horses are among the Continent's best.

536.name: Rivian Pikeman
536.ability:
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deathblow: Reduce the Cooldown of each unit on this row by 1.
Inspired: Always trigger the Deathblow ability.
536.ability_html: Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Deathblow: Reduce the Cooldown of each unit on this row by 1. Inspired: Always trigger the Deathblow ability.
536.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused. Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
536.flavor: Get off your high horse and face me!

537.name: Lyrian Arbalest
537.ability:
Order: Damage a unit by 1. 
Charge: 1
Whenever you play a card with an Order, gain 1 Charge .
537.ability_html: Order: Damage a unit by 1. Charge: 1 Whenever you play a card with an Order, gain 1 Charge .
537.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
537.flavor: I can find the bull's-eye from a hundred paces! Perhaps not with my first shot, mind you...

538.name: Lyrian Landsknecht
538.ability:
Formation.
Order: Damage a unit by 1.
Inspired: Damage by 3 instead.
538.ability_html: Formation. Order: Damage a unit by 1. Inspired: Damage by 3 instead.
538.keyword_html: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
538.flavor: Best not laugh at their silly-arse hats. Believe me.

539.name: Lyrian Scytheman
539.ability: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each boosted unit on this row.
539.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each boosted unit on this row.
539.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
539.flavor: Our folk they feed, and our foes they bleed.

540.name: Deafening Siren
540.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
540.flavor: Easy, mates! Sirens never attack when... Huh? What d'yous mean Right above me?

541.name: Arnjolf the Patricide
541.ability:
Doomed.
Deploy: Spawn a Deafening Siren on the opposite row and damage it by 1.
541.ability_html: Doomed. Deploy: Spawn a Deafening Siren on the opposite row and damage it by 1.
541.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
541.flavor: Only death can cleanse me o' shame.

542.name: Gernichora's Fruit
542.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
542.flavor: Gernichora's a little like a vampire, they're kindred creatures. 'Cept instead of feasting on the blood of others, she feeds them her own.

543.name: Elven Deadeye
543.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
543.flavor: One, two, come into view; Three, four, hide 'hind the door; Five, six, this'll be quick; Seven, eight, come meet your fate!

544.name: Blood Scent
544.ability:
Order: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (3).
Charges: 3
Once all Charges are used up, Spawn an Ekimmara on a random allied row.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
544.ability_html: Order: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (3). Charges: 3 Once all Charges are used up, Spawn an Ekimmara on a random allied row. This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
544.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
544.flavor: He did not love like a man, but like an animal. Madly, deeply, unconditionally. Wildly.

545.name: Double Cross
545.ability:
Order: Create and play a card from your opponent's hand.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
545.ability_html: Order: Create and play a card from your opponent's hand. This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
545.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
545.flavor: As head of state, I must judge her fairly. But she is my sister, thus my heart bleeds for her…

546.name: Pincer Maneuver
546.ability:
Order: Draw a non-Neutral card of your choice, then shuffle a card from your hand back into the deck and Spawn a Volunteer on your Melee row.
Charges: 2

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
546.ability_html: Order: Draw a non-Neutral card of your choice, then shuffle a card from your hand back into the deck and Spawn a Volunteer on your Melee row. Charges: 2 This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
546.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
546.flavor: They call her the Lioness of Cintra. And not without good reason.

547.name: Call of Harmony
547.ability:
Order: Spawn and play Dana Méadbh.

This ability adds 17 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
547.ability_html: Order: Spawn and play Dana Méadbh. This ability adds 17 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
547.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
547.flavor: She revealeth herself as the Fairhaired Ladie, in flowers all, and all that liveth followeth her path and clingeth to her, as one, plant or beast.

548.name: Ursine Ritual
548.ability:
Order: Damage an allied unit by 1.
Charges: 5
Once all Charges are used up, Spawn a Bear Abomination on a random allied row.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
548.ability_html: Order: Damage an allied unit by 1. Charges: 5 Once all Charges are used up, Spawn a Bear Abomination on a random allied row. This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
548.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
548.flavor: He proclaimed to his worshippers but one commandment: Kill.

549.name: Crimson Curse
549.ability: Spawn Blood Moon on an enemy row for 5 turns, then Spawn 2 Ekimmaras on the opposite row.
549.ability_html: Spawn Blood Moon on an enemy row for 5 turns, then Spawn 2 Ekimmaras on the opposite row.
549.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Blood Moon: At the start of the owner's turn, give a random unit in this row Bleeding (2). If the unit is already Bleeding, damage it by 2 instead.
549.flavor: When the moon burns red, latch the door and put your lambs to bed...

550.name: Tesham Mutna Sword
550.ability: Damage an enemy unit by 5. Repeat once for each status it has.
550.ability_html: Damage an enemy unit by 5. Repeat once for each status it has.
550.flavor: Millenia have passed, but its thirst for blood has not.

551.name: Hen Gaidth Sword
551.ability:
Echo.
Damage an enemy unit by 5, then Spawn and play a base copy of the stored unit and give it Doomed.
Deathblow: Banish the unit and store its soul in the Hen Gaidth Sword.
551.ability_html: Echo. Damage an enemy unit by 5, then Spawn and play a base copy of the stored unit and give it Doomed. Deathblow: Banish the unit and store its soul in the Hen Gaidth Sword.
551.keyword_html: Echo: At the beginning of the round, move this card from the graveyard to the top of its owner's deck. Give it Doomed. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
551.flavor: Legend tells that wounds carved from this blade never heal. Blood shall flow until not a drop remains...

552.name: Land of a Thousand Fables
552.ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Play a special card from your deck.
Order: Transform a special card in your hand into a random unit of the same provision cost from the same faction.
552.ability_html: Resilience. Deploy: Play a special card from your deck. Order: Transform a special card in your hand into a random unit of the same provision cost from the same faction.
552.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
552.flavor: The girls told me if I ever wished to visit alone, I need but crack open The Land of a Thousand Fables and utter out loud the incantation Expecto ludum!

553.name: Syanna
553.ability: Order: Repeat the Deploy ability of the next unit you play during this turn.
553.ability_html: Order: Repeat the Deploy ability of the next unit you play during this turn.
553.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
553.flavor: Your Majesty... The princess has been touched by the curse o' the Black Sun. There's no hope, I'm afraid...

554.name: Regis: Bloodlust
554.ability:
When you lose a round while this card is:
On the battlefield or in your graveyard - Banish the top 3 cards from your deck.
In your hand or deck - Banish self.
554.ability_html: When you lose a round while this card is: On the battlefield or in your graveyard - Banish the top 3 cards from your deck. In your hand or deck - Banish self.
554.keyword_html: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
554.flavor: I've been called a monster, a bloodthirsty freak. Among other, shall we say, more colorful names.

555.name: Lady of the Lake
555.ability: Deploy: Play an Echo card from your deck.
555.ability_html: Deploy: Play an Echo card from your deck.
555.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Echo: At the beginning of the round, move this card from the graveyard to the top of its owner's deck. Give it Doomed.
555.flavor: Take this sword as a sign of my favor. For centuries it lay in these depths, waiting... for you.

556.name: Fisher King
556.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Move any card from your deck to the top.
556.ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Move any card from your deck to the top.
556.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.

557.name: Vivienne: Oriole
557.ability: Deploy: Boost self by the provision cost of the card to the right of self.
557.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by the provision cost of the card to the right of self.
557.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
557.flavor: Who'd not like to live free as a bird? Well, just ask Vivienne de Tabris.

558.name: Gregoire de Gorgon
558.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Deathblow: Boost self by 8 and gain a Shield.
558.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 1. Deathblow: Boost self by 8 and gain a Shield.
558.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
558.flavor: Gregoire? That mountain o' muscle wrapped in armor? Course, I 'eard of 'im! Who hasn't?

559.name: Musicians of Blaviken
559.ability: If you have no other 4-provision cost cards in your starting deck, start on your Ranged row.
559.ability_html: If you have no other 4-provision cost cards in your starting deck, start on your Ranged row.
559.keyword_html: Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.

560.name: Portal
560.ability:
Deploy: Summon a random 4-provision cost unit from your deck to the left of this card.
Timer 3: Summon a random 4-provision cost unit from your deck to the right of this card.
560.ability_html: Deploy: Summon a random 4-provision cost unit from your deck to the left of this card. Timer 3: Summon a random 4-provision cost unit from your deck to the right of this card.
560.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability.
560.flavor: Some value them highly. Others hate them.

561.name: Sangreal
561.ability: Purify and boost a unit by 12, then Infuse it with "Once both players have passed, damage self by 12".
561.ability_html: Purify and boost a unit by 12, then Infuse it with "Once both players have passed, damage self by 12".
561.keyword_html: Purify: Remove all statuses. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities.
561.flavor: It is the duchess's exclusive privilege to delight in the prized, oaky flavor of Sangreal... A pleasure she partakes in very, very often.

562.name: Tempest
562.ability: Play all copies of Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog, or Torrential Rain from your deck.
562.ability_html: Play all copies of Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog, or Torrential Rain from your deck.
562.flavor: A Category 10 on the Bekker scale.

563.name: Curse of Corruption
563.flavor: Black magic – the grislier the better.

564.name: Sandstorm
564.ability: Damage units at both ends of an enemy row by 3.
564.ability_html: Damage units at both ends of an enemy row by 3.
564.flavor: Best case – sand in your teeth. Worst case – buried alive.

565.name: Dancing Star
565.ability:
Damage an enemy unit by 3.
Deathblow: Damage the unit to the right by 1 less.
565.ability_html: Damage an enemy unit by 3. Deathblow: Damage the unit to the right by 1 less.
565.keyword_html: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
565.flavor: A spectacular sight – until it explodes in your face.

566.name: Devil's Puffball
566.ability:
Damage an enemy unit by 3.
Deathblow: Poison adjacent enemy units.
566.ability_html: Damage an enemy unit by 3. Deathblow: Poison adjacent enemy units.
566.keyword_html: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
566.flavor: As lethal as it is foul.

567.name: Northern Wind
567.ability:
Damage a unit by 4.
Deathblow: Banish it.
567.ability_html: Damage a unit by 4. Deathblow: Banish it.
567.keyword_html: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
567.flavor: That ought to cool your temper.

568.name: Moon Dust
568.ability: Purify a unit and damage it by 4.
568.ability_html: Purify a unit and damage it by 4.
568.flavor: The werewolf lifted and tilted his head, mystified by the silvery dust... Then howled in utter agony.

569.name: Samum
569.ability:
Damage a unit by 3.
Deathblow: Move the adjacent units to the other row.
569.ability_html: Damage a unit by 3. Deathblow: Move the adjacent units to the other row.
569.keyword_html: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
569.flavor: Zerrikanian alchemists have learned to harness the energy of hot desert storms and bind it into an arcane mixture.

570.name: Red Haze
570.ability: Choose an enemy unit, then damage one adjacent enemy unit by its power.
570.ability_html: Choose an enemy unit, then damage one adjacent enemy unit by its power.
570.flavor: Perhaps the most insidious invention of Zerrikanian alchemists. And there's no shortage to choose from.

571.name: Inspirational Ballad
571.ability: Give Vitality (6) to a random allied Witcher, Dwarf, Human, and Vampire.
571.ability_html: Give Vitality (6) to a random allied Witcher, Dwarf, Human, and Vampire.
571.keyword_html: Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
571.flavor: War's not so horrific when you put a catchy tune to it.

572.name: Thaw
572.ability: Boost an allied unit by 5 and give it Veil.
572.ability_html: Boost an allied unit by 5 and give it Veil.
572.keyword_html: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
572.flavor: It heralds the coming of spring... Which, in turn, heralds the coming of war.

573.name: Traveling Merchant
573.ability: Deploy (Ranged): Shuffle a card from your hand into your deck, then draw a card.
573.ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Shuffle a card from your hand into your deck, then draw a card.
573.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
573.flavor: Florens, orens, crowns – I accept them all!

574.name: Pellar
574.ability_html: Deploy: Purify a unit.
574.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Purify: Remove all statuses.
574.flavor:
Gather spirits for this wake,
A passing soul ne'er forsake,
Hear my call, my humble plea,
Unbind his chains, set him free.

575.name: Cutthroat
575.ability:
Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with 2 or less power.
Bonded: Destroy an enemy unit with 4 or less power instead.
575.ability_html: Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with 2 or less power. Bonded: Destroy an enemy unit with 4 or less power instead.
575.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
575.flavor: Ahhh, nothin' so soothin' as the sound o' gurglin' blood.

576.name: Oxenfurt Scholar
576.ability: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each card with a provision cost of 11 or higher in your starting deck.
576.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each card with a provision cost of 11 or higher in your starting deck.
576.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
576.flavor: Balderdash! Your blatant obfuscation of teleological and ontological axioms is an embarrassment to the field! Ostentatious verbiage for its own sake!

577.name: Spring Equinox
577.ability:
Doomed.
Boost an allied unit by 0. Increase the boost by 1 for each Nature card other than Spring Equinox in your starting deck.
577.ability_html: Doomed. Boost an allied unit by 0. Increase the boost by 1 for each Nature card other than Spring Equinox in your starting deck.
577.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
577.flavor: The days grow longer and the dresses of maidens grow shorter.

578.name: Scepter of Storms
578.ability:
Deploy: Spawn and play Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog, or Torrential Rain.
Order: Increase the row effect duration on an enemy row by 1 turn.
578.ability_html: Deploy: Spawn and play Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog, or Torrential Rain. Order: Increase the row effect duration on an enemy row by 1 turn.
578.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
578.flavor: Some call it the Stick of Truth.

579.name: Queen of the Night
579.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Give an enemy unit Bleeding (3).
Deploy (Ranged): Purify a unit.
579.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Give an enemy unit Bleeding (3). Deploy (Ranged): Purify a unit.
579.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Purify: Remove all statuses.
579.flavor: Those seduced by her charms find themselves willing to pay any price.

580.name: Orianna
580.ability:
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding equal to the number of allied Vampires.
Ranged: At the end of your turn, boost self by the number of Bleeding enemy units.
580.ability_html: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding equal to the number of allied Vampires. Ranged: At the end of your turn, boost self by the number of Bleeding enemy units.
580.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
580.flavor: Lady Orianna's been a blessin' for us... She 'elps the beggarly, supports the arts – why, she even runs a home for them poor orphans!

581.name: Protofleder
581.ability: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (3), then boost self by the amount of Bleeding on that unit.
581.ability_html: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (3), then boost self by the amount of Bleeding on that unit.
581.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
581.flavor: Limited to only one region of the Continent, scholars consider them critically endangered. Gods be praised...

582.name: Garkain
582.ability: At the end of your turn, if there is a Bleeding enemy unit, boost self by 1.
582.ability_html: At the end of your turn, if there is a Bleeding enemy unit, boost self by 1.
582.keyword_html: Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
582.flavor: Blood on the ceiling, entrails on the wall... Got garkain written all over it.

583.name: Gael
583.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 1. If it's Bleeding deal 3 damage instead.
Deathblow: Boost self by the destroyed unit's base power.
583.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 1. If it's Bleeding deal 3 damage instead. Deathblow: Boost self by the destroyed unit's base power.
583.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor. Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
583.flavor: A fondness for shiny trinkets is not a trait unique to magpies.

584.name: Undying Thirst
584.ability_html: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (6).
584.keyword_html: Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
584.flavor: Some appetites can never be sated.

585.name: Feast of Blood
585.ability: Purify an enemy unit and damage it by 3. If you control a Vampire, also give it Bleeding (3).
585.ability_html: Purify an enemy unit and damage it by 3. If you control a Vampire, also give it Bleeding (3).
585.keyword_html: Purify: Remove all statuses. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
585.flavor: Vampires have been known to fast for years at a time. Yet once the hunt resumes, they feed and feed until frenzied and drunk on blood.

586.name: Fleder
586.ability:
When Bleeding is applied to an enemy unit, boost self by the amount applied.
Counter: 1
At the start of your turn, refresh the Counter.
586.ability_html: When Bleeding is applied to an enemy unit, boost self by the amount applied. Counter: 1 At the start of your turn, refresh the Counter.
586.keyword_html: Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
586.flavor: The children o' the night come as punishment from the gods! We's tolerated wizard-folk and non-human filth in our midst too long! Repent! 'Fore yer soul rots, repent!

587.name: Alp
587.ability:
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (3).
Order: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (3).
587.ability_html: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (3). Order: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (3).
587.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
587.flavor: The townsfolk, long plagued with horrific nightmares, posted a desperate plea for help... Hmm. An alp, gotta be, the witcher grumbled to himself.

588.name: Plumard
588.ability:
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (2).
Bonded: Give an enemy unit Bleeding equal to its base power instead.
588.ability_html: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (2). Bonded: Give an enemy unit Bleeding equal to its base power instead.
588.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
588.flavor: One alone poses no great threat. But a dozen? Gods be with you.

589.name: Nekurat
589.ability:
Zeal. Order (Melee): Give an enemy unit Bleeding (2).
Cooldown: 2
Whenever you play a Vampire, reduce the Cooldown by 1.
589.ability_html: Zeal. Order (Melee): Give an enemy unit Bleeding (2). Cooldown: 2 Whenever you play a Vampire, reduce the Cooldown by 1.
589.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
