1124.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Conspiracy: Trigger this ability if target unit has Spying status. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
1124.flavor: Hell hath no fury like a sorceress scorned.

1125.name: Melusine
1125.ability:
Deploy: Gain Veil.
Order: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 2 turns, then damage self by 2.
At the end of your turn, damage adjacent units by 1, then gain 1 base power for each unit damaged. If any unit damaged was a Cultist, refresh this Order.
1125.ability_html: Deploy: Gain Veil. Order: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 2 turns, then damage self by 2. At the end of your turn, damage adjacent units by 1, then gain 1 base power for each unit damaged. If any unit damaged was a Cultist, refresh this Order.
1125.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
1125.flavor: The Lady sits on her throne, devouring our offerings and demanding more. Yet, She does not try to rule over us in any particular way, so She is actually better than any jarl.

1126.name: Offering to the Sea
1126.ability: Damage all units on the battlefield by 1, then Spawn a Deafening Siren on a random allied row and boost it by the number of allied targets.
1126.ability_html: Damage all units on the battlefield by 1, then Spawn a Deafening Siren on a random allied row and boost it by the number of allied targets.
1126.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1126.flavor: Cultists proclaim that the maidens are offered to the sea, not eaten by its monsters. Yet, for the latter, the semantics makes no difference.

1127.name: Havfrue Singer
1127.ability:
Deploy: Heal an allied unit by 2.
The first time you Heal an allied unit during your turn, Spawn a Deafening Siren on this row.
1127.ability_html: Deploy: Heal an allied unit by 2. The first time you Heal an allied unit during your turn, Spawn a Deafening Siren on this row.
1127.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1127.flavor: No human can match sirens in singing. Some, however, are talented enough to compel sirens to listen.

1128.name: Hermit
1128.ability:
Deploy: Damage self by 4.
Berserk 6: At the end of your turn, damage the unit to the right by 1, then Heal self by 2.
1128.ability_html: Deploy: Damage self by 4. Berserk 6: At the end of your turn, damage the unit to the right by 1, then Heal self by 2.
1128.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
1128.flavor: Oh, good Lady, bless your faithful servant with a fat flounder.

1129.name: Simlas Finn aep Dabairr
1129.ability: Deploy: Play all copies of a bronze special card from your deck.
1129.ability_html: Deploy: Play all copies of a bronze special card from your deck.
1129.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1129.flavor: I am a Sage. Naturally I know more than you do.

1130.name: Saov Ainmhi'dh
1130.ability: Boost an allied unit by 5. When this card enters your graveyard, transform self into Saov Ainmhi'dh: Unity.
1130.ability_html: Boost an allied unit by 5. When this card enters your graveyard, transform self into Saov Ainmhi'dh: Unity.
1130.flavor: Expecto pa⁠— No, wait. That’s not right.

1131.name: Orb of Insight
1131.ability:
Boost an allied unit by 2 and give it Vitality (2).
While in your graveyard, lower the Counter by 1 whenever you play a special card. When the Counter reaches 0, play this card and give it Doomed.
Counter: 3
1131.ability_html: Boost an allied unit by 2 and give it Vitality (2). While in your graveyard, lower the Counter by 1 whenever you play a special card. When the Counter reaches 0, play this card and give it Doomed. Counter: 3
1131.keyword_html: Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
1131.flavor: It shows only one of many possible futures.

1132.name: Elven Seer
1132.ability:
When you target this unit with a bronze special card, Spawn and play a copy of that special card.
Counter: 1
1132.ability_html: When you target this unit with a bronze special card, Spawn and play a copy of that special card. Counter: 1
1132.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1132.flavor: I predict a bad future for your race, dh’oine.

1133.name: Tissaia de Vries
1133.ability: Deploy: At the end of this turn, reset the Order of all allied Mages that used their Order during this turn.
1133.ability_html: Deploy: At the end of this turn, reset the Order of all allied Mages that used their Order during this turn.
1133.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1133.flavor: “They will not enter here. No one invited those royalist lackeys, who carry out the orders of their short-sighted kings!” - Tissaia de Vries

1134.name: Leticia Charbonneau
1134.ability:
Patience.
Order (Ranged): At the end of this turn, the Patience value of allied units is increased by [1] instead.
1134.ability_html: Patience. Order (Ranged): At the end of this turn, the Patience value of allied units is increased by [1] instead.
1134.keyword_html: Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, increase the card's specified value by 1 for the rest of the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
1134.flavor: “You cannot control what the world throws at you, but you can decide on how to react.” - Leticia Charbonneau

1135.name: Practice Makes Perfect
1135.ability:
Shuffle an allied bronze Mage back into your deck, then play a random bronze Mage from your deck and boost it by 0.
Increase the boost by 1 for each unit with Patience you played this game.
1135.ability_html: Shuffle an allied bronze Mage back into your deck, then play a random bronze Mage from your deck and boost it by 0. Increase the boost by 1 for each unit with Patience you played this game.
1135.keyword_html: Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, increase the card's specified value by 1 for the rest of the game.
1135.flavor: A lesson a day keeps mediocrity away.

1136.name: Aretuza Student
1136.ability:
Patience (Ranged).
Order (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by [0].
1136.ability_html: Patience (Ranged). Order (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by [0].
1136.keyword_html: Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, increase the card's specified value by 1 for the rest of the game. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1136.flavor: Knowledge beyond measure is a sorceress’s greatest treasure.

1137.name: Bloody Mistress
1137.ability: Sabbath: At the end of your turn, Spawn a Gernichora's Fruit on each sides of this unit and transform self into Gernichora without changing power.
1137.ability_html: Sabbath: At the end of your turn, Spawn a Gernichora's Fruit on each sides of this unit and transform self into Gernichora without changing power.
1137.keyword_html: Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1137.flavor: Once the effigy is on a tree, even the most virtuous of souls will find themselves inexplicably drawn toward her domain.

1138.name: Gernichora
1138.ability:
At the end of your turn, transform self into Bloody Mistress without changing power.
Sabbath: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1 for each allied Gernichora's Fruit instead.
1138.ability_html: At the end of your turn, transform self into Bloody Mistress without changing power. Sabbath: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1 for each allied Gernichora's Fruit instead.
1138.keyword_html: Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points.
1138.flavor: In Ysgith, the blood of Gernichora weaves the webs.

1139.name: Mammuna
1139.ability:
Zeal. Order: Banish a bronze unit from your graveyard and boost self by its power, then Summon a copy of it from your deck to this row.
Sabbath: Play the copy instead.
1139.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Banish a bronze unit from your graveyard and boost self by its power, then Summon a copy of it from your deck to this row. Sabbath: Play the copy instead.
1139.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points.

1140.name: Selfeater
1140.ability:
Order: Halve this unit's base power, then Spawn a copy with the same base power on this row.
Whenever you play a Relict, increase this unit's base power by 1.
1140.ability_html: Order: Halve this unit's base power, then Spawn a copy with the same base power on this row. Whenever you play a Relict, increase this unit's base power by 1.
1140.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.

1141.name: Bleeding Effigy
1141.ability: Banish a bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard, then boost an allied unit by its power. If you control Bloody Mistress or Gernichora, you may also target gold units.
1141.ability_html: Banish a bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard, then boost an allied unit by its power. If you control Bloody Mistress or Gernichora, you may also target gold units.
1141.keyword_html: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
1141.flavor: A drop of blood, a hair from the head, a fragment of a nail…

1142.name: The Scoundrel
1142.ability:
Deploy: Summon the top bronze unit from your opponent's deck to the opposite row, then place a Bounty on it.
Tribute 2: Choose a bronze unit to Summon instead, then place a Bounty on it.
Fee 1: Damage the enemy unit with a Bounty by 1.
1142.ability_html: Deploy: Summon the top bronze unit from your opponent's deck to the opposite row, then place a Bounty on it. Tribute 2: Choose a bronze unit to Summon instead, then place a Bounty on it. Fee 1: Damage the enemy unit with a Bounty by 1.
1142.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time. Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability. Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
1142.flavor: There have been sightings of a slender, sinister-looking man slipping in and out of shadow⁠. The Hales must be in town.

1143.name: Ignatius Hale
1143.ability:
At the start of the game, or when Spawned, set own power to 1.
While in hand, deck, or on the battlefield, whenever an enemy unit with a Bounty is destroyed, Heal self by its base power.
1143.ability_html: At the start of the game, or when Spawned, set own power to 1. While in hand, deck, or on the battlefield, whenever an enemy unit with a Bounty is destroyed, Heal self by its base power.
1143.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.

1144.name: Confession Extractor
1144.ability:
Profit 4.
While in your graveyard, damage an enemy unit by 1 whenever you place a Bounty on it.
Counter: 3
1144.ability_html: Profit 4. While in your graveyard, damage an enemy unit by 1 whenever you place a Bounty on it. Counter: 3
1144.keyword_html: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
1144.flavor: Whether they spit lies or cry truths, it matters not⁠—the Extractor always gets its confession.

1145.name: Scapegoat
1145.ability:
Disloyal.
Profit 7.
Deploy: Place a Bounty on self.
1145.ability_html: Disloyal. Profit 7. Deploy: Place a Bounty on self.
1145.keyword_html: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
1145.flavor: Fact often gives way to fiction.

1146.name: Bearification
1146.ability: Transform an artifact into an Elder Bear. If it's on your side of the battlefield, also boost it by 4.
1146.ability_html: Transform an artifact into an Elder Bear. If it's on your side of the battlefield, also boost it by 4.

1147.name: Dwimveandra
1147.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Set an allied Scenario to the final chapter.
Deploy (Ranged): Refresh the Order of an allied Location.
1147.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Set an allied Scenario to the final chapter. Deploy (Ranged): Refresh the Order of an allied Location.
1147.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1147.flavor: There are those who stay at home and those who leave.

1148.name: Saov Ainmhi'dh: Unity
1148.ability:
While in your graveyard, remove a Counter whenever you play a special card. When the Counter reaches 0, Summon self from your graveyard to your Ranged row.
Counter: 2
1148.ability_html: While in your graveyard, remove a Counter whenever you play a special card. When the Counter reaches 0, Summon self from your graveyard to your Ranged row. Counter: 2
1148.keyword_html: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
1148.flavor: Expecto pa⁠— No, wait. That’s not right.

1149.name: Vilgefortz: Renegade
1149.ability: Deploy: Swap a card from your opponent's graveyard with a card in your hand.
1149.ability_html: Deploy: Swap a card from your opponent's graveyard with a card in your hand.
1149.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1149.flavor: Four times, Geralt struck. To the temple, to the neck, under the arm, to the thigh. Each blow should have been fatal. Yet each was parried by the mage.

1150.name: Lydia van Bredevoort
1150.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Create and play a bronze special card from your opponent's faction.
Deploy (Ranged): Play a bronze special card from your opponent's graveyard.
1150.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Create and play a bronze special card from your opponent's faction. Deploy (Ranged): Play a bronze special card from your opponent's graveyard.
1150.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
1150.flavor: Whether by brush or by sorcery, there was no event, emotion, or scene beyond Lydia's power to depict. Apart from joy.

1151.name: Imperial Practitioner
1151.ability:
Assimilate.
Order: Spawn a base copy of the last card that went to your opponent's graveyard on top of your deck.
1151.ability_html: Assimilate. Order: Spawn a base copy of the last card that went to your opponent's graveyard on top of your deck.
1151.keyword_html: Assimilate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a card that is not from your starting deck. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1151.flavor: The body is a slab of wet clay. One need only use the correct tools to shape it into something... more.

1152.name: Illusionist
1152.ability:
Deploy: Spawn a base copy of a bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard to the right of self and set its power to 1.
Bonded: Don't set its power to 1.
1152.ability_html: Deploy: Spawn a base copy of a bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard to the right of self and set its power to 1. Bonded: Don't set its power to 1.
1152.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
1152.flavor: “When you are few, make them believe you are many. If they still attack, well... you were fucked either way.” ⁠- Unnamed Nilfgaardian strategist

1153.name: Fucusya
1153.ability: Deploy: Play a non-Neutral unit from your graveyard with a provision cost of 10 or less and give it Doomed, then Spawn Rain on the opposite row with a duration equal to unused provisions.
1153.ability_html: Deploy: Play a non-Neutral unit from your graveyard with a provision cost of 10 or less and give it Doomed, then Spawn Rain on the opposite row with a duration equal to unused provisions.
1153.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
1153.flavor: Like mermaids, the sea witches can experience true love only once in a lifetime. And Fucusya wasted her only time on a human.

1154.name: Rioghan the Undying
1154.ability:
This card starts in your graveyard. 
When played or Summoned from the graveyard, trigger all remaining Rain and Storm on your opponent's side of the battlefield.
1154.ability_html: This card starts in your graveyard. When played or Summoned from the graveyard, trigger all remaining Rain and Storm on your opponent's side of the battlefield.
1154.keyword_html: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1. Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
1154.flavor: “Your life will burn as bright as the love between us.” - Fucusya

1155.name: Messenger of the Sea
1155.ability: Whenever Rain or Storm damages enemy units, boost self by the damage dealt.
1155.ability_html: Whenever Rain or Storm damages enemy units, boost self by the damage dealt.
1155.keyword_html: Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1. Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.

1156.name: Little Havfrue
1156.ability:
Deploy (Bonded): Increase this unit's base power by 2.
Order: Damage self by 4 and Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 2 turns.
1156.ability_html: Deploy (Bonded): Increase this unit's base power by 2. Order: Damage self by 4 and Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 2 turns.
1156.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
1156.flavor: They will not hesitate to shower you with gifts and affection. They will proudly profess their unwavering adoration and unyielding devotion. Yet, I ask you, when has a man ever given up his legs for love? Hmm?

1157.name: Filavandrel aén Fidháil
1157.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Create and play a Scoia'tael special card with a provision cost equal to this unit's power.
Deploy (Ranged): Create and play a Scoia'tael special card with a provision cost equal to or lower than this unit's power.
1157.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Create and play a Scoia'tael special card with a provision cost equal to this unit's power. Deploy (Ranged): Create and play a Scoia'tael special card with a provision cost equal to or lower than this unit's power.
1157.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
1157.flavor: He has pride⁠—the pride of someone who has never had to bow.

1158.name: Torque
1158.ability:
This card starts in your hand.
Whenever this card is boosted in your hand, boost a random different unit in your hand by the same amount.
1158.ability_html:
This card starts in your hand.
Whenever this card is boosted in your hand, boost a random different unit in your hand by the same amount.
1158.flavor: Where an elf cannot go himself, he sends a devil.

1159.name: Bountiful Harvest
1159.ability: Create and play a bronze Scoia'tael Elf, then, depending on the position of the chosen unit, boost the leftmost, a random, or the rightmost unit in your hand by 2.
1159.ability_html: Create and play a bronze Scoia'tael Elf, then, depending on the position of the chosen unit, boost the leftmost, a random, or the rightmost unit in your hand by 2.
1159.keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
1159.flavor: Never have we tilled nor torn up the land, unlike you dh'oine with your hoes and ploughs. You wrest bloody tributes from the Queen of the Fields, while we celebrate her every gift.

1160.name: Watcher of the Valley
1160.ability:
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding equal to the amount of boost on this card.
Bonded: Damage it by that amount instead.
1160.ability_html: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding equal to the amount of boost on this card. Bonded: Damage it by that amount instead.
1160.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
1160.flavor: He notched his staff for every interloper who thought to try their luck. Soon, the notches, much like the intruders, could no longer be distinguished.

1161.name: Chapter of Wizards
1161.ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Spawn and play Runeword.
Order: Spawn on this row a base copy of the last bronze allied Mage you played.
1161.ability_html: Resilience. Deploy: Spawn and play Runeword. Order: Spawn on this row a base copy of the last bronze allied Mage you played.
1161.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1161.flavor: In the wake of the Novigradian Union, the Chapter of the Gift and the Art sought to ensure all magic was adequately regulated. Yet, some mages refused to be restrained by the fetters of absolute authority, choosing instead to practice their craft away from prying eyes. Deemed 'enemies of the institution', these renegades were promptly hunted down and punished.

1162.name: Raffard’s Vengeance
1162.ability:
Order: Play a bronze unit from your hand, then draw a card.
Cooldown: 5
Crew: Whenever you play a unit next to this card, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
Mages contribute to this card's Crew ability.
1162.ability_html: Order: Play a bronze unit from your hand, then draw a card. Cooldown: 5 Crew: Whenever you play a unit next to this card, damage a random enemy unit by 2. Mages contribute to this card's Crew ability.
1162.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused. Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers.
1162.flavor: Step 1. Lock the long arm lever to the hook trigger, and place the load into the sling harness.\nStep 2. Set the counterweight to no less than eighty times the load, and line the glide track with pyrite.\nStep 3. Conjure and align the portal to target location, and unleash hell.

1163.name: Alumni
1163.ability:
Deploy: If the damage and boost values are equal to, or higher than 4, gain Zeal.
Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 0.
Order (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by 0.
The damage and boost values correspond to the highest Patience achieved by your Ban Ard Students or Aretuza Students this game, respectively.
1163.ability_html: Deploy: If the damage and boost values are equal to, or higher than 4, gain Zeal. Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 0. Order (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by 0. The damage and boost values correspond to the highest Patience achieved by your Ban Ard Students or Aretuza Students this game, respectively.
1163.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, increase the card's specified value by 1 for the rest of the game.
1163.flavor: Deep down, they had both been waiting for this moment for a long time. Live targets had been a bit of a taboo in academia.

1164.name: Meditating Mage
1164.ability:
Patience.
Order: Gain Vitality [0].
Bonded: Also gain Resilience.
1164.ability_html: Patience. Order: Gain Vitality [0]. Bonded: Also gain Resilience.
1164.keyword_html: Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, increase the card's specified value by 1 for the rest of the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card. Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
1164.flavor: To become one with air, think away the ground.

1165.name: Yaga
1165.ability:
Deploy (Sabbath): Gain Zeal.
Order: Consume a 4-provision cost unit, then increase the provision value by 1.
Cooldown: 2
1165.ability_html: Deploy (Sabbath): Gain Zeal. Order: Consume a 4-provision cost unit, then increase the provision value by 1. Cooldown: 2
1165.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
1165.flavor: The Witch Queen sat upon her throne of bones, gorging herself on all and sucking the life out of everything that came her way. For centuries, she feasted, until one day, she could no longer stand at all. And so, she ate some more.

1166.name: Witches' Sabbath
1166.ability: Summon up to 3 highest-power units from your opponent's graveyard to an enemy row, then Summon as many highest-power non-Neutral units from your graveyard to the opposite row and give them Doomed.
1166.ability_html: Summon up to 3 highest-power units from your opponent's graveyard to an enemy row, then Summon as many highest-power non-Neutral units from your graveyard to the opposite row and give them Doomed.
1166.keyword_html: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
1166.flavor: For the sabbath, at least three witches are required. With two, it’s only a quarrel.

1167.name: Incubus
1167.ability: Deploy: Summon a bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard to the opposite row, then Summon a bronze unit of equal or less provisions from your graveyard to this row.
1167.ability_html: Deploy: Summon a bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard to the opposite row, then Summon a bronze unit of equal or less provisions from your graveyard to this row.
1167.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).

1168.name: Lesser Witch
1168.ability:
Deploy: Spawn a base copy of self in your graveyard.
Bonded: Spawn a base copy of self on this row instead.
1168.ability_html: Deploy: Spawn a base copy of self in your graveyard. Bonded: Spawn a base copy of self on this row instead.
1168.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
1168.flavor: Less powerful, but no less terrible.

1169.name: The Brute
1169.ability:
Profit 0.
Deploy: Boost self by boost.
The boost is equal to the base power of the highest-power enemy unit with a Bounty you destroyed this game.
Whenever you place a Bounty on an enemy unit, increase the Profit by 1.
1169.ability_html: Profit 0. Deploy: Boost self by boost. The boost is equal to the base power of the highest-power enemy unit with a Bounty you destroyed this game. Whenever you place a Bounty on an enemy unit, increase the Profit by 1.
1169.keyword_html: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
1169.flavor: He’s a slayer of all things wicked, a saviour of the common folk, and a very good boy. At least, that’s what his mum tells him.

1170.name: Octavia Hale
1170.ability:
Deploy: Draw up to 2 of Octavia's sons, then shuffle the same number of number of cards back into your deck.
Fee 2: Boost an allied Witch Hunter by 2. If you destroyed an enemy unit this turn, boost by 3 instead.
1170.ability_html: Deploy: Draw up to 2 of Octavia's sons, then shuffle the same number of number of cards back into your deck. Fee 2: Boost an allied Witch Hunter by 2. If you destroyed an enemy unit this turn, boost by 3 instead.
1170.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
1170.flavor: A mother is more than just the sum of her children.

1171.name: Purge
1171.ability:
Damage an enemy unit by 3. Increase the damage by 1 for each Witch Hunter you control.
Deathblow: Place a Bounty on the highest-power enemy unit.
1171.ability_html: Damage an enemy unit by 3. Increase the damage by 1 for each Witch Hunter you control. Deathblow: Place a Bounty on the highest-power enemy unit.
1171.keyword_html: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
1171.flavor: Thought you could outrun justice, did you, you heathen swine?

1172.name: Savvy Huckster
1172.ability:
Profit 1.
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Fee 1: Gain Vitality (1).
Bonded: Increase the Profit and damage by 1.
1172.ability_html: Profit 1. Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Fee 1: Gain Vitality (1). Bonded: Increase the Profit and damage by 1.
1172.keyword_html: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
1172.flavor: Good sir, half a crown per stone!? That’s a crime! I’ll take twenty.

1173.name: The Mushy Truffle
1173.ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Spawn and play a Bonded unit from your starting deck.
Order: Spawn and play Golden Froth.
1173.ability_html: Resilience. Deploy: Spawn and play a Bonded unit from your starting deck. Order: Spawn and play Golden Froth.
1173.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1173.flavor: Some drink to celebrate. Others, to forget. But here? Here we don't need no reason.

1174.name: Alissa Henson
1174.ability: Deploy: Shuffle a special card from your graveyard into your deck. If it was a bronze, also shuffle one additional copy of that special.
1174.ability_html: Deploy: Shuffle a special card from your graveyard into your deck. If it was a bronze, also shuffle one additional copy of that special.
1174.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1174.flavor: You either die a hero, or live long enough to be exposed as a villain.

1175.name: The Eternal Eclipse
1175.ability:
Doomed.
Scenario: Progress whenever you play a gold Cultist.
Prologue: Spawn Eternal Eclipse Initiate on this row.
Chapter 1: Infuse all your non-Disloyal Cultists on the battlefield, in your hand and in your deck with "Whenever you play a Cultist, boost self by 1, then increase this value by 1 if it was a bronze".
Chapter 2: Spawn and play Eternal Eclipse Deacon.
1175.ability_html: Doomed. Scenario: Progress whenever you play a gold Cultist. Prologue: Spawn Eternal Eclipse Initiate on this row. Chapter 1: Infuse all your non-Disloyal Cultists on the battlefield, in your hand and in your deck with "Whenever you play a Cultist, boost self by 1, then increase this value by 1 if it was a bronze". Chapter 2: Spawn and play Eternal Eclipse Deacon.
1175.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying.
1175.flavor: For the uninitiated, the Grand Scheme will manifest itself as an avalanche: a series of seemingly insignificant events putting the entire mountain slope in motion to sweep away the ancien régime. Only the madmen and the thorough historians, studying the developments of these days in retrospect, many decades later, will discover the truth:  it was a mechanism as precise as a clock, counting down to the advent of a new world order.

1176.name: Master of Ceremonies
1176.ability: At the start of the game, Infuse 2 random gold non-Cultist units in your starting deck with Cultist category and Infuse them with "After this card is played or Summoned, if you control 3 or more Cultists, damage the lowest-power Infused enemy unit by 3".
1176.ability_html: At the start of the game, Infuse 2 random gold non-Cultist units in your starting deck with Cultist category and Infuse them with "After this card is played or Summoned, if you control 3 or more Cultists, damage the lowest-power Infused enemy unit by 3".
1176.keyword_html: Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
1176.flavor: With the indepth understanding of both human and heavenly affairs comes the realisation that the Grand Scheme is not a chessboard at all. It is a clockwork.

1177.name: Eternal Eclipse Deacon
1177.ability:
Deploy: Infuse a unit in your hand with the Cultist category.
Order: Infuse a unit in your deck with the Cultist category.
1177.ability_html: Deploy: Infuse a unit in your hand with the Cultist category. Order: Infuse a unit in your deck with the Cultist category.
1177.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1177.flavor: Once you see beyond the occult fumes and elitist allure, only then you cease to be a piece and become a player.

1178.name: Eternal Eclipse Initiate
1178.ability: Order: Infuse a bronze enemy unit with "Whenever your opponent plays a Cultist, damage self by 1. Deathwish: Spawn a base copy of self on the opposite row, Infuse it with the Cultist category, then set its power to the number of Cultists your opponent controls".
1178.ability_html: Order: Infuse a bronze enemy unit with "Whenever your opponent plays a Cultist, damage self by 1. Deathwish: Spawn a base copy of self on the opposite row, Infuse it with the Cultist category, then set its power to the number of Cultists your opponent controls".
1178.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1178.flavor: The air of mystery, the promise of power - enough to obtain a whole set of pawns for your chessboard.

1179.name: Endless Voyage
1179.ability:
Doomed.
Scenario: Progress whenever you play a Pirate.
Prologue: Spawn Bjorn's Drakkar on this row.
Chapter 1: Whenever your opponent plays a unit, Infuse it with "Deathwish: Spawn Cataclysm on this row for 1 turn".
Chapter 2: Purify and Heal an allied Bjorn's Drakkar, increase its base power by 5 and give it 1 Charge.
If you don't control Bjorn's Drakkar, Spawn it on this row instead.
1179.ability_html: Doomed. Scenario: Progress whenever you play a Pirate. Prologue: Spawn Bjorn's Drakkar on this row. Chapter 1: Whenever your opponent plays a unit, Infuse it with "Deathwish: Spawn Cataclysm on this row for 1 turn". Chapter 2: Purify and Heal an allied Bjorn's Drakkar, increase its base power by 5 and give it 1 Charge. If you don't control Bjorn's Drakkar, Spawn it on this row instead.
1179.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Cataclysm: At the start of the owner's turn, split 3 damage randomly between units in this row. Purify: Remove all statuses. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
1179.flavor: Time has failed to halt Bjorn's search. What good will the elements do?

1180.name: Bjorn Stormursson
1180.ability:
Veteran.
Deploy: Clash with an enemy unit.
Order (Bloodthirst 2): Discard a card, then move self back to your hand.
1180.ability_html: Veteran. Deploy: Clash with an enemy unit. Order (Bloodthirst 2): Discard a card, then move self back to your hand.
1180.keyword_html: Veteran: At the start of the second and third round, increase the base power of this unit by 1. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Clash: Units simultanously damage each other by their power. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability. Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
1180.flavor: Bjorn, son of Stormur the Feared, known to his village as Storm Son, to his friends as Thundersocket, to his enemies as Whale Eater, to continentals as the Cyclops of Skellige, to his daughter as Stuffy Old Fuck, and to history as the Unreturned...

1181.name: Deranged Corsair
1181.ability: Deploy: Infuse an enemy unit with "Deathwish: Spawn Cataclysm on this row for 2 turns", then Spawn Cataclysm on its row for 1 turn.
1181.ability_html: Deploy: Infuse an enemy unit with "Deathwish: Spawn Cataclysm on this row for 2 turns", then Spawn Cataclysm on its row for 1 turn.
1181.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Cataclysm: At the start of the owner's turn, split 3 damage randomly between units in this row.
1181.flavor: Who ever said you had to be dead to haunt the seas?

1182.name: Seagull
1182.ability:
Deploy: Damage 3 units by 1, then Spawn a Seagull in your graveyard for each target that is damaged or destroyed.
When an enemy unit is destroyed, Summon self from your graveyard to your Ranged row, then gain Doomed.
1182.ability_html: Deploy: Damage 3 units by 1, then Spawn a Seagull in your graveyard for each target that is damaged or destroyed. When an enemy unit is destroyed, Summon self from your graveyard to your Ranged row, then gain Doomed.
1182.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
1182.flavor: People often fear crows and ravens as portents of death, while ignoring the ultimate source of shock and terror: the common seagull.

1183.name: Mysteries of Loc Feainn
1183.ability:
Doomed.
Scenario: Progress whenever you play a unit with Harmony.
Prologue: Spawn Lake Guardian: Dawn Aspect on this row and set its power to the number of non-Neutral units with unique primary categories in your starting deck.
Chapter 1: Whenever you play a non-Neutral unit, boost it by 1 for each category it has.
Chapter 2: Spawn and play Loc Feainn: Convergence.
1183.ability_html: Doomed. Scenario: Progress whenever you play a unit with Harmony. Prologue: Spawn Lake Guardian: Dawn Aspect on this row and set its power to the number of non-Neutral units with unique primary categories in your starting deck. Chapter 1: Whenever you play a non-Neutral unit, boost it by 1 for each category it has. Chapter 2: Spawn and play Loc Feainn: Convergence.
1183.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a non-Neutral unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1183.flavor: Here, all nature returns to its source; all life finds renewal.

1184.name: Lake Guardian: Dusk Aspect
1184.ability:
Harmony.
This unit's Harmony is also triggered in hand and deck.
1184.ability_html: Harmony. This unit's Harmony is also triggered in hand and deck.
1184.keyword_html: Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a non-Neutral unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units.
1184.flavor: Like a moonflower, it lives to curtail the dark of night.

1185.name: Antherion
1185.ability:
Harmony.
Order: Infuse an allied unit with "Harmony".
1185.ability_html: Harmony. Order: Infuse an allied unit with "Harmony".
1185.keyword_html: Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a non-Neutral unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities.
1185.flavor: To lay eyes upon a mythical antherion is to know one was well off the beaten path.

1186.name: Chameleon
1186.ability:
Deploy: Infuse self with a random Scoia'tael primary category that you don't control.
Order: Replay self, then reduce own base power by 1.
1186.ability_html: Deploy: Infuse self with a random Scoia'tael primary category that you don't control. Order: Replay self, then reduce own base power by 1.
1186.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1186.flavor: Its own mother wouldn't be able to tell you of its true colors.

1187.name: Damsel in Distress
1187.ability:
Doomed.
Scenario: Progress whenever you play a Knight.
Prologue: Summon a bronze Knight from your deck to this row.
Chapter 1: Whenever an allied unit triggers Grace, boost its adjacent units by 2.
Chapter 2: Spawn and play Mad Charge.
1187.ability_html: Doomed. Scenario: Progress whenever you play a Knight. Prologue: Summon a bronze Knight from your deck to this row. Chapter 1: Whenever an allied unit triggers Grace, boost its adjacent units by 2. Chapter 2: Spawn and play Mad Charge.
1187.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Grace: The first time this unit's power is equal to or higher than the specified amount, trigger the ability. If the condition is already met when it enters the battlefield, trigger it immediately. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1187.flavor: Understandably, it had never occurred to any young knight or princeling, that the towers were erected for their own protection.

1188.name: The Maiden's Shield
1188.ability:
Shield.
Grace 8: Spawn Bronwen the Bold to the right of self.
Grace 14: Boost the allied Bronwen the Bold by 3.
Deathwish: Lock the allied Bronwen the Bold.
1188.ability_html: Shield. Grace 8: Spawn Bronwen the Bold to the right of self. Grace 14: Boost the allied Bronwen the Bold by 3. Deathwish: Lock the allied Bronwen the Bold.
1188.keyword_html: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit. Grace: The first time this unit's power is equal to or higher than the specified amount, trigger the ability. If the condition is already met when it enters the battlefield, trigger it immediately. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
1188.flavor: Her great, quiet guardian, now known to most only as Scruffy, had soon abandoned his old name after meeting fierce little Bronwen for the first time. In this tribulation, he saw his one opportunity for penance.

1189.name: Bronwen the Bold
1189.ability:
Immunity.
Order (Grace 5): Infuse an allied unit with "Whenever this unit receives a boost from other abilities, boost self by the same amount".
1189.ability_html: Immunity. Order (Grace 5): Infuse an allied unit with "Whenever this unit receives a boost from other abilities, boost self by the same amount".
1189.keyword_html: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Grace: The first time this unit's power is equal to or higher than the specified amount, trigger the ability. If the condition is already met when it enters the battlefield, trigger it immediately. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities.
1189.flavor: Cursed, exiled, beset - and all this in one luncheon gown.

1190.name: Knight-Errant
1190.ability:
At the end of your turn, boost self by 1 for each adjacent boosted unit and damage self by 1 for each adjacent damaged unit.
Grace 9: Give adjacent units Shield, then Infuse them with "Whenever this unit loses Shield, boost it by 2".
1190.ability_html: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1 for each adjacent boosted unit and damage self by 1 for each adjacent damaged unit. Grace 9: Give adjacent units Shield, then Infuse them with "Whenever this unit loses Shield, boost it by 2".
1190.keyword_html: Grace: The first time this unit's power is equal to or higher than the specified amount, trigger the ability. If the condition is already met when it enters the battlefield, trigger it immediately. Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities.
1190.flavor: Traversing the fine line between idiom and idiot.

1191.name: Squire
1191.ability: Order: Boost the next unit you play by 2. If it is a Knight, also Infuse it with "At the end of your turn, boost self by 1".
1191.ability_html: Order: Boost the next unit you play by 2. If it is a Knight, also Infuse it with "At the end of your turn, boost self by 1".
1191.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities.
1191.flavor: 25th of Blathe -- Vizima is four days off. Provisions are running low. Nothing to hunt.\n26th of Blathe -- Ambushed. Lost the cauldron to a brigand's battle-axe.\n27th of Blathe -- Half an hour is not enough to wash a sallet. I can still smell our makeshift stew.

1192.name: The Manor’s Dark Secret
1192.ability:
Doomed.
Scenario: Progress whenever you play a unit with Thrive.
Prologue: Spawn a Cursed Damsel on this row and boost it by 2.
Chapter 1: Whenever you play a unit, if it would not trigger any of your Thrive units, boost it by 2 first.
Chapter 2: Play the highest-power bronze non-Neutral unit from your deck.
1192.ability_html: Doomed. Scenario: Progress whenever you play a unit with Thrive. Prologue: Spawn a Cursed Damsel on this row and boost it by 2. Chapter 1: Whenever you play a unit, if it would not trigger any of your Thrive units, boost it by 2 first. Chapter 2: Play the highest-power bronze non-Neutral unit from your deck.
1192.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1192.flavor: In this manor, the doors lock YOU up.

1193.name: Sir Scratch-a-Lot
1193.ability:
At the start of the game, gain Immunity.
Deploy: Boost self by 0.
Order: Increase the boost value by 2, then replay self.
Units played on your opponent's side can trigger your Thrive abilities.
1193.ability_html: At the start of the game, gain Immunity. Deploy: Boost self by 0. Order: Increase the boost value by 2, then replay self. Units played on your opponent's side can trigger your Thrive abilities.
1193.keyword_html: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
1193.flavor: If you value your eyesight... Don't call him a pussy.

1194.name: Cursed Damsel
1194.ability:
Thrive.
Order: Halve own power and destroy an enemy unit with power up to the power removed from self.
1194.ability_html: Thrive. Order: Halve own power and destroy an enemy unit with power up to the power removed from self.
1194.keyword_html: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1194.flavor: An innocent girl surrounded by mutilated corpses of her sisters and servants. Don't you pity her? She must be yearning for a comforting embrace.

1195.name: Orchard Mantrap
1195.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Consume an allied unit. This unit triggers Thrive an additional time.
Deploy (Ranged): Infuse 2 allied units with "Thrive".
1195.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Consume an allied unit. This unit triggers Thrive an additional time. Deploy (Ranged): Infuse 2 allied units with "Thrive".
1195.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead. Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities.
1195.flavor: Retribution for all innocent fruit cannibalized by mankind!

1196.name: In Search of Forgotten Treasures
1196.ability:
Doomed.
Scenario: Progress whenever you play a Tidecloak.
Prologue: Spawn Gudrun Bjornsdottir on this row.
Chapter 1: Hoard 8: At the end of your turn, gain enough Coins to fill your pouch.
Chapter 2: Damage the highest-power enemy unit by the number of Coins you have.
1196.ability_html: Doomed. Scenario: Progress whenever you play a Tidecloak. Prologue: Spawn Gudrun Bjornsdottir on this row. Chapter 1: Hoard 8: At the end of your turn, gain enough Coins to fill your pouch. Chapter 2: Damage the highest-power enemy unit by the number of Coins you have.
1196.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Hoard: Trigger this ability if you possess the specified number of Coins or more. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
1196.flavor: Fabled, elusive, unmapped. This place sparks the wildest dreams and turns stately sailors into swashbuckling adventurers.

1197.name: Flyndr's Crew
1197.ability:
Deploy: Spawn 3 base copies of self on this row. Reduce the number of copies by 1 for each Counter.
Your Hoards require 1 less Coins to trigger.
Hoard 9: Once per round, at the end of your turn, while in hand or deck, remove a Counter.
Counter: 3
1197.ability_html: Deploy: Spawn 3 base copies of self on this row. Reduce the number of copies by 1 for each Counter. Your Hoards require 1 less Coins to trigger. Hoard 9: Once per round, at the end of your turn, while in hand or deck, remove a Counter. Counter: 3
1197.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Hoard: Trigger this ability if you possess the specified number of Coins or more. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
1197.flavor: Wretches and thieves drunk on grog, bloodshed and booty - could you ever hope for a better crew?

1198.name: Treasure Huntress
1198.ability:
Profit 3.
Fee 3 (Hoard 9): Infuse an allied unit with "At the end of your turn, gain 1 Coin".
1198.ability_html: Profit 3. Fee 3 (Hoard 9): Infuse an allied unit with "At the end of your turn, gain 1 Coin".
1198.keyword_html: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins. Hoard: Trigger this ability if you possess the specified number of Coins or more. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
1198.flavor: No island, cape nor bay can guard their secrets from this restless soul and her trusted companion.

1199.name: Pearl Diver
1199.keyword_html: Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
1199.flavor: Can ye hold yer breath 'till dis candle burns out? No? Then don't tell me five hundred oren is too much for a pearl.

1200.name: Renfri
1200.ability:
Doomed.
Deploy: If your starting deck has at least 25 units, Create a curse to replace your leader ability, then Create a blessing and Infuse your leader ability with it.
1200.ability_html: Doomed. Deploy: If your starting deck has at least 25 units, Create a curse to replace your leader ability, then Create a blessing and Infuse your leader ability with it.
1200.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities.
1200.flavor: In this fairytale, the princess and the monster are the same person.

1201.name: Renfri's Gang
1201.ability: Deploy: If your starting deck has at least 25 units, Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row.
1201.ability_html: Deploy: If your starting deck has at least 25 units, Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row.
1201.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
1201.flavor: What would a princess be without six bloodthirsty henchmen?

1202.name: Saskia: Commander
1202.ability:
Immunity.
Deploy: If you have at least 10 different primary categories in your starting deck, Summon a random bronze non-Neutral unit with a primary category that is not on your side of the battlefield from your deck to this row.
Timer 3: Repeat the Deploy ability and reset the Timer.
1202.ability_html: Immunity. Deploy: If you have at least 10 different primary categories in your starting deck, Summon a random bronze non-Neutral unit with a primary category that is not on your side of the battlefield from your deck to this row. Timer 3: Repeat the Deploy ability and reset the Timer.
1202.keyword_html: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability.
1202.flavor: We won't be fighting mere minions, but their King! And the King himself will have to recognize our victory! Could a soldier dream of better than defeating a monarch?

1203.name: King Radovid V
1203.ability:
Deploy: If the base version of your leader ability has more than 1 Charge, give it an additional Charge.
Order: Repeat the Deploy ability.
1203.ability_html: Deploy: If the base version of your leader ability has more than 1 Charge, give it an additional Charge. Order: Repeat the Deploy ability.
1203.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1203.flavor: “They say it’s the game of kings. That chess teaches one to think strategically. What a load of rubbish! Both sides have identical pieces, the rules stay invariably the same. How does that mirror real life?”

1204.name: Jan Calveit
1204.ability:
Deploy: Sort the cards in your deck from the highest to the lowest provision cost.
At the start of the game, move self up by one position in the deck for each Tactic in your starting deck.
1204.ability_html: Deploy: Sort the cards in your deck from the highest to the lowest provision cost. At the start of the game, move self up by one position in the deck for each Tactic in your starting deck.
1204.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1204.flavor: “To prepare for the future, it’s best to first know it.”

1205.name: Arachas Queen
1205.ability:
Deploy: Consume an allied unit.
Order: Spawn and play Arachas Nest.
Deathwish: Spawn a base copy of the Consumed unit on this row.
1205.ability_html: Deploy: Consume an allied unit. Order: Spawn and play Arachas Nest. Deathwish: Spawn a base copy of the Consumed unit on this row.
1205.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.

1206.name: Ardal aep Dahy
1206.ability:
Deploy (Ranged): If neither player has passed and your opponent's hand is not full, move a non-Doomed enemy unit with power up to 2 to your opponent's hand, then draw a card.
Increase the maximum value by the number of Tactics in your starting deck.
1206.ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): If neither player has passed and your opponent's hand is not full, move a non-Doomed enemy unit with power up to 2 to your opponent's hand, then draw a card. Increase the maximum value by the number of Tactics in your starting deck.
1206.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
1206.flavor: “In my home, in the civilized world, a general commands his forces. He does not rush and thrash about like some rabid hound.”

1207.name: King Bran
1207.ability:
Veteran.
Deploy: Boost self by 0. Increase the value by 1 whenever excess damage is dealt to enemy units.
At the start of the game, trigger the Veteran ability of your units.
1207.ability_html: Veteran. Deploy: Boost self by 0. Increase the value by 1 whenever excess damage is dealt to enemy units. At the start of the game, trigger the Veteran ability of your units.
1207.keyword_html: Veteran: At the start of the second and third round, increase the base power of this unit by 1. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1207.flavor: He lived life on his own terms—died on them, too.

1208.name: Cerys: Fearless
1208.ability:
After you've dealt damage to allied units 9 times, Summon self from your deck to your Ranged row.
Zeal. Order: Heal an allied unit and damage another allied unit by the amount Healed.
Cooldown: 1
1208.ability_html: After you've dealt damage to allied units 9 times, Summon self from your deck to your Ranged row. Zeal. Order: Heal an allied unit and damage another allied unit by the amount Healed. Cooldown: 1
1208.keyword_html: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
1208.flavor: “If you want something done, send your best man. If you want something done right, send a woman.”

1209.name: Milva: Sharpshooter
1209.ability:
Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Deathblow: Shuffle self back into your deck.
Whenever an enemy unit moves during your turn, Summon self from your deck to the opposite row, then damage it by 1.
1209.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Deathblow: Shuffle self back into your deck. Whenever an enemy unit moves during your turn, Summon self from your deck to the opposite row, then damage it by 1.
1209.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
1209.flavor: Rarely did Milva hunt beasts larger than red deer or armor-clad men.

1210.name: King Henselt
1210.ability:
Deploy: Play a Crew unit from your deck.
Whenever an adjacent unit's Cooldown decreases, boost self by the same amount.
1210.ability_html: Deploy: Play a Crew unit from your deck. Whenever an adjacent unit's Cooldown decreases, boost self by the same amount.
1210.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
1210.flavor: Fuck with the unicorn and you get the horn.

1211.name: Regis: Reborn
1211.ability:
Deploy: Drain an enemy unit by 3.
At the end of your turn, while in hand or deck, if there is an enemy unit with Bleeding, increase own base power by 1.
1211.ability_html: Deploy: Drain an enemy unit by 3. At the end of your turn, while in hand or deck, if there is an enemy unit with Bleeding, increase own base power by 1.
1211.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Drain: Damage ignoring the target's armor, then boost self by the damage dealt. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
1211.flavor: “You surround your dead with veneration, you dream of immortality, and in your myths and legends someone is always being resurrected—conquering death itself. But were your revered late great-grandfather to spring from his grave and order a beer, hysteria would surely ensue.”

1212.name: King of Beggars
1212.ability:
Fee 1: Boost self by 1.
While in deck, whenever you pay a Tribute, remove a Counter for each Coin spent. For each removed Counter, gain 1 Coin.
When the Counter reaches 0, Summon self from your deck to a random allied row.
Counter: 12
1212.ability_html: Fee 1: Boost self by 1. While in deck, whenever you pay a Tribute, remove a Counter for each Coin spent. For each removed Counter, gain 1 Coin. When the Counter reaches 0, Summon self from your deck to a random allied row. Counter: 12
1212.keyword_html: Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins. Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
1212.flavor: You say tribute, I say taxes. ⁠— Francis Bedlam

1213.name: Cyrus Engelkind Hemmelfart
1213.ability:
Profit 4.
Deploy: Spawn and play Congregation.
Fee 2: Destroy an allied Firesworn Token, then Summon a bronze Firesworn unit from your graveyard to the same position.
Cooldown: 1
1213.ability_html: Profit 4. Deploy: Spawn and play Congregation. Fee 2: Destroy an allied Firesworn Token, then Summon a bronze Firesworn unit from your graveyard to the same position. Cooldown: 1
1213.keyword_html: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
1213.flavor: Behind the Hierarch's pious pageant, his luxurious silks and exotic wines, his whores and slaves, beneath all that lust, greed, and vanity, stands an honorable man.

1214.name: Aerondight
1214.ability:
Echo.
Damage an enemy unit by 0, then boost the lowest-power allied unit by the excess damage dealt.
At the end of your turn, if you have more points than your opponent, increase the damage by 1, wherever this card is.
1214.ability_html: Echo. Damage an enemy unit by 0, then boost the lowest-power allied unit by the excess damage dealt. At the end of your turn, if you have more points than your opponent, increase the damage by 1, wherever this card is.
1214.keyword_html: Echo: At the beginning of the round, move this card from the graveyard to the top of its owner's deck. Give it Doomed.
1214.flavor: A deceptively light blade, razor-sharp, and perfectly balanced.\n\nThe sword is said to only reveal itself to worthy champions and therefore spends most of its time hidden, patiently awaiting its next bearer.

1215.name: Arcane Tome
1215.ability:
Zeal. Order: Play a special card from your deck, then move self to the opposite row. If there is no space on the opposite row, destroy self.
Cooldown: 1
At the end of your turn, if not on Cooldown, destroy self.
1215.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Play a special card from your deck, then move self to the opposite row. If there is no space on the opposite row, destroy self. Cooldown: 1 At the end of your turn, if not on Cooldown, destroy self.
1215.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
1215.flavor: Alzur’s opus magnum. Contains the accumulated knowledge of the legendary mage.\n\nMages across the realms knew of the simplicity and elegance of Alzur's repertoire, but the sheer, overwhelming mechanics behind them remained forever guarded.

1216.name: Mysterious Puzzle Box
1216.ability:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Spawn a 7-power Lamp Djinn on the opposite row. If neither player has passed, choose a card from your hand.
Adrenaline 2: Spawn a 7-power Lamp Djinn on the opposite row and destroy self instead.
Order: Pick a card from your hand.
At the end of your turn, transform the highest-provision chosen card(s) in hand into Thing From the Box, then Banish self.
1216.ability_html: Disloyal. Deploy: Spawn a 7-power Lamp Djinn on the opposite row. If neither player has passed, choose a card from your hand. Adrenaline 2: Spawn a 7-power Lamp Djinn on the opposite row and destroy self instead. Order: Pick a card from your hand. At the end of your turn, transform the highest-provision chosen card(s) in hand into Thing From the Box, then Banish self.
1216.keyword_html: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
1216.flavor: A masterfully decorated box brought from a faraway land.\n\nDue to the intricate security, one can assume that the contents are either extremely valuable or unimaginably dangerous. Only the brave⁠—or foolish—would ever consider opening it.

1217.name: Vial of Forbidden Knowledge
1217.ability:
Zeal. Order: Boost an allied unit by 4 and give it Vitality (4).
At the start of the game, if both players have this card in their deck, Summon self to a random allied row and transform.
1217.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Boost an allied unit by 4 and give it Vitality (4). At the start of the game, if both players have this card in their deck, Summon self to a random allied row and transform.
1217.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
1217.flavor: A single globule of the magical liquid can turn a simpleton into a savant.

1218.name: Ring of Favor
1218.ability:
This card starts in your hand.
Boost an allied unit by 3.
While in hand, at the end of your turn, increase the boost by 2.
When your opponent passes, Banish self from hand and draw a card. 
When moved to the deck, Banish self.
1218.ability_html: This card starts in your hand. Boost an allied unit by 3. While in hand, at the end of your turn, increase the boost by 2. When your opponent passes, Banish self from hand and draw a card. When moved to the deck, Banish self.
1218.keyword_html: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
1218.flavor: Wearing it provides its bearer with a surge of lucky encounters, like meeting a friendly stranger or stumbling upon a treasure. Although, some say such happenings are mere coincidence.

1219.name: Ornate Censer
1219.ability: Boost an allied unit by the amount of damage dealt to enemy units this turn, or damage an enemy unit by the amount of boost given to allied units this turn.
1219.ability_html: Boost an allied unit by the amount of damage dealt to enemy units this turn, or damage an enemy unit by the amount of boost given to allied units this turn.
1219.flavor: The burner is suited for such tasks as warding off evil spirits, diffusing pleasant aromas, or creating spooky atmospheres for one’s lair.

1220.name: Troll Porter
1220.ability: Deploy (Melee): Banish all cards in your hand, then draw as many cards.
1220.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Banish all cards in your hand, then draw as many cards.
1220.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
1220.flavor: Although he came from a known line of haberdashers, Kurtz' Kart was certainly a far cry from his grandfather's legacy, Wurr's Wares.

1221.name: Runemage
1221.ability: Deploy: For the rest of the game, your Create effects show you 5 options instead of 3. Create and play a Runestone.
1221.ability_html: Deploy: For the rest of the game, your Create effects show you 5 options instead of 3. Create and play a Runestone.
1221.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
1221.flavor: To you, perhaps, they are mere rocks, but to me they are the cornerstones to building a new world. In each etch I see a city; in each resonance I hear the anthems of a generation!

1222.name: Obsidian Mirror
1222.ability: Spawn 1-power copies of 3 enemy bronze units on their opposite row.
1222.ability_html: Spawn 1-power copies of 3 enemy bronze units on their opposite row.
1222.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1222.flavor: Beware to those who would gaze too long into its obsidian sheen, for one knows not what might gaze back.

1223.name: Prophet
1223.ability:
