Deploy: Damage self by 2, then Lock all units in your opponent's hand until the end of round. The next time your opponent plays a Locked unit, remove Lock from all units in your opponent's hand.
Adrenaline 2: Lock self instead.
1223.ability_html: Deploy: Damage self by 2, then Lock all units in your opponent's hand until the end of round. The next time your opponent plays a Locked unit, remove Lock from all units in your opponent's hand. Adrenaline 2: Lock self instead.
1223.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities. Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
1223.flavor: In his vision, he saw a mage beckon to a black sky as it split open. From the breach, he saw an enormous monstrosity with hooked limbs descending upon a city, smashing and crushing it to rubble. He saw destruction, death, and chaos incarnate, and he was paralysed with fear.

1224.name: Magic Compass
1224.ability:
Echo.
Look at the top 3 cards in your deck. Play one, then move the rest to your graveyard. If there are fewer than 3 cards in your deck, Spawn and play a legendary card from your faction that was not in your starting deck instead.
1224.ability_html: Echo. Look at the top 3 cards in your deck. Play one, then move the rest to your graveyard. If there are fewer than 3 cards in your deck, Spawn and play a legendary card from your faction that was not in your starting deck instead.
1224.keyword_html: Echo: At the beginning of the round, move this card from the graveyard to the top of its owner's deck. Give it Doomed. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1224.flavor: Helps you find exactly what you need. Or what you think you need.

1225.name: Highland Warlord
1225.ability:
Veteran.
Deploy: Increase the damage of your Raid cards by 1 for the rest of the game.
1225.ability_html: Veteran. Deploy: Increase the damage of your Raid cards by 1 for the rest of the game.
1225.keyword_html: Veteran: At the start of the second and third round, increase the base power of this unit by 1. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1225.flavor: Honor!? Ha! You know what happens to honorable men? They’re mourned.

1226.name: Prism Pendant
1226.ability:
Whenever you target an allied unit with a special, give it Vitality equal to the special's provision cost.
Whenever you target an enemy unit with a special, give it Bleeding equal to the special's provision cost.
1226.ability_html: Whenever you target an allied unit with a special, give it Vitality equal to the special's provision cost. Whenever you target an enemy unit with a special, give it Bleeding equal to the special's provision cost.
1226.keyword_html: Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
1226.flavor: Its light, glassy design—inspired by a simple wonder of nature—makes channeling magical energy as easy as breathing.

1227.name: Giantslayer
1227.ability:
Deploy: Choose an enemy unit. If its base power is higher than self's, gain 3 Armor.
Barricade: At the end of your turn, damage chosen unit by 1.
Deathblow: Gain Resilience.
1227.ability_html: Deploy: Choose an enemy unit. If its base power is higher than self's, gain 3 Armor. Barricade: At the end of your turn, damage chosen unit by 1. Deathblow: Gain Resilience.
1227.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor. Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
1227.flavor: Aye, they call me the Giantslayer, and nay, it ain't from bein' a humongous bastard now, is it, ye cocknosed shite!

1228.name: Mutagenerator
1228.ability:
Whenever you play a unit on your Melee row, boost 5 random units on your side of battlefield with the same provision cost by 1.
Whenever you play a unit on your Ranged row, boost 5 random units in your deck with the same provision cost by 1.
1228.ability_html: Whenever you play a unit on your Melee row, boost 5 random units on your side of battlefield with the same provision cost by 1. Whenever you play a unit on your Ranged row, boost 5 random units in your deck with the same provision cost by 1.
1228.keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
1228.flavor: An alchemy device capable of storing the essence of slain creatures. Transmutes the energy into mutagens.\n\nPrimitive in its current form, the apparatus usually produces haphazard results, making experimentation exceedingly difficult to replicate.

1229.name: Traveling Priestess
1229.ability:
Veil.
Deploy: Gain 1 Charges. Whenever this unit is moved back into your deck, increase the number of Charges by 2.
Order: Boost an allied unit by 1.
Whenever this unit is Inspired, gain Zeal.
Charge: 0
1229.ability_html: Veil. Deploy: Gain 1 Charges. Whenever this unit is moved back into your deck, increase the number of Charges by 2. Order: Boost an allied unit by 1. Whenever this unit is Inspired, gain Zeal. Charge: 0
1229.keyword_html: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
1229.flavor: Many devotees of the goddess Melitele branch out from the central sanctuary in Ellander to roam the Northern Realms. Most head out as midwives or healers. Others preach messages of peace and love. The rare few choose an itinerant lifestyle, living off of wild berries, and helping out folks along their travels who are struck by misfortune. The presence of such pilgrims is a sign for the forlorn that Melitele has not forsaken them.

1230.name: Necromancer's Tome
1230.ability:
Zeal. Order: Trigger a bronze allied unit's Deathwish ability.
Whenever you play a bronze unit, Summon a random copy of it from your graveyard to the same row and give it Doomed.
1230.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Trigger a bronze allied unit's Deathwish ability. Whenever you play a bronze unit, Summon a random copy of it from your graveyard to the same row and give it Doomed.
1230.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
1230.flavor: Some of the pages are made of human flesh, and the various prophecies, burial rites, and resurrection passages found enclosed are inked in blood.

1231.name: Giant Toad
1231.ability:
Deploy: Consume an allied unit.
When you play a Deathwish unit on your Ranged row, Summon self from your graveyard to the same row, Consume it and gain Doomed.
1231.ability_html: Deploy: Consume an allied unit. When you play a Deathwish unit on your Ranged row, Summon self from your graveyard to the same row, Consume it and gain Doomed.
1231.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
1231.flavor: Don't expect to end up like Sleeping Beauty once the Toad kisses you. Oh, no. You will swell rapidly into what can only be described as a pustulous, varicose grape, and this is before your pores begin to rupture and discharge the coalescent gravy that is your four humors.

1232.name: Conjurer's Candle
1232.ability:
Resilience.
Profit 4.
Fee 1: Boost an allied unit by 1. Increase the boost by this card's Fee cost.
Each time you pay this card's Fee, increase its cost by 1, up to 9.
1232.ability_html: Resilience. Profit 4. Fee 1: Boost an allied unit by 1. Increase the boost by this card's Fee cost. Each time you pay this card's Fee, increase its cost by 1, up to 9.
1232.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
1232.flavor: The ornament’s aesthetic is particularly pleasing to those with a fondness for the macabre, yet its true allure lies with its mystical properties; for any old candle can light up a dark space, but only a few can illuminate the truth.

1233.name: Shady Vendor
1233.ability:
Profit 1.
Tribute 4 (Melee): Create and play a bronze 4-provision Crime.
Tribute 5 (Ranged): Create and play a bronze 5-provision Crime.
1233.ability_html: Profit 1. Tribute 4 (Melee): Create and play a bronze 4-provision Crime. Tribute 5 (Ranged): Create and play a bronze 5-provision Crime.
1233.keyword_html: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
1233.flavor: If he ain’t got it, you don’t need it.

1234.name: Vial of Forbidden Knowledge: Unsealed
1234.ability:
Doomed.
Zeal. Order: Look at your opponent's starting deck.
Cooldown: 1
1234.ability_html: Doomed. Zeal. Order: Look at your opponent's starting deck. Cooldown: 1
1234.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
1234.flavor: Opens with a playful but bittersweet tang of memories, transforming into delicate, interwoven layers of time and space, and culminating in an explosion of fear and wonder. Well-paired with a little goetia on warm summer nights.

1235.name: Golden Nekker
1235.ability:
Deploy: If your starting deck does not have cards with a provision cost of 10 or more, play the top unit, special, and artifact from your deck.
Ciri: Nova and Golden Nekker are excluded from this condition.
1235.ability_html: Deploy: If your starting deck does not have cards with a provision cost of 10 or more, play the top unit, special, and artifact from your deck. Ciri: Nova and Golden Nekker are excluded from this condition.
1235.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1235.flavor: For what seems like centuries, the most brilliant minds in the world⁠—from theorists to fanatics⁠—have frequently gathered to speculate and debate the purpose of the Golden Nekker. Although they have not yet agreed upon the nature and origin of the strange, elusive statuette, they vow to have an answer “soon”.

1236.name: Thing from the Box
1236.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
1236.flavor: Seven eternities of really bad luck.

1237.name: Red Riders: Charge
1237.ability: Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 2 turns, then replay a bronze Wild Hunt unit.
1237.ability_html: Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 2 turns, then replay a bronze Wild Hunt unit.
1237.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
1237.flavor: They paint the sky with snow and the earth with fire.

1238.name: Bjorn's Drakkar
1238.ability:
Doomed.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1 and Infuse it with "Whenever this unit takes damage from other abilities, damage self by the same amount".
Charge: 1
1238.ability_html: Doomed. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1 and Infuse it with "Whenever this unit takes damage from other abilities, damage self by the same amount". Charge: 1
1238.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
1238.flavor: The elements have failed to halt Bjorn's search. What good will time do?

1239.name: Lake Guardian: Dawn Aspect
1239.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
1239.flavor: Like a sunflower, it lives to face the great fire in the sky.

1240.name: Beauclair
1240.ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Set an allied unit's power to match the highest-power enemy unit.
Order: Reset the power of a unit.
1240.ability_html: Resilience. Deploy: Set an allied unit's power to match the highest-power enemy unit. Order: Reset the power of a unit.
1240.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1240.flavor: Beauclair, with its ivory spires and amber rooftops against the backdrop of Mount Gorgon, embodies the essential Toussaint: it never feels like anything other than a fairy tale.

1241.name: Guillaume de Launfal
1241.ability:
Deploy: Boost self by the number of allied Knights on this row, then boost self and an enemy unit by half of both units' power.
Order (Grace 14): Move all statuses from an enemy unit to self.
1241.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by the number of allied Knights on this row, then boost self and an enemy unit by half of both units' power. Order (Grace 14): Move all statuses from an enemy unit to self.
1241.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Grace: The first time this unit's power is equal to or higher than the specified amount, trigger the ability. If the condition is already met when it enters the battlefield, trigger it immediately.
1241.flavor: A true exemplar of the five knightly virtues, save perhaps wisdom.

1242.name: Buhurt
1242.ability: Boost an enemy unit by 3, then an allied unit by 9.
1242.ability_html: Boost an enemy unit by 3, then an allied unit by 9.
1242.flavor: The one ONLY absolute iron-clad rule is: no crotch shots!

1243.name: Knight Challenger
1243.ability:
Deploy: Gain Vitality equal to the amount of boost an enemy unit has.
Grace 8: Boost all units by 1.
1243.ability_html: Deploy: Gain Vitality equal to the amount of boost an enemy unit has. Grace 8: Boost all units by 1.
1243.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Grace: The first time this unit's power is equal to or higher than the specified amount, trigger the ability. If the condition is already met when it enters the battlefield, trigger it immediately.
1243.flavor: While you were studying the blade, he mastered his hair.

1244.name: Sove
1244.ability: Deploy (Melee): Summon a Beast from your deck to the opposite row and Infuse it with "Deathwish: Boost the enemy Sove twice by own base power", then damage it by 1 for each damaged enemy unit and gain Immunity.
1244.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Summon a Beast from your deck to the opposite row and Infuse it with "Deathwish: Boost the enemy Sove twice by own base power", then damage it by 1 for each damaged enemy unit and gain Immunity.
1244.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
1244.flavor: The chimera was child's play compared to what awaited at home.

1245.name: Ulula
1245.ability:
Order: Damage a unit by 2.
Whenever an enemy unit takes damage from your Warriors, damage it by 1, ignoring its Armor.
1245.ability_html: Order: Damage a unit by 2. Whenever an enemy unit takes damage from your Warriors, damage it by 1, ignoring its Armor.
1245.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
1245.flavor: Not all beann'shies float around, foul and rotten. Some happen to be great beauties who will kick your arse, rip your ears off, and impale your intestines before shrieking in your face.

1246.name: Feral Bond
1246.ability:
Spawn Skellige Wolves on an enemy row and damage it by 1, then Create a bronze Skellige Warrior that was not in your starting deck.
Bloodthirst 3: You may Spawn and play any bronze Skellige Warrior that was not in your starting deck instead.
1246.ability_html: Spawn Skellige Wolves on an enemy row and damage it by 1, then Create a bronze Skellige Warrior that was not in your starting deck. Bloodthirst 3: You may Spawn and play any bronze Skellige Warrior that was not in your starting deck instead.
1246.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source. Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
1246.flavor: When your hour comes, choose the axe. Wolves in these parts tend to take their time.

1247.name: Brokvar Warrior
1247.ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 3.
If the target is damaged, repeat the Deploy ability with a different target and decrease the damage by 1.
1247.ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 3. If the target is damaged, repeat the Deploy ability with a different target and decrease the damage by 1.
1247.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.

1248.name: Aucwenn
1248.ability:
Symbiosis
Deploy: Infuse all your Naiads with the Nature category, wherever they are.
Whenever you Spawn a Wandering Treant, give it Vitality equal to the number of Dryads you control.
1248.ability_html: Symbiosis Deploy: Infuse all your Naiads with the Nature category, wherever they are. Whenever you Spawn a Wandering Treant, give it Vitality equal to the number of Dryads you control.
1248.keyword_html: Symbiosis: Whenever you play a Nature card, Spawn a Wandering Treant on a random allied row and set its power equal to number of Symbioses you control. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
1248.flavor: They are not born of magic, but of nature's long forgotten ways.

1249.name: Frog Mating Season
1249.ability: Choose 2 allied units, then give them Vitality (4) and Spawn a Frog on each side of the chosen units.
1249.ability_html: Choose 2 allied units, then give them Vitality (4) and Spawn a Frog on each side of the chosen units.
1249.keyword_html: Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1249.flavor: Would ya look at all those eyeballs?\nYa! They sure look tasty!

1250.name: Naiad Pondkeeper
1250.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by an allied Wandering Treant's power, then reset the Wandering Treant.
Deploy (Ranged): Infuse a non-Symbiosis allied unit with "Symbiosis".
1250.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by an allied Wandering Treant's power, then reset the Wandering Treant. Deploy (Ranged): Infuse a non-Symbiosis allied unit with "Symbiosis".
1250.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Symbiosis: Whenever you play a Nature card, Spawn a Wandering Treant on a random allied row and set its power equal to number of Symbioses you control.
1250.flavor: Anyone wandering this far from civilization couldn't possibly expect to be missed.

1251.name: Naiad Fledgling
1251.ability:
Whenever your Symbiosis is triggered, give the unit to the left Vitality (2).
Order: Remove all Vitality from an allied unit, then boost self by the same amount.
1251.ability_html: Whenever your Symbiosis is triggered, give the unit to the left Vitality (2). Order: Remove all Vitality from an allied unit, then boost self by the same amount.
1251.keyword_html: Symbiosis: Whenever you play a Nature card, Spawn a Wandering Treant on a random allied row and set its power equal to number of Symbioses you control. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1251.flavor: There's more to life than frolicking about naked in ponds. No one has a convincing answer as to what, however.

1252.name: Frog
1252.ability:
Doomed.
At the end of your turn, trigger Vitality for adjacent units.
Order: Move self to the other row.
1252.ability_html: Doomed. At the end of your turn, trigger Vitality for adjacent units. Order: Move self to the other row.
1252.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1252.flavor: Time's fun when you're having flies.

1253.name: Boholt
1253.ability:
Formation.
Order: Spawn a base copy of an allied bronze Soldier on its row.
Whenever you Spawn a Soldier, boost self by 2.
1253.ability_html: Formation. Order: Spawn a base copy of an allied bronze Soldier on its row. Whenever you Spawn a Soldier, boost self by 2.
1253.keyword_html: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1253.flavor: The bounty was often more than whatever the peasants were willing to offer, for the advance payments of lesser hunters also awaited the Reavers in the beasts' lairs.

1254.name: Kennet and Gar
1254.ability:
Formation.
Order: Destroy an enemy unit with 2 or less power.
Whenever you Spawn a Soldier, increase the limit by 1.
1254.ability_html: Formation. Order: Destroy an enemy unit with 2 or less power. Whenever you Spawn a Soldier, increase the limit by 1.
1254.keyword_html: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1254.flavor: What tattoo should we get after this 'un?\n'Ow 'bout a pair of flamin' tits?

1255.name: Reaver Hunters
1255.ability:
Order: Spawn a base copy of self on this row and set its base power to 1 less than self.
Bonded (Melee): At the end of your turn, damage the highest-power enemy unit by 1.
1255.ability_html: Order: Spawn a base copy of self on this row and set its base power to 1 less than self. Bonded (Melee): At the end of your turn, damage the highest-power enemy unit by 1.

Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
1255.flavor: See this here tattoo? 'At's me, hackin' at a dragon. A DRAGON, m'lady.

1256.name: Reaver Scout
1256.ability: Order: Spawn and play a base copy of an allied Bronze Soldier, excluding self.
1256.ability_html: Order: Spawn and play a base copy of an allied Bronze Soldier, excluding self.
1256.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1256.flavor: Haven't had much luck with monsters of late, so we enlisted.

1257.name: Tir ná Lia
1257.ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 0. Increase the value by the number of unique bronze Wild Hunt cards in your starting deck.
Order: Spawn and play Red Riders.
Devotion: Also Spawn Frost on your opponent's Melee (0) and Ranged (0) rows equal to the amounts lost during the last round transition.
1257.ability_html: Resilience. Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 0. Increase the value by the number of unique bronze Wild Hunt cards in your starting deck. Order: Spawn and play Red Riders. Devotion: Also Spawn Frost on your opponent's Melee (0) and Ranged (0) rows equal to the amounts lost during the last round transition.
1257.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards. Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
1257.flavor: Great beauty requires great sacrifice. Of entire civilizations, if need be.

1258.name: Caranthir: Golden Child
1258.ability: At the start of your turn, while in hand or deck, reset own power and boost self by the damage dealt by Frost in the last 5 enemy turns (0, 0, 0, 0, 0).
1258.ability_html: At the start of your turn, while in hand or deck, reset own power and boost self by the damage dealt by Frost in the last 5 enemy turns (0, 0, 0, 0, 0).
1258.keyword_html: Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
1258.flavor: The future of the Aen Elle spans not kingdoms, but worlds, and mine is the hand that guides us toward that destiny.

1259.name: Aen Elle Aristocrat
1259.ability:
Order (Dominance): Move an enemy unit to the other row.
At the end of your turn, Spawn Frost for 1 turn on each enemy row on which Frost was applied this turn.
1259.ability_html: Order (Dominance): Move an enemy unit to the other row. At the end of your turn, Spawn Frost for 1 turn on each enemy row on which Frost was applied this turn.
1259.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
1259.flavor: Those born with a silver spoon in their mouth rarely care to learn how it got there in the first place.

1260.name: Aen Elle Slave Trader
1260.ability: Deploy: Gain Vitality equal to the total duration of Frost on your opponent's side of the battlefield and Infuse an enemy unit with "At the end of your turn, if there's an enemy Aen Elle Slave Trader with higher power than your own, set own power to 1, then Lock self".
1260.ability_html: Deploy: Gain Vitality equal to the total duration of Frost on your opponent's side of the battlefield and Infuse an enemy unit with "At the end of your turn, if there's an enemy Aen Elle Slave Trader with higher power than your own, set own power to 1, then Lock self".
1260.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
1260.flavor: Why, we treat our stock with the utmost dignity of course, by providing them with every opportunity to serve the greatest of the Aen Elle.

1261.name: Sigi Reuven: Mastermind
1261.ability:
Deploy: Look at Collusion and a random unit from each Gang from your deck, then play 1.
Tribute 9: Play 2 instead.
Tribute costs 2 less for each unique Gang category you control.
1261.ability_html: Deploy: Look at Collusion and a random unit from each Gang from your deck, then play 1. Tribute 9: Play 2 instead. Tribute costs 2 less for each unique Gang category you control.
1261.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Gang: Criminal organisations including Blindeyes, Crownsplitters, Cutups, Firesworn, Salamandra and Tidecloaks. Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
1261.flavor: Ahh, Novigrad: a veritable cornucopia of culture and beauty. That is, if a shiv up the arse behind the Butcher's Yard's what tickles your fancy.

1262.name: Bart
1262.ability: Whenever you play a unit with a Gang category you don't control, gain a Coin for each unique Gang category you control.
1262.ability_html: Whenever you play a unit with a Gang category you don't control, gain a Coin for each unique Gang category you control.
1262.keyword_html: Gang: Criminal organisations including Blindeyes, Crownsplitters, Cutups, Firesworn, Salamandra and Tidecloaks. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.

1263.name: Little Bird
1263.ability:
Deploy: Infuse self with a Gang category of a unit in your deck.
Fee 2: Boost an allied unit by 1 for each unique Gang category you control.
Cooldown: 1
1263.ability_html: Deploy: Infuse self with a Gang category of a unit in your deck. Fee 2: Boost an allied unit by 1 for each unique Gang category you control. Cooldown: 1
1263.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Gang: Criminal organisations including Blindeyes, Crownsplitters, Cutups, Firesworn, Salamandra and Tidecloaks. Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
1263.flavor: Hearsay and rumours were generally dismissed as mere half-truths. Yet Reuven, with his slew of little birds perched in public houses throughout Novigrad, knew instinctively which half could be put to use.

1264.name: Pulling the Strings
1264.ability:
Profit 0.
Seize an enemy unit with 0 or less power.
Increase Profit by 1 for each unique Gang category in your starting deck.
Increase the power and decrease Profit by 1 for each unique Gang category you control.
1264.ability_html: Profit 0. Seize an enemy unit with 0 or less power. Increase Profit by 1 for each unique Gang category in your starting deck. Increase the power and decrease Profit by 1 for each unique Gang category you control.
1264.keyword_html: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead. Gang: Criminal organisations including Blindeyes, Crownsplitters, Cutups, Firesworn, Salamandra and Tidecloaks.
1264.flavor: Aptly named, the Crown represents an authority of the highest degree. One to whom folks sink to their lowest depths for in order to avoid becoming indebted.

1265.name: Yennefer: Illusionist
1265.ability:
Deploy: Spawn Yennefer's Illusion on this row.
The first time you Spawn a unit on your side of the battlefield each turn, damage the lowest-power enemy unit by the Spawned unit's base power.
Deathblow: Boost self by 1.

1265.flavor: Have limited trust in your sight when a mage is around.

Doomed.

1267.name: Triss: Meteor Shower
1267.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage all units on an enemy row by half their base power.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost all allied units on a row by half their base power.
1267.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage all units on an enemy row by half their base power. Deploy (Ranged): Boost all allied units on a row by half their base power.

1267.flavor: Next time you get the feeling I'm about to piss off Merigold, make sure and knock me upside the head - Lambert

1268.name: Loc Feainn: Convergence
1268.ability:
Doomed.
Create a bronze Scoia'tael unit with a primary category that you don't control.
1268.ability_html: Doomed. Create a bronze Scoia'tael unit with a primary category that you don't control.

1268.flavor: Here, all nature returns to its source; all life finds renewal.

1269.name: Gudrun Bjornsdottir
1269.ability: Fee 3 (Hoard 9): Infuse an enemy unit with "Whenever your opponent gains Coins, damage self by 1".
1269.ability_html: Fee 3 (Hoard 9): Infuse an enemy unit with "Whenever your opponent gains Coins, damage self by 1".
1269.keyword_html: Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins. Hoard: Trigger this ability if you possess the specified number of Coins or more. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
1269.flavor: Although her father promised her to the gods to win their favour in battle, Gudrun refused to be bound by vows she didn't make. She found her freedom among blue waters and salty wind.

1270.name: Eltibald
1270.ability:
Zeal. Order: Infuse an enemy unit with "Whenever your opponent plays a card, damage self by 1".
Cooldown: 3
Whenever you play a Cursed card, reduce the Cooldown by 1.

Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
1270.flavor: A torturer, a doomsayer, a madman. Eltibald was the first mage to delve into the secrets of the Black Sun curse. He heeded the warnings found in ancient texts and started the widespread hunt for the cursed children. Never hesitated to follow the voice of lesser evil...

1271.name: Curse of Lust

1271.ability_html: Order: Spawn a base copy of an enemy unit on the opposite row.
1271.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1271.flavor: Ironically, it was Eltibald's cruel response to this prophecy that made it impossible to tell whether the evil was there at inception, or born out of fear and persecution.
