1285.ability_html: Doomed. Immunity. Deathwish: Spawn a base copy of self on the opposite row.
1285.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1285.flavor: No, you're not hallucinating. And yes, they can see you.

1286.name: Ace up the Sleeve
1286.ability:
Doomed.
Damage an enemy unit by 2.
1286.ability_html: Doomed. Damage an enemy unit by 2.
1286.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
1286.flavor: Twinkle-twinkle shooting star,\nHow it leaves a lasting scar.

1287.name: Ard Feainn
1287.ability:
Resilience.
Order: Look at the top 2 cards from your deck, and choose one to move to the bottom.
If it was an Agent, give an enemy unit Spying. If it was an Aristocrat, give an enemy unit Bleeding (2).
Whenever you play an Aristocrat, refresh the Order.
While in deck, when you play a gold Aristocrat, Summon self to your Melee row.
1287.ability_html: Resilience. Order: Look at the top 2 cards from your deck, and choose one to move to the bottom. If it was an Agent, give an enemy unit Spying. If it was an Aristocrat, give an enemy unit Bleeding (2). Whenever you play an Aristocrat, refresh the Order. While in deck, when you play a gold Aristocrat, Summon self to your Melee row.
1287.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
1287.flavor: The Great Sun does not extend its light to those destined for the gutters.

1288.name: Torres var Emreis: Founder
1288.ability:
Doomed.
Deploy: Give Spying to 3 units with provision costs of 10 or less from your opponent's deck, then Spawn base copies of them into your deck. Boost self by 1 for each provision below the limit.
Order: Banish up to 3 cards from your starting deck from your deck.
While in hand or deck, evolve after you win a round.
1288.ability_html: Doomed. Deploy: Give Spying to 3 units with provision costs of 10 or less from your opponent's deck, then Spawn base copies of them into your deck. Boost self by 1 for each provision below the limit. Order: Banish up to 3 cards from your starting deck from your deck. While in hand or deck, evolve after you win a round.
1288.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
1288.flavor: Like emperor, like empire: Grandiose, entitled, and hell-bent.

1289.name: Svalblod
1289.ability:
Deploy: Damage all units by 1. 
Whenever a Bear Abomination enters your side of the battlefield, repeat the Deploy ability.
The first time you deal 8 damage to units each turn, Spawn Svalblod Fanatic on this row.
1289.ability_html: Deploy: Damage all units by 1. Whenever a Bear Abomination enters your side of the battlefield, repeat the Deploy ability. The first time you deal 8 damage to units each turn, Spawn Svalblod Fanatic on this row.
1289.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1289.flavor: He proclaimed to his worshippers but one commandment: Kill.

1290.name: Tyr: Slayer of Yngvar
1290.ability:
Doomed.
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by the difference between its base and current power.
Deathblow: Gain Resilience.
While in hand or deck, evolve after you win a round.
1290.ability_html: Doomed. Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by the difference between its base and current power. Deathblow: Gain Resilience. While in hand or deck, evolve after you win a round.
1290.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
1290.flavor: His sword, forged in the fires of the deep, worthy of being wielded by a god, could crack the earth like lightning. And yet, only his were the hands capable of such artifice.

1291.name: Dana Méadbh: Provider
1291.ability:
Doomed.
Harmony. 
At the end of your turn, boost all non-Neutral units in your hand with primary categories that you don't control by 1.
While in hand or deck, evolve after you win a round.
1291.ability_html: Doomed. Harmony. At the end of your turn, boost all non-Neutral units in your hand with primary categories that you don't control by 1. While in hand or deck, evolve after you win a round.
1291.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a non-Neutral unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units.
1291.flavor: Every living thing is a child of the Queen of the Fields.

1292.name: Quarixis
1292.ability:
Harmony.
Whenever you play another Relict, Spawn and play Loc Feainn: Convergence.
1292.ability_html: Harmony. Whenever you play another Relict, Spawn and play Loc Feainn: Convergence.
1292.keyword_html: Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a non-Neutral unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1292.flavor: Those who come close enough to feel Loc Feainn's breeze on their skin hear a gentle voice. For the good-hearted, it's a warning to turn back swiftly. For the greedy and irreverent, it's a subtle call to a new life. To a new purpose. To eternal penitence in a new body.

1293.name: Melitele
1293.ability:
Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 5.
Whenever this unit is moved back into your deck, trigger an ability from the cycle:
Maiden - Boost all allied units by 0.
Mother - Spawn a random 4-provision Northern Realms unit on a random row where you control a unit.
Crone - Boost self by 1, then increase ability values by 1.
1293.ability_html: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 5. Whenever this unit is moved back into your deck, trigger an ability from the cycle: Maiden - Boost all allied units by 0. Mother - Spawn a random 4-provision Northern Realms unit on a random row where you control a unit. Crone - Boost self by 1, then increase ability values by 1.
1293.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1293.flavor: You've seen one goddess of fertility, you've seen them all.

1294.name: Temple of Melitele: Congregation
1294.ability:
Doomed. Immunity. Resilience.
Deploy: Create a legendary unit from your faction that is not in your starting deck 3 times, then shuffle them into your deck.
Order: Draw a unit of your choice and boost it by your hand size, then shuffle a card back into your deck.
While in hand or deck, evolve after you win a round.
1294.ability_html: Doomed. Immunity. Resilience. Deploy: Create a legendary unit from your faction that is not in your starting deck 3 times, then shuffle them into your deck. Order: Draw a unit of your choice and boost it by your hand size, then shuffle a card back into your deck. While in hand or deck, evolve after you win a round.
1294.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted. Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1294.flavor: Here in Ellander, mistaking our girls' vows of silence for tacit approval will get your arse tanned right quick.

1295.name: Dagon: Promised
1295.ability:
Doomed.
Deploy: Infuse 5 units in your deck with "Deathwish: Boost the lowest-power allied unit by 2 and worship Dagon" and Spawn Call of the Depths in your graveyard.
Order: Consume an allied unit.
Whenever you play a Deathwish unit, boost it by 1.
While in hand or deck, evolve after you win a round.
1295.ability_html: Doomed. Deploy: Infuse 5 units in your deck with "Deathwish: Boost the lowest-power allied unit by 2 and worship Dagon" and Spawn Call of the Depths in your graveyard. Order: Consume an allied unit. Whenever you play a Deathwish unit, boost it by 1. While in hand or deck, evolve after you win a round.
1295.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
1295.flavor: That is not dead which can eternal lie, and with strange aeons even death may die.

1296.name: Lilit's Omen
1296.ability: Summon 2 non-Neutral units without Veil from your deck to an allied row, then give them Doomed and Rupture.
1296.ability_html: Summon 2 non-Neutral units without Veil from your deck to an allied row, then give them Doomed and Rupture.
1296.keyword_html: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Rupture: At the end of owner's turn, damage this unit equal to its base power, then remove this status.
1296.flavor: If you ever happen to witness what looks like the overwhelming shadow of humanity's hatred and cruelty suffocating the skies ... be thankful it's just an omen.

1297.name: Saint Gregory: Justicar
1297.ability:
Doomed.
Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each unit you control and gain a Coin for each Firesworn card you control.
While in hand or deck, evolve after you win a round.
1297.ability_html: Doomed. Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each unit you control and gain a Coin for each Firesworn card you control. While in hand or deck, evolve after you win a round.
1297.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
1297.flavor: Retreat, heathen! I will not axe you twice.

1298.name: Count Reuven's Treasure
1298.ability:
Resilience.
Profit 0.
Increase the Profit by 1 for each Crime in your starting deck.
Deploy: Create a bronze Crime with provisions equal or less to the excess Coins gained from the Profit.
Whenever you gain Coins, gain Counters equal to the excess amount gained.
At the end of your turn, lower the Counter by 1 and gain a Coin.
Counter: 0
1298.ability_html: Resilience. Profit 0. Increase the Profit by 1 for each Crime in your starting deck. Deploy: Create a bronze Crime with provisions equal or less to the excess Coins gained from the Profit. Whenever you gain Coins, gain Counters equal to the excess amount gained. At the end of your turn, lower the Counter by 1 and gain a Coin. Counter: 0
1298.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
1298.flavor: Dijkstra's famed profanity - expressed in more than words.

1299.name: Masterful Sihil
1299.ability: Damage an enemy unit by 3, then play a bronze card from your hand, then move Masterful Sihil back to your hand.
1299.ability_html: Damage an enemy unit by 3, then play a bronze card from your hand, then move Masterful Sihil back to your hand.
1299.flavor: What's written on this blade? That a curse? No. An insult.

1300.name: Torres var Emreis: Highest Priest
1300.ability:
Doomed.
Assimilate.
Deploy: Move a non-Doomed allied unit that is not from your starting deck, excluding self, back to your hand, boost it by 2 and give it Doomed, then play a card.
If there is no valid target, Create and play a bronze unit from your opponent's faction and boost it by 2 instead.
1300.ability_html: Doomed. Assimilate. Deploy: Move a non-Doomed allied unit that is not from your starting deck, excluding self, back to your hand, boost it by 2 and give it Doomed, then play a card. If there is no valid target, Create and play a bronze unit from your opponent's faction and boost it by 2 instead.
1300.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Assimilate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a card that is not from your starting deck. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
1300.flavor: Like emperor, like empire: Grandiose, entitled, and hell-bent.

1301.name: Tyr: Master of An Skellig
1301.ability:
Doomed.
Deploy: Move a bronze non-Neutral unit from your graveyard to your hand, then Discard a card.
The first time a bronze unit leaves your graveyard each allied turn, boost it by its base power.
1301.ability_html: Doomed. Deploy: Move a bronze non-Neutral unit from your graveyard to your hand, then Discard a card. The first time a bronze unit leaves your graveyard each allied turn, boost it by its base power.
1301.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
1301.flavor: His sword, forged in the fires of the deep, worthy of being wielded by a god, could crack the earth like lightning. And yet, only his were the hands capable of such artifice.

1302.name: Dana Méadbh: Caretaker
1302.ability:
Doomed.
Harmony. 
Deploy: Boost the lowest power allied unit of each unique non-Neutral primary category your control by 2.
Whenever you play a non-Neutral unit of a primary category you don't control, boost it by 2.
1302.ability_html: Doomed. Harmony. Deploy: Boost the lowest power allied unit of each unique non-Neutral primary category your control by 2. Whenever you play a non-Neutral unit of a primary category you don't control, boost it by 2.
1302.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a non-Neutral unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1302.flavor: Every living thing is a child of the Queen of the Fields.

1303.name: Temple of Melitele: Pilgrimage
1303.ability:
Doomed. Immunity. Resilience.
Deploy: Shuffle an allied unit back into your deck, then shuffle an enemy unit of the same power or less back into your opponent's deck.
Order: Play the shuffled unit from your deck.
1303.ability_html: Doomed. Immunity. Resilience. Deploy: Shuffle an allied unit back into your deck, then shuffle an enemy unit of the same power or less back into your opponent's deck. Order: Play the shuffled unit from your deck.
1303.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted. Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1303.flavor: Here in Ellander, mistaking our girls' vows of silence for tacit approval will get your arse tanned right quick.

1304.name: Dagon: Risen
1304.ability:
Doomed.
At the end of your turn, increase the Counter by 1.
Deathwish: Trigger abilities up to the Counter's value:
1 - Summon the lowest-power bronze Deathwish unit from your graveyard to this row.
2 - Boost all allied units on this row by 1.
3 - Spawn Storm on the opposite row for 2 turns.
4 - Damage the 2 lowest-power enemy units by 2.
5 - Spawn a base copy of self in your hand.
Counter: 1
1304.ability_html: Doomed. At the end of your turn, increase the Counter by 1. Deathwish: Trigger abilities up to the Counter's value: 1 - Summon the lowest-power bronze Deathwish unit from your graveyard to this row. 2 - Boost all allied units on this row by 1. 3 - Spawn Storm on the opposite row for 2 turns. 4 - Damage the 2 lowest-power enemy units by 2. 5 - Spawn a base copy of self in your hand. Counter: 1
1304.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Spawn: Add a card to the game. Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
1304.flavor: That is not dead which can eternal lie, and with strange aeons even death may die.

1305.name: Saint Gregory: Martyr
1305.ability:
Doomed.
Insanity.
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by the number of Firesworn cards on this row.
Fee 2: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Berserk 1: Boost all allied Firesworn units by 1 and damage all enemy units by 1, then destroy self.
1305.ability_html: Doomed. Insanity. Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by the number of Firesworn cards on this row. Fee 2: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Berserk 1: Boost all allied Firesworn units by 1 and damage all enemy units by 1, then destroy self.
1305.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Insanity: If you have insufficient Coins, damage this unit by its Fee amount, ignoring its Armor, to trigger its Fee ability.\nNote: Insanity cannot be used if it would destroy the unit and works only if damage is inflicted. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins. Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount.
1305.flavor: Retreat, heathen! I will not axe you twice.

1306.name: Abduction
1306.ability:
Echo.
Play a unit that isn't from your opponent's starting deck from their deck with a provision cost of 10 or less. Boost it by 1 for each provision below the limit.
1306.ability_html: Echo. Play a unit that isn't from your opponent's starting deck from their deck with a provision cost of 10 or less. Boost it by 1 for each provision below the limit.
1306.keyword_html: Echo: At the beginning of the round, move this card from the graveyard to the top of its owner's deck. Give it Doomed.
1306.flavor: Steady, steady, just a little lower... There we go. That thing ate the Captain's helmet. We'll need to get it back.

1307.name: Sandor de Baccalà
1307.ability:
Deploy: Shuffle a card from your deck into your opponent's deck.
Order: Spawn a Drone at the bottom of your opponent's deck and set its power to the difference between the number of cards in the players' decks.
Whenever a card enters or leaves your opponent's deck, boost self by 1.
1307.ability_html: Deploy: Shuffle a card from your deck into your opponent's deck. Order: Spawn a Drone at the bottom of your opponent's deck and set its power to the difference between the number of cards in the players' decks. Whenever a card enters or leaves your opponent's deck, boost self by 1.
1307.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1307.flavor: Having been denied a rightful tract of land by his duke of an uncle, Sandor set out to build his own duchy from the ground up, starting with the realm of seedy, bottom-shelf operations within the Imperial Military Intelligence best suited for fools and madmen...

1308.name: Contaminator
1308.ability: Deploy: Banish an enemy unit with 3 or less power, then, if it wasn't a Token, Spawn its base copy at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
1308.ability_html: Deploy: Banish an enemy unit with 3 or less power, then, if it wasn't a Token, Spawn its base copy at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
1308.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1308.flavor: Destroying the supplies was merely a convenient side effect of the main goal: make them believe the food from their allies is tainted, and leave them with a choice: Nilfgaard or famine.

1309.name: Toxicologist
1309.ability: Deploy: Infuse an enemy unit with "Whenever a card enters or leaves your deck, damage self by 1", then, if it wasn't a Token, Spawn its base copy at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
1309.ability_html: Deploy: Infuse an enemy unit with "Whenever a card enters or leaves your deck, damage self by 1", then, if it wasn't a Token, Spawn its base copy at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
1309.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1309.flavor: Voted least likely to live to old age by the other chemists in the academy. And that was really saying something.

1310.name: Kraken
1310.ability:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Move 3 enemy units to this row, damage them by 2 and Spawn Storm for 3 turns on this row.
Deathwish: At the end of this turn, Summon self to the opposite row and boost self by the number of unique allied Beasts.
1310.ability_html: Disloyal. Deploy: Move 3 enemy units to this row, damage them by 2 and Spawn Storm for 3 turns on this row. Deathwish: At the end of this turn, Summon self to the opposite row and boost self by the number of unique allied Beasts.
1310.keyword_html: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
1310.flavor: Once released, there's no un-releasing it.

1311.name: Kelpie
1311.ability:
Deploy: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 0 turns. This value is increased by 1 for every 3 Beasts in your starting deck.
Whenever an enemy unit takes damage from Rain or Storm, boost a random unboosted allied Beast by 1.
1311.ability_html: Deploy: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 0 turns. This value is increased by 1 for every 3 Beasts in your starting deck. Whenever an enemy unit takes damage from Rain or Storm, boost a random unboosted allied Beast by 1.
1311.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1. Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
1311.flavor: Tis a malevolent spirit! 'Tis animated seaweed! Nay, ye hallucinatin' dolts, 'tis clearly a horse!

1312.name: Sea Serpent
1312.ability:
Deploy: Boost self by 0 and damage an enemy unit by 3.
Increase the boost by 1 for each opponent turn in which Rain or Storm triggered this round.
1312.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 0 and damage an enemy unit by 3. Increase the boost by 1 for each opponent turn in which Rain or Storm triggered this round.
1312.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1. Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
1312.flavor: Hire a dragonslayer? For some oversized eel? Ha! Mainlander nonsense!

1313.name: Anglerfish
1313.ability:
At the end of your turn, if there is Rain or Storm on both enemy rows, Summon self from your deck to your Ranged row.
At the end of your turn, if neither enemy row has Rain or Storm, move self to the bottom of your deck.
1313.ability_html: At the end of your turn, if there is Rain or Storm on both enemy rows, Summon self from your deck to your Ranged row. At the end of your turn, if neither enemy row has Rain or Storm, move self to the bottom of your deck.
1313.keyword_html: Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1. Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
1313.flavor: The good news is, you'll never actually encounter one outside of your deepest, darkest nightmares.

1314.name: Telianyn aep Collen
1314.ability:
Deploy: Shuffle an allied unit with a provision cost of 9 or less into your deck, then play the top Elf with a Deploy ability from your deck. 
Order: Spawn and play Backup Plan. If this unit is Doomed, damage an enemy unit by the number of Doomed units you control instead.
1314.ability_html: Deploy: Shuffle an allied unit with a provision cost of 9 or less into your deck, then play the top Elf with a Deploy ability from your deck. Order: Spawn and play Backup Plan. If this unit is Doomed, damage an enemy unit by the number of Doomed units you control instead.
1314.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
1314.flavor: Months spent foolproofing this operation, only to find I should have hired better listeners... My mother must be laughing somewhere.

1315.name: The Heist
1315.ability:
Echo.
Spawn 3 Cargos on an allied row.
1315.ability_html: Echo. Spawn 3 Cargos on an allied row.
1315.keyword_html: Echo: At the beginning of the round, move this card from the graveyard to the top of its owner's deck. Give it Doomed. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1315.flavor: Plan's simple: same as last time, but better.

1316.name: Backup Plan
1316.ability: Damage the last unit played by your opponent by 2 and Create a bronze Scoia'tael Elf with a Deploy ability that was not in your starting deck.
1316.ability_html: Damage the last unit played by your opponent by 2 and Create a bronze Scoia'tael Elf with a Deploy ability that was not in your starting deck.
1316.keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1316.flavor: If we can't rob them in the streets, we fight them in the woods!

1317.name: Trickster
1317.ability: Deploy: Move the last played enemy unit to the other row and Infuse it with "Whenever your opponent plays an Elf, damage self by 1".
1317.ability_html: Deploy: Move the last played enemy unit to the other row and Infuse it with "Whenever your opponent plays an Elf, damage self by 1".
1317.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities.
1317.flavor: Living among humans for so many years had revealed some unique vulnerabilities to the Scoia'tael. For one, apparently not all dh'oine recognize sarcasm...

1318.name: Sigismund Dijkstra
1318.ability:
Order: Play a boosted unit from your deck.
While in deck, whenever this unit receives a boost from other abilities, boost self by the same amount.
1318.ability_html: Order: Play a boosted unit from your deck. While in deck, whenever this unit receives a boost from other abilities, boost self by the same amount.
1318.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.

1319.name: Drakenborg
1319.ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Summon a unit from your deck to this row and Lock it.
Order: Give an allied unit Vitality 0. Increase this value by the amount of boost that was on the Summoned unit.
1319.ability_html: Resilience. Deploy: Summon a unit from your deck to this row and Lock it. Order: Give an allied unit Vitality 0. Increase this value by the amount of boost that was on the Summoned unit.
1319.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
1319.flavor: It's not exactly a holiday, no, but there is plenty of singing, if that's what you're into.

1320.name: Redanian Secret Service
1320.ability:
Zeal. Order: Purify an allied unit.
If you do not control Redanian Secret Service, when an allied unit gains a status, Summon self from your deck to its row.
1320.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Purify an allied unit. If you do not control Redanian Secret Service, when an allied unit gains a status, Summon self from your deck to its row.
1320.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Purify: Remove all statuses. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
1320.flavor: They say the aristocracy can sniff out a commoner among them. However, liberal application of alcohol and perfume can throw off the scent for long enough to strike up a conversation or two. Perhaps even gain their trust.

1321.name: Redanian Agent
1321.ability:
Veil.
Order: Boost a unit in your deck by 1.
Cooldown: 2
1321.ability_html: Veil. Order: Boost a unit in your deck by 1. Cooldown: 2
1321.keyword_html: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.

1322.name: Hive Mind
1322.ability:
Choose 4 different bronze Kikimore units.
While in your graveyard, the first time you Spawn a Drone on the battlefield each allied turn, transform it into the next chosen Kikimore unit.
1322.ability_html: Choose 4 different bronze Kikimore units. While in your graveyard, the first time you Spawn a Drone on the battlefield each allied turn, transform it into the next chosen Kikimore unit.
1322.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1322.flavor: A thousand mindless horrors, all racing toward you in perfect accord, relentless, ravenous.

1323.name: Acid Spit
1323.ability: Infuse an enemy unit with "If this unit has more than 1 power, whenever your opponent Spawns one or more units, damage self by 1. When own power reaches 1, Infuse this ability to adjacent units which don't have it".
1323.ability_html: Infuse an enemy unit with "If this unit has more than 1 power, whenever your opponent Spawns one or more units, damage self by 1. When own power reaches 1, Infuse this ability to adjacent units which don't have it".
1323.keyword_html: Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1323.flavor: Bugspray doesn't always mean what you think it means.

1324.name: Kikimore Stalker
1324.ability:
Veil.
Zeal. Order (Predator): Damage an enemy unit by 1 or Consume an allied Drone.
Charge: 1
Whenever you Spawn one or more Insectoids, gain a Charge.
1324.ability_html: Veil. Zeal. Order (Predator): Damage an enemy unit by 1 or Consume an allied Drone. Charge: 1 Whenever you Spawn one or more Insectoids, gain a Charge.
1324.keyword_html: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Predator: This ability can only target units with power lower than own. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Spawn: Add a card to the game.

1325.name: Kikimore Hatchling
1325.ability:
Order: Remove 1 boost from self, then Spawn a Drone on this row.
Cooldown: 1
Whenever you play an Organic card, boost self by 1.
1325.ability_html: Order: Remove 1 boost from self, then Spawn a Drone on this row. Cooldown: 1 Whenever you play an Organic card, boost self by 1.
1325.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
1325.flavor: As a general rule, the more brightly colored the egg, the less you'll want to fry it.

1326.name: Casimir Bassi
1326.ability:
Veil.
Profit 3.
Deploy: Spend all your Coins, then boost self by the number of Coins spent.
Once per turn, when you reach 0 Coins, Spawn Explosives on this row.
1326.ability_html: Veil. Profit 3. Deploy: Spend all your Coins, then boost self by the number of Coins spent. Once per turn, when you reach 0 Coins, Spawn Explosives on this row.
1326.keyword_html: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1326.flavor: He would have done anything for love, but a fireworks display never quite felt this warranted.

1327.name: Eveline Gallo
1327.ability: At the end of your turn, if you have 0 Coins, gain 3 Coins.
1327.ability_html: At the end of your turn, if you have 0 Coins, gain 3 Coins.
1327.keyword_html: Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
1327.flavor: One somersault into a crossbow shot, aimed with the feet, through a pigeon, mid-flight, blindfolded—and suddenly nothing's impossible.

1328.name: Open, Sesame!
1328.ability:
Profit 5.
While in your graveyard, whenever you reach 0 Coins, remove a Counter.
When the Counter reaches 0, gain 4 Coins.
Counter: 6
1328.ability_html: Profit 5. While in your graveyard, whenever you reach 0 Coins, remove a Counter. When the Counter reaches 0, gain 4 Coins. Counter: 6
1328.keyword_html: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
1328.flavor: I'll have any lock you need picked before you even hire me.

1329.name: Oxenfurt Guard
1329.ability: Fee 2: Boost adjacent units by 1. If this reduced your Coins to 0, boost by 2 instead.
1329.ability_html: Fee 2: Boost adjacent units by 1. If this reduced your Coins to 0, boost by 2 instead.
1329.keyword_html: Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
1329.flavor: Cooler heads will prevail... provided they're holding the cards.

1330.name: Call of the Depths
1330.ability: After Dagon has been worshipped 4 times, Spawn Dagon: Promised on your Melee row and Banish self.
1330.ability_html: After Dagon has been worshipped 4 times, Spawn Dagon: Promised on your Melee row and Banish self.
1330.keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
1330.flavor: That is not dead which can eternal lie, and with strange aeons even death may die.

1331.name: Cargo
1331.ability:
Doomed.
Order: Replay a non-Neutral Agent, Bandit, or Soldier that wasn't played this turn and give it Doomed.
1331.ability_html: Doomed. Order: Replay a non-Neutral Agent, Bandit, or Soldier that wasn't played this turn and give it Doomed.
1331.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1331.flavor: Six foot, seven foot, eight foot box!

1332.name: Explosives
1332.ability:
Doomed.
Fee 3: Damage an enemy unit by 3, then destroy self.
At the end of your turn, reduce the Fee cost by 1. If the Fee cost was 0, destroy self instead.
1332.ability_html: Doomed. Fee 3: Damage an enemy unit by 3, then destroy self. At the end of your turn, reduce the Fee cost by 1. If the Fee cost was 0, destroy self instead.
1332.keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
1332.flavor: Fucking run fer it, ya daft bastard—that ain't no bleedin' carrot!

1333.name: Baccalà
1333.ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Spawn Imperial Fleet to the left of self and Imperial Marine to the right of self.
Order: Boost 2 allied units by 2 and swap their positions.
1333.ability_html: Resilience. Deploy: Spawn Imperial Fleet to the left of self and Imperial Marine to the right of self. Order: Boost 2 allied units by 2 and swap their positions.
1333.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1333.flavor: Ever hungry for tar and timber, for cloth and cable, for lard and labor. It's a point of pride for Baccalà that thirty fresh frigates leave its shipyard every year.

1334.name: Admiral Rompally
1334.ability:
Zeal. Order: Choose 3 enemy units, then give them Lock, Poison and Spying, in that order.
At the end of your turn, boost self by the highest number of statuses on an enemy unit.
1334.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Choose 3 enemy units, then give them Lock, Poison and Spying, in that order. At the end of your turn, boost self by the highest number of statuses on an enemy unit.
1334.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities. Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it. Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
1334.flavor: Some call him a hero, some call him a genius. Others prefer to call him a pompous prick. Funnily enough, all are in the right.

1335.name: The Catriona
1335.ability:
Flanking. 
Order: Poison a non-Poisoned unit with at least 1 status.
At the end of your turn, gain a Charge.
Charge: 1
1335.ability_html: Flanking. Order: Poison a non-Poisoned unit with at least 1 status. At the end of your turn, gain a Charge. Charge: 1
1335.keyword_html: Flanking: If this unit is adjacent to only one card: on your Melee row, its end of turn ability is triggered twice; on your Ranged row, gain 1 Armor at the end of your turn. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
1335.flavor: This humble, rat-infested excuse for a hulk will go down in history as the harbinger of plague.

1336.name: Battle Stations!
1336.ability: Play up to 2 bronze cards from your hand, then draw as many cards.
1336.ability_html: Play up to 2 bronze cards from your hand, then draw as many cards.
1336.flavor: Those who desire hegemony over the seas must be ready to pay for it with blood.

1337.name: Imperial Fleet
1337.ability:
Zeal. Order: Infuse an enemy unit with "At the end of your turn, damage self for each active Flanking unit on the opposite row".
Charge: 1
1337.ability_html: Zeal. Order: Infuse an enemy unit with "At the end of your turn, damage self for each active Flanking unit on the opposite row". Charge: 1
1337.keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Flanking: If this unit is adjacent to only one card: on your Melee row, its end of turn ability is triggered twice; on your Ranged row, gain 1 Armor at the end of your turn. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
1337.flavor: Sirens scatter, tritons tremble, krakens burrow in the mud when the Emperor's mighty fleet ventures forth to rule the waves!

1338.name: Imperial Marine
1338.ability:
Flanking.
Zeal. Order: Choose a card from your deck.
At the end of your turn, move it up by one position in your deck. If it's on the top, boost self by 1 instead.
1338.ability_html: Flanking. Zeal. Order: Choose a card from your deck. At the end of your turn, move it up by one position in your deck. If it's on the top, boost self by 1 instead.
1338.keyword_html: Flanking: If this unit is adjacent to only one card: on your Melee row, its end of turn ability is triggered twice; on your Ranged row, gain 1 Armor at the end of your turn. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1338.flavor: The canvas to trap the winds, the ropes to direct them, and the muscle to pull the ropes—all necessary components of a sea-going vessel.

1339.name: Hjalmar: Seawolf
1339.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Clash with an enemy unit.
Whenever you play a Raid, remove all Armor from self and adjacent Pirates and Ships, then boost them and self by the amounts removed.
1339.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Clash with an enemy unit. Whenever you play a Raid, remove all Armor from self and adjacent Pirates and Ships, then boost them and self by the amounts removed.
1339.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Clash: Units simultanously damage each other by their power. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
1339.flavor: Heave, lads, heave! ...I meant the SHIP, not yer blasted entrails!

1340.name: Kaer Trolde
1340.ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Create and play a bronze an Craite unit.
Order: Give an allied unit 6 Armor, then it Clashes with an enemy unit.
1340.ability_html: Resilience. Deploy: Create and play a bronze an Craite unit. Order: Give an allied unit 6 Armor, then it Clashes with an enemy unit.
1340.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Clash: Units simultanously damage each other by their power.
1340.flavor: Skalds say Kaer Trolde is at its most beautiful during a raging storm, when the thundering sea crashes against its blood-soaked battlements.

1341.name: Yustianna an Craite
1341.ability:
Veteran.
Deploy: Damage self by own base power, then split as much damage randomly between enemy units.
1341.ability_html: Veteran. Deploy: Damage self by own base power, then split as much damage randomly between enemy units.
1341.keyword_html: Veteran: At the start of the second and third round, increase the base power of this unit by 1. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1341.flavor: Never EVER get between an an Craite and glory.

1342.name: Naval Supremacy
1342.ability:
Create and play a bronze Skellige Ship.
While in graveyard, whenever a unit is played, damage it by 1.
After 13 damage has been dealt, Banish self.
1342.ability_html: Create and play a bronze Skellige Ship. While in graveyard, whenever a unit is played, damage it by 1. After 13 damage has been dealt, Banish self.
1342.keyword_html: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
1342.flavor: The black-clads are wise to outnumber us like this. It's still their funeral, but with at least a bit o' fun.

1343.name: Abordage
1343.ability:
Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Bloodthirst 2: Also play a Pirate from your hand, then draw a card.
1343.ability_html: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Bloodthirst 2: Also play a Pirate from your hand, then draw a card.
1343.keyword_html: Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
1343.flavor: Let some other fool go first. And try not to slip on blood. Oh, and make sure the captain sees you killing someone, if you hope for a share in the booty.

1344.name: Funeral Boat
1344.ability: Whenever a card enters either graveyard during your turn, damage a random enemy unit by 1.
1344.ability_html: Whenever a card enters either graveyard during your turn, damage a random enemy unit by 1.
1344.flavor: Those who won their fortune at sea go back to the sea. Farewell, warrior.

1345.name: Angus Bri Cri
1345.ability:
Deploy: For the rest of the game, whenever an Elven Deadeye enters your side of the battlefield, boost it by 1. 
If your starting deck has at least 4 unique Traps, this card starts in your hand.
1345.ability_html: Deploy: For the rest of the game, whenever an Elven Deadeye enters your side of the battlefield, boost it by 1. If your starting deck has at least 4 unique Traps, this card starts in your hand.
1345.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1345.flavor: These pests seem to think US surrounded, Riordain. Ha!

1346.name: Riordain
1346.ability:
Deploy: If played adjacent to at least one:
Trap - Play an Elf from your deck.
Elf - Play a Trap from your deck.
1346.ability_html: Deploy: If played adjacent to at least one: Trap - Play an Elf from your deck. Elf - Play a Trap from your deck.
1346.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1346.flavor: Curb your excitement, Angus. You want the dh'oine to suspect?

1347.name: Deception
1347.ability:
Ambush (Timer 3): Spawn 3 Elven Deadeyes on this row.
Spring: Spawn 2 Elven Deadeyes on this row.
1347.ability_html: Ambush (Timer 3): Spawn 3 Elven Deadeyes on this row. Spring: Spawn 2 Elven Deadeyes on this row.
1347.keyword_html: Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met. Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Spring: Manual activation of a face-down Trap. Spring is activated automatically on a Trap played next to an Artifact. Cards with Spring are flipped over after use.
1347.flavor: Should have known better than to think you'd have known better!

1348.name: Sticky Situation
1348.ability:
Ambush: When your opponent plays a unit with 4 or less power, flip self.
At the end of your turn, boost adjacent units by [2]. When your opponent passes while this card is face-up, Lock self.
Spring: Boost a unit in your hand by [6], then Lock self.
Whenever your opponent passes, decrease the boost values by 1.
1348.ability_html: Ambush: When your opponent plays a unit with 4 or less power, flip self. At the end of your turn, boost adjacent units by [2]. When your opponent passes while this card is face-up, Lock self. Spring: Boost a unit in your hand by [6], then Lock self. Whenever your opponent passes, decrease the boost values by 1.
1348.keyword_html: Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities. Spring: Manual activation of a face-down Trap. Spring is activated automatically on a Trap played next to an Artifact. Cards with Spring are flipped over after use.

1349.name: Hostage Taker
1349.ability:
Deploy: Seize an enemy unit with 0 or less power, then transform the Seized unit into an Elven Deadeye without changing its power. 
The maximum power is increased by 1 for each Trap you played this round.
1349.ability_html: Deploy: Seize an enemy unit with 0 or less power, then transform the Seized unit into an Elven Deadeye without changing its power. The maximum power is increased by 1 for each Trap you played this round.
1349.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
1349.flavor: Of all the words that the Scoia'tael have never adopted, negotiation really stands out.

1350.name: Trapmaker
1350.ability: Deploy: Boost self by 3 for each face-down allied Trap.
1350.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 3 for each face-down allied Trap.
1350.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1350.flavor: Always the same with these people: Ahhh, I can't feel my legs! You'd think they'd at least appreciate the craftsmanship...

1351.name: Ravanen Kimbolt
1351.ability:
Deploy: Boost 3 bronze units in your deck by 1.
The first time an allied unit uses its Order each turn, Summon a random unit with the same power from your deck to this row.
1351.ability_html: Deploy: Boost 3 bronze units in your deck by 1. The first time an allied unit uses its Order each turn, Summon a random unit with the same power from your deck to this row.
1351.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
1351.flavor: A man who almost wore the crown is a deadly enemy—for once he's had a whiff of royal power, he'll never cede his ambitions.

1352.name: King Demavend III
1352.ability:
Deploy: Banish 3 cards from your deck.
Order: Play a base copy of one of them, then remove it from the list.
Cooldown: 4
1352.ability_html: Deploy: Banish 3 cards from your deck. Order: Play a base copy of one of them, then remove it from the list. Cooldown: 4
1352.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
1352.flavor: Even after his kingdom was ripped apart by a Nilfgaardian invasion and a perfidious Kaedweni land grab, he remained the most dignified of the Northern monarchs.

1353.name: Bernard Loredo
1353.ability: Order: Duel a random enemy unit.
1353.ability_html: Order: Duel a random enemy unit.
1353.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Duel: Units take turns dealing damage equal to their power until one of them is destroyed.
1353.flavor: Any border town needs a strong-arm rule. A toast to the commandant!

1354.name: Flotsam
1354.ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Create a bronze Northern Realms unit with an Order ability.
Order: Refresh an allied bronze unit's Order, then give it Zeal.
1354.ability_html: Resilience. Deploy: Create a bronze Northern Realms unit with an Order ability. Order: Refresh an allied bronze unit's Order, then give it Zeal.
1354.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
1354.flavor: There are backwaters, there are shitholes, and then there's Flotsam.

1355.name: Ship Ballista
1355.ability:
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2, then boost a random non-boosted unit in your deck by the excess damage dealt.
Increase the damage for each time you used an Order ability this turn.
1355.ability_html: Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2, then boost a random non-boosted unit in your deck by the excess damage dealt. Increase the damage for each time you used an Order ability this turn.
1355.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1355.flavor: Shoot first, worry about the whom later.

1356.name: Onager
1356.ability: Whenever you use an Order ability, damage a random enemy unit by 1.
1356.ability_html: Whenever you use an Order ability, damage a random enemy unit by 1.
1356.keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
1356.flavor:
By order of the commander, the following are no longer to be used as payload:
-Vegetables
-Dung
-Heads of prisoners
-Other parts of said prisoners

1357.name: King Chrum
1357.ability:
Deploy (Might): Gain Resilience.
The base power of this card is equal to the number of Ogroids in your starting deck.
1357.ability_html: Deploy (Might): Gain Resilience. The base power of this card is equal to the number of Ogroids in your starting deck.
1357.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Might: Trigger this ability if you control a unit with 10 or more power on each of your rows. Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
1357.flavor: Thrum's valley kingdom was little more than a glorified toll road. Chrum, however, had expansion on his mind. Expansion, and reform.

1358.name: Tugo the Elder
1358.ability:
At the end of your turn, boost the lowest-power unit you control by 1. 
Might: Boost all lowest-power units you control by 1 instead.
1358.ability_html: At the end of your turn, boost the lowest-power unit you control by 1. Might: Boost all lowest-power units you control by 1 instead.
1358.keyword_html: Might: Trigger this ability if you control a unit with 10 or more power on each of your rows.
1358.flavor: The wisest troll on the entire Continent... likely never had much competition in the first place.

1359.name: Lord Riptide
1359.ability:
Deploy (Melee): Clash with the highest-power enemy unit.
Might: At the end of your turn, while in hand, gain 1 Armor.
1359.ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Clash with the highest-power enemy unit. Might: At the end of your turn, while in hand, gain 1 Armor.
1359.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Clash: Units simultanously damage each other by their power. Might: Trigger this ability if you control a unit with 10 or more power on each of your rows. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
1359.flavor: It ain't superstition, brother. Coastal waters vanishing when they shouldn't? Might as well give it a name.

1360.name: Girdle of Giant Strength
1360.ability:
Boost an allied unit by 10.
Might: When you play an Ogroid, play self from your graveyard and gain Doomed.
1360.ability_html: Boost an allied unit by 10. Might: When you play an Ogroid, play self from your graveyard and gain Doomed.
1360.keyword_html: Might: Trigger this ability if you control a unit with 10 or more power on each of your rows. Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
1360.flavor: A sturdy leather belt, clearly crafted for a titan, yet inexplicably fits the torso of anyone who tries it on. Although the girdle makes its wearer as strong as a giant, it does not make them giant-size.

1361.name: Ogre Warrior
1361.ability: Deploy: Boost self by 2 for each allied unit with 10 or more power.
1361.ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 2 for each allied unit with 10 or more power.
1361.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.

1362.name: Enraged Cyclops
1362.ability:
Timer 7: Set own base power to 10.
Deploy: Reduce the Timer by 1 for each Ogroid in your hand.
1362.ability_html: Timer 7: Set own base power to 10. Deploy: Reduce the Timer by 1 for each Ogroid in your hand.
1362.keyword_html: Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1362.flavor: You won’t like him when he’s angry. Or any other time, come to think of it…

1363.name: The Acherontia
1363.ability:
Profit 6.
Vice 12: Play the top card from your deck.
1363.ability_html: Profit 6. Vice 12: Play the top card from your deck.
1363.keyword_html: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Vice: Trigger this ability after you spent the specified amount of Coins, then reset own counter.
1363.flavor: No amount of gold could ever weigh this ship down. Like a force of nature, its pursuit of riches was unstoppable.

1364.name: Captain Yago
1364.ability:
Deploy: Gain as many Coins as you spent this turn.
Fee 1: Boost an allied Pirate by 1.
1364.ability_html: Deploy: Gain as many Coins as you spent this turn. Fee 1: Boost an allied Pirate by 1.
1364.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round. Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
1364.flavor: Often mistaken for a Zerrikanian emissary for his refined clothing and composed demeanor... but what kind of diplomat carries a fucking ballista?

1365.name: Ixora
1365.ability: Vice 8: Destroy the lowest-power enemy unit.
1365.ability_html: Vice 8: Destroy the lowest-power enemy unit.
1365.keyword_html: Vice: Trigger this ability after you spent the specified amount of Coins, then reset own counter.
1365.flavor: The marching clink of Ixora's iron heel showed that she'd never quite left her old life as a Kerack city guard behind. Only the pay, and the laws.

1366.name: Mercenary Contract
1366.ability:
Profit 5.
Spend all your Coins, then play a unit from your deck with a provision cost up to the number of Coins spent.
1366.ability_html: Profit 5. Spend all your Coins, then play a unit from your deck with a provision cost up to the number of Coins spent.
1366.keyword_html: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
1366.flavor: Sign right here, on the dotted... ignore the blood.

1367.name: Magpie
1367.ability:
Profit 2.
Fee 1: Spawn a Syndicate Crown on this row.
Cooldown: 1
1367.ability_html: Profit 2. Fee 1: Spawn a Syndicate Crown on this row. Cooldown: 1
1367.keyword_html: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
1367.flavor: The captain named each of his magpies Tymon, yet whenever he'd calls out this name, they would somehow always know which one he meant.

1368.name: Acherontia Deckhand
1368.ability_html: Profit 1. Vice 3: Boost self by 1.
1368.keyword_html: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Vice: Trigger this ability after you spent the specified amount of Coins, then reset own counter.
1368.flavor: Hard not to learn humility over the years, watching all that fortune shuffled along, behind crossed blades, and under threat of a beating.

1369.name: Henry var Attre
1369.ability: Deploy: If your opponent has not passed and their hand is not full, Create a legendary unit from your faction that was not in your starting deck, add it to your opponent's hand, move the rest to the bottom of your opponent's deck, then Create a legendary unit from your opponent's faction that was not in their starting deck, add it to your hand, put the rest on the bottom of your deck.
1369.ability_html: Deploy: If your opponent has not passed and their hand is not full, Create a legendary unit from your faction that was not in your starting deck, add it to your opponent's hand, move the rest to the bottom of your opponent's deck, then Create a legendary unit from your opponent's faction that was not in their starting deck, add it to your hand, put the rest on the bottom of your deck.
1369.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
1369.flavor: The line between diplomacy and espionage is a thin one, especially in Nilfgaard.

1370.name: Rosa and Edna var Attre
1370.ability:
Deploy: Create a bronze unit from your opponent's faction, then Spawn it on the opposite row and give it Spying.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 0. Increase this value by 1 for each unique Aristocrat in your starting deck.
Deathblow: Spawn and play a Doomed base copy of the destroyed unit.
1370.ability_html: Deploy: Create a bronze unit from your opponent's faction, then Spawn it on the opposite row and give it Spying. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 0. Increase this value by 1 for each unique Aristocrat in your starting deck. Deathblow: Spawn and play a Doomed base copy of the destroyed unit.
1370.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.

1371.name: Otkell
1371.ability:
Deploy (Ranged): Damage self down to 1, then play all copies of Freya's Blessing from your graveyard, and give them Doomed.
At the start of the game, increase own base power for each Alchemy in your starting deck.
1371.ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Damage self down to 1, then play all copies of Freya's Blessing from your graveyard, and give them Doomed. At the start of the game, increase own base power for each Alchemy in your starting deck.
1371.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
1371.flavor: In his hour of doom, All-mother Freya appeared to Otkell on his ship, and gave him the means to soothe the raging tempest, for she already knew that Otkell, like his brothers, had a greater tale to tell.

1372.name: Heulyn
1372.ability:
Deploy: Boost all allied Humans by 1.
Start the game with 5 random Skellige bronze Humans in your graveyard.
1372.ability_html: Deploy: Boost all allied Humans by 1. Start the game with 5 random Skellige bronze Humans in your graveyard.
1372.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
1372.flavor: Legends, in all their embellishment and exaggeration, are only spun by those who weren't around to witness the mundane. Heulyn, Mother of Forefathers, never raised her sons on dragons and thunderstorms, but instead on chores and responsibilities.

1373.name: Mahakam Pass
1373.ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Create a Scoia'tael Dwarf and give it 4 Armor.
Order: Spawn and play Tempering.
1373.ability_html: Resilience. Deploy: Create a Scoia'tael Dwarf and give it 4 Armor. Order: Spawn and play Tempering.
1373.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
1373.flavor: The roads to Mount Carbon shall one day be paved with steel.

1374.name: Eudora Breckenriggs
1374.ability: At the start of the game, Infuse a random Zoltan in your deck with "When this card appears on the battlefield, Spawn Eudora Breckenriggs to the right of self and boost her by 1 for each Zoltan in your starting deck", then Banish self.
1374.ability_html: At the start of the game, Infuse a random Zoltan in your deck with "When this card appears on the battlefield, Spawn Eudora Breckenriggs to the right of self and boost her by 1 for each Zoltan in your starting deck", then Banish self.
1374.keyword_html: Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
1374.flavor: Dinnae just follow yer heart tae yer sweetums. Yer wits matter every bit as much.

1375.name: Princess Adda
1375.ability:
Deploy (Devotion): Gain Immunity.
The first time a Cursed unit enters the battlefield during your turn, boost self by its base power.
1375.ability_html: Deploy (Devotion): Gain Immunity. The first time a Cursed unit enters the battlefield during your turn, boost self by its base power.
1375.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards. Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
1375.flavor: Freed from a curse inflicted out of jealousy, only to return to a court filled with little else.

1376.name: Radovid: Judgment
1376.ability:
Devotion: Once all leader Charges are used up, Summon self from your deck to your Melee row.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 0. Increase this value by 1 for each time you used your leader ability this game.
1376.ability_html: Devotion: Once all leader Charges are used up, Summon self from your deck to your Melee row. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 0. Increase this value by 1 for each time you used your leader ability this game.
1376.keyword_html: Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.

1377.name: Lara Dorren
1377.ability:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Damage self by the total duration of Frost on enemy rows.
Deathwish: Boost all enemy units by 2.
When your opponent plays a gold Wild Hunt unit while Lara Dorren is in your graveyard, they also replay Lara Dorren from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
1377.ability_html: Disloyal. Deploy: Damage self by the total duration of Frost on enemy rows. Deathwish: Boost all enemy units by 2. When your opponent plays a gold Wild Hunt unit while Lara Dorren is in your graveyard, they also replay Lara Dorren from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
1377.keyword_html: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
1377.flavor: The tragedy of Lara Dorren echoes throughout the centuries. Wherever Hen Ichaer flows, heartbreak is bound to follow.

1378.name: Vereena
1378.ability:
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (4).
Bleeding enemy units cannot be boosted.
1378.ability_html: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (4). Bleeding enemy units cannot be boosted.
1378.keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
1378.flavor: Your heart, your life—MINE. If not mine—NO ONE'S.

1379.name: Novigrad
1379.ability:
Resilience.
Profit 3.
At the end of your turn, gain 1 Coin.
Order: Create and play a bronze Gang unit.
1379.ability_html: Resilience. Profit 3. At the end of your turn, gain 1 Coin. Order: Create and play a bronze Gang unit.
1379.keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source. Gang: Criminal organisations including Blindeyes, Crownsplitters, Cutups, Firesworn, Salamandra and Tidecloaks.
1379.flavor: In the free city of Novigrad, one is always free to do as one's told.

1380.name: Madam Marquise Serenity
1380.ability:
Profit 4.
Deploy (Melee): Summon a Sly Seductress from your deck to this row.
Deploy (Ranged): Summon Passiflora Peaches from your deck to this row.
Tribute 8: Summon both instead.
Whenever your opponent plays a card, gain 1 Coin.
1380.ability_html: Profit 4. Deploy (Melee): Summon a Sly Seductress from your deck to this row. Deploy (Ranged): Summon Passiflora Peaches from your deck to this row. Tribute 8: Summon both instead. Whenever your opponent plays a card, gain 1 Coin.
1380.keyword_html: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
1380.flavor: If you're looking for something different, perhaps a round of Gwent?
